description: Sales Internship Description  We are looking for a qualified sales intern to assist in various stages of the sales funnel, including market research, generating leads, and retaining customers.  The ideal intern will be a great fit for our energetic team. You’ll gain hands-on experience working on challenging, meaningful projects with guidance from a mentor and other members of our team.  Duties and Responsibilities  Help develop client relationships and retain existing accounts Research and generate lists of potential customers Learn and apply sales techniques Provide input on customer briefs, presentations, and sales literature Assist in evaluating new collaboration opportunities  Requirements  Business or STEM Degree Excellent interpersonal and communication skills Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment At least 3 days per week, minimum 3 months  Benefits  Gain hands-on experience in each stage of the sales funnel Collaborate with experienced sales professionals Attend meetings, events, and other networking opportunities Opportunity to get a full-time position at the end of the internship Compensation: 120rmb/day + performance bonus  Application  If you are interested in the position please send your CV (Name + Sales Intern) by email to hr@yasa.ltd

Job Responsibility • Follow up PIV signed • Shipping schedule checking • Chasing prepayment & overdue payment • Chasing and checking over 30days unpicked-up container • EHC issue checking and follow up • Pushing for PO/CNEE, and assist to do sales form • Sales Force system input claim • Update and tracking the claim progress in system • Pull related reports with SAP system • Comply with BRF Sustainability Policy guidelines, ensure adherence to BRF Sustainability Plan through activities in its routines that promotes compliance with the indicators and global ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance) commitments of the Company, ensuring the connection between its actions and sustainable development in the BRF chain. 岗位职责： Responsibilities:  1. 协助客户经理维持客户关系，更新客户资料； Assist Account Manager maintenance clients relationship,update clients information 2. 协助客户经理及客人的后台管理； Assist Account Manager & client to management back-end; 3. 上级交办的其他任务 Other ad-hoc work assigned by leaders.   岗位要求： Requirements：  1. 中国籍在校大学生 Chinese undergraduate 2. 善于沟通及团队合作，认真负责，为人细心，对自己要求高 good at communication and teamwork, strong sense of responsibility, attentive 3. 对互联网、电子商务、餐饮美食都有浓厚兴趣 passionate about internet/e-business/fine food 4. 有良好的英语听说读写能力将优先考虑 proficient in English would be a big advantage  本职位是在一个国际化的工作环境中，同事中有外籍人事，可锻炼英语口语。 将来有志于从事市场工作的同学，千万不要错过这次宝贵的学习与工作机会。

Job overview:  Sales Support Associate supports the Sales team in their communication with partners and clients. Must be fluent in Chinese (oral & written).  Responsibilities:  ·        Assist Sales team to prepare presentations, proposals and sales contracts ·        Assist Sales team to facilitate sales meeting, summarize and plan the work ·        Assist Sales team to update client information in internal system, make quotation, cost accounting etc. ·        Assist sales team to complete new project bidding ·        Assist Sales team in client’s procurement process and issue Fapiao (if needed) follow-up payment collection ·        Work with Channel Partners to meet their clients’ testing and remediation needs ·        Coordinates sales effort with operation, technical services teams (environmental testing, project management, IAQ monitoring technology), accounting, logistics, and marketing Requirements:  Business management or environmental/chemistry background with prior work experience. Initiative and independent thought is most important Must be fluent in Chinese (oral & written) Must be able to speak/read English, but strong written English is priority Must have strong proficiency with Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint  Working hours: Full-time -- Typically 9:30am-6:30pm business hours, but may require occasional evening or weekend based on business requirements.

description: AN INTERESTING EVENT FOR YOU  If you are looking out for new opportunities to build your career, join us in Abbott Global Days of Hiring on October 12-13, 2021.  Follow the link to register for the event  https://globaldaysofhiring.vfairs.com/  主要职责： 管理客户关系并提供相关服务，手术跟台过程中随时给医疗专家提供产品技术支持。 根据既定的市场开发原则在指定区域开拓新的客户，并保持从现有客户获得持续的销售业绩。 提供销售，活动及成本预算方面的信息，以利于销售经理做出有效的判断。 在既定的客户中，根据系统的调研和沟通，最大可能的发现影响客户现在及未来的商业机会及购买决定。 制定客户开发计划，并达到销售目标。 在负责的相关销售区域，了解当地的医疗市场及影响客户选择的竞争对手策略。 学习以保持对公司产品、临床应用、管理法规要求的质量标准和业务政策的及时理解。 职位要求： 本科及以上学历 ，医学/药学/生物学等专业背景优先 诚信，高度独立，成熟，有责任，热情卓越，良好的沟通技巧和团队合作精神 良好的英文基础 可适应长短期出差

Marketing Executive: Intern (Shanghai) at Technology Startup : Payments, New Retailing, Mobility Solution, Omni-Channel Strategy, Retail & Fashion & Cosmetic & Luxury transformation in digital – era.  Job description Only current, enrolled Bachelors, Masters, MBA candidates are eligible.  · Based in Shanghai working with partners and clients across globe · Seeking candidates with Tier-1 advertising, marketing, consulting, corporate finance breadth · Intensive work, deadlines with commercial pressure   We are looking for an enthusiastic candidate with passion for communications, content creation and message development. Responsibilities for this role include:  · Conceive and develop efficient and intuitive marketing strategies (including online and offline) · Organize and oversee advertising/communication campaigns (social media), exhibitions and promotional events · Conduct market research and analysis to evaluate trends, brand awareness and competition ventures · Initiate and control surveys to assess customer requirements and dedication · Write copy for diverse marketing distributions (brochures, press releases, website material, EDM, social post etc.) · Maintain relationships with media vendors and publishers to ensure collaboration in promotional activities · Monitor progress of campaigns using various metrics and submit reports of performance · Driving effective internal communications to assist proper use of marketing contents; · Collaborate with management team in preparing budgets and monitoring expenses    Desired skills: · Mandarin-Chinese Fluency and English Fluency · Agency-level copywriting in either Chinese or English · Excellent communicator, comfortable with frequent cross-functional and senior management contact and able to exert indirect authority to deliver results · Relentlessly high standards and an eagle eye for detail · Business acumen  · Strong editorial background and proofreading skills, as well as experience adhering to technical style guides · Big picture thinking (storyboarding, solving clients' problems, hypothesis creation) · Resilience and a humble attitude · Misfits, creative geniuses: those who want to create product and sell like Mad Men    About the company FairyMo provides enterprise in-store mobility solutions to empower the retailers & brand owners to create the Store of Future .  FairyMo’s powerful mobile Point of Sales application re-invent the in-store shopping experience - dedicated to store associate empowerment, FairyMo is bringing the best of online shopping to the selling floor with an intuitive, simple to use mobile app that enables: assisted selling, endless aisle, clienteling, store communications, mobile checkout and payment.

We seek a detail-oriented professional who, with guidance, will help assess customer needs and suggest appropriate products, services and solutions. description: Job Purpose and Impact  This role will be a core part of the entrepreneurial team building the Cargill Risk Management business in APAC. The organization offers risk management solutions to customers, and this person under trader’s supervision will learn to manage the risk of those positions and will have influence on product selection and pricing. This person also needs to help the team in products building from technical perspective. This role may engage directly with customers to enhance the onboarding and sales process.  Key Accountabilities 40% Supporting the trading desk in managing an embedded/OTC cross-asset and proprietary positions. Under direction from senior team member, use listed and OTC instruments to hedge the portfolio risk, maximizing profitability through hedging decisions and execution. 30% Under direction from senior team member, work closely with IT/Quant team to develop new structured products and pricing/valuation tools. 20% Partner with global sales team to engage customers on price risk management solutions primarily by helping with market insights and product selection. 10% Ensure that deals and hedges are accurate and entered in a timely manner Qualifications  Minimum Required Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative, financial engineering Ability to understand option theories and hedge option Greeks Ability to prioritize, multi-task, meet deadlines, and work with minimal supervision Attention to detail and ability to do P/L attribution and fine-tune strategies accordingly Strong attention to detail Solid problem-solving ability Collaborative and team oriented Shown initiative in challenging status quo and quickly adapting to change Interest in career progression and assuming more demanding assignments over time Fluency in English
industries: Chemicals, Food & Beverages, and Food Production

description: About Hanshow: Hanshow is a leading provider of ESL and smart store solutions serving traditional retail, new retail, pharmacies, department stores, fashion, health care, and the entertainment industries, etc. Founded in 2012. We provide ESL and smart store solutions in 12,000+ stores in 50+ countries. Hanshow is a trusted partner among retailers worldwide. We strive to enhance the shopping experience by developing cutting edge technology and providing services to solve our clients' in-store challenges. Our innovative spirit begins with our global team, improves the way we operate, and ultimately helps us deliver compelling end-to-end solutions. We are currently looking for a sales Intern to join our team!  Location: Düsseldorf At Hanshow you will: · Support the Business Team to improve sales through our direct and indirect channels; · Increase brand awareness, expand the total market, and find new and alternative revenue streams; · Proactively search for sales and partnership opportunities; · Work closely with internal colleagues on several deals and new business-related topics and projects; · If needed, support daily operation work and ensure that related data is always up-to-date; be ready to take over any tasks that might come up from our office. Who are we looking for: · A background and interest in marketing, sales, or business operations, and are eligible for a full-time internship; · Outstanding communications skills, self-motivated learner, able to work closely in a team but also independently motivated to complete tasks; · Fluent Chinese, English and German are required; · You are living in Germany; · Accustomed to a fast paced environment. What we offer: · Competitive salary above average in the relevant industry; · Promising and sustainable self-development and prospects; · Wide technical and modern environment with interesting challenges; · Professional environment with an open communication culture; · Free Friday afternoon tea to keep spirits high. If you are interested, please send your CV in English or German to bingying.jia.noelke@hanshow.com

description: Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements ork experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver's license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills.

Job Description  Job Description: Document consolidation, filing, chopping & courier. Other sales operation assistance required. Working Time  2 half working days or 2 entire working days each week.  Qualification  2nd or 3rd year in college, available for 2 half days in each week.  Major: business administration or logistics, supply chain etc.  Good English reading skill (prefer CET-4)  Detail oriented & reliable.  About Us  Every day, the oil and gas industry’s best minds put more than 150 years of experience to work to help our customers achieve lasting success. Job Summary  The Abercrombie associate is truly engaged. They provide great customer service by anticipating and responding to customer needs. An individual who is outgoing, stylish, and helpful. They demonstrate a keen awareness of the store environment by ensuring they always remain approachable and warm. They are able to initiate conversations and connect with the customer by communicating in a genuine and articulate way; that ensures the customer is always the first priority. Demonstrates relatable, confident and highly social behaviors on the sales floor that translate into closing the sale.  Responsibilities And Duties Customer Experience - Interacts with customers to ensure they have an outstanding experience. Anticipate store needs, reads body language and picks up on cues to help customers. Keeps up-to-date on merchandise choices and uses suggestive selling/outfitting skills to share this knowledge with customers. Delivers an in-store experience focused on the customer, ensuring a fast, easy and exciting shopping experience. Follows all fitting room procedures. Store Presentation and Sales Floor - Maintains and updates visual and presentation standards throughout the store by completing and styling all table layers and forms and faceout changes according to USR report, program and visual guidelines. Cleans, organizes and maintains store. Audits for size availability, fills store efficiently and quickly, and ensures assigned zones are standardized and merchandise is steams and stacked neatly for east of shopping. Completes store recovery. Ensures that each fitting room is clean and free from damage. Communication - Develops good working relationships with others. Keeps managers informed of customer merchandise and business flow issues. Communicates with others in a timely and appropriate manner. Respects and values diversity of others.  Qualifications And Skills  Part Time - no specialty retail experience required.  Powered by JazzHR  VgfErSOMGT

At Chaoly, we have developed a data analytics platform that analyzes, benchmarks, and helps to optimize our clients’ China performance (eCommerce and social media), thereby maximizing their ROI. We enable our customers to make important and strategic choices in China based on our insights.  How do we do this? By making cross-platform data available all in one platform, to allow our clients to understand the effect of marketing activities on actual sales revenue, showing every part of the marketing funnel, from awareness to conversion and loyalty. It is further enhanced with our optimizer tools and customized sales improvement plans. Our analytics platform is designed in a way that it supports overseas brands through every step of their eCommerce and Social Media journey in China, and is powered by predictive analytics and machine learning technologies. We have worked together with leading Dutch and international brands such as PepsiCo, Rémy Martin, Suitsupply, Phillips, Nestlé and Accenture.  We always start with 'why', and are not afraid to ask questions to deliver the right data required. Start your data journey with us now!  Job description: Since we are growing very fast we are looking for marketing talent to strengthen our team in Shanghai.  You will spend 60% of working hours on content marketing: · Create text and other rich media contents to grow our social media and e-shop website · Assist with creating marcom assets, e.g. banners, prints, and advertisement, using graphic design programs and other marketing tools · Be the owner of brand campaign operation, ensuring business objectives are achieved · Maintain web contents using CMS and recommend suggestions to improve user experience  You will spend the rest 40% of working hours on market research and ad-hoc requests: · Conduct desktop research to analyze market intelligence and competitor dynamics · Execute other marketing campaigns on e-commerce platforms · Fulfill ad-hoc writing and/or analytics requests  Ideal candidate profile: · Studying toward or recently graduated with a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree, preferably in Marketing, Communications, Media, Design, Journalism, Business Economics, or other related fields · Native speaker of Mandarin Chinese and fluent in English · Understand and appreciate cultural differences · Self-starter/eager to learn and explore · Previous experience in (digital) marketing and/or (Chinese) ecommerce is highly valuable · Digitally savvy and have strong affinity with the (Chinese) digital world, especially social media · Have a writer’s soul and is able to translate business requirements into creative outputs · Strong interest in fashion, travel, media, lifestyle, fitness, cuisine, design and culture is a plus · Minimum 40 hours a week available for minimum of five months  What we can offer you: · A challenging internship with opportunities to make real world business impacts · Flexibility to develop your skills and test your ideas · Opportunities to coordinate exciting projects between our Amsterdam and Shanghai office · Opportunities to dive into the FMCG industry and the Chinese e-commerce world · We always start with 'why', and not afraid to ask questions to deliver the right data required · We are an open and curious bunch that likes to seek solutions via digging deep into the data · An energetic and international team  Are you interested? Please send an email with your CV and motivation letter to Roxanne Phaisalakani: roxanne@chaoly.com.

Internship Program at Tesla  The Internship Recruiting Team is driven by the passion to recognize emerging talent. Our year around program places the best students in positions that they will grow both technically and personally through their experience working closely with their Manager, Mentor, and team. We are dedicated to providing an experience that allows for the intern to experience life at Tesla by given them projects that are critical to their team’s success.  The Role  We are looking for a Technical Program Manager Intern who is willing to undertake an insane challenge of building out organization level strategy to prioritize, track critical programs, and support department operations  Responsibilities Lead the ideation, technical approach and launch of internal products and services that automate various operations and maximize efficiency across manufacture, logistics, sales and service. Coordinate global and local resource across projects and programs to archive business goal. Drive product development with engineers and designers Integrate analytics, data science and research into your methodology Maximize productivity in a constantly changing environment of shifting priorities Ruthlessly prioritize Influence without reporting structure Resolve conflict productively across teams Manage back office include financial actual and forecast Department level routine operations Requirements Currently in the process of obtaining, a BS, MS, MBA or other technical degree in relevant program including, but not limited to: Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Data Science Strong analytical and quantitative skills with ability to use data and metrics for making assumptions and decisions Ability to successfully work with cross range of teams including engineering, UX, legal, finance, sales and operations Bridging online and offline domains for full customer journey impact Good understanding and working experience in technology development best practices (such as, Agile, etc.) and product management technologies Excellent written and verbal communications across technical and non-technical stakeholders. Previous internship and/or project experience is a plus

Company Description: This host company is an accredited incubator for innovative, scalable solutions that helps Entrepreneurs enter and grow in the Chinese market. They aspire to be the best support for Entrepreneurs with their incubation services, funding, and government connection. They are currently seeking undergraduate and graduate students to join their dynamic team as Associate (interns). Associates are given the opportunity to meaningfully contribute to all aspects of the host company's work and seamlessly integrate into their collegial culture. Associates are important members of their teams with room to grow in an initiative-driven workspace. This internship is best suited for undergraduate or graduate students interested in entering the field of Startups and Scaleups.  The company CEO is a former Barclays Bank and Vodafone Executive and drives a culture to promote self-reliance and ownership over one’s workstream. They are very transparent about on-job performance, through private Professional Development Chats.   The successful candidate will join a high-performing team to learn more about how we dazzle our customers. Were looking for creative thinkers who have a love for coding and a passion for problem-solving to create and maintain both internal and client-facing systems. Successful Interns stand the chance of joining our team in China as full time  About the Project This is an HR Tech building Project with enhanced systems that help students navigate their career paths. It supports Universities with the right systems and helps Companies locate the right entry-level talent with the right skill sets. We are at the intersection of People, social impact, and technology. Our Team is passionate about solving pertinent social issues by mobilizing available connections, other resources at our disposal and in the process touch lives. Our greater purpose is to democratize opportunities for the youth. We want everyone, regardless of their background, education or socio-economic status to have the opportunity to get a decent education and a Job. This is what gets us out of bed every morning and every single thing we do every day is to move us closer to solving this problem. If you yearn to do something or serve a purpose that is intended for the greater good, you’re reading the right job advert. Start your cover letter, naming one of the projects that excite you and how you intend to contribute   What You’ll Do We're looking for someone who wants to get their hands dirty and can get things done and wants to jump on board and work on special growth initiatives, overdeliver, and even come up with their own ideas to help us grow our user base. Lead 1-2 key projects. Projects may include efforts related to partnership building, ecosystem research, and reporting as well as growth-related tasks. You will be writing proposals, linking with industry experts and influencers to drive key penetration strategies. Perform Sales and Business Development tasks as allocated by the  Minimum Qualifications Past experience in building communities, following, getting customers, or anything similar that involved growing a base. If you always muse you're too creative for corporate jobs, and too scientific for pursuing creative fields - we're looking for you. Good English writing skills. Proficiency in Chinese will be an added advantage  Nice to Haves Surprise us - tell us a story, experience, anecdote or anything that you think makes you a great fit for the role!

What We Do  SAS is the leader in business analytics software and services, and the largest independent vendor in the business intelligence market. Through our software and services, we inspire customers around the world to transform data into intelligence. Our curiosity fuels innovation, pushing boundaries, challenging the status quo and changing the way we live.  JMP is a business unit of SAS that produces interactive software for desktop statistical discovery. JMP has been a part of SAS since the first version of JMP statistical discovery software was launched in 1989, bringing interactive data visualization and analysis to the desktop.  Why JMP  We love living the #JMP life and believe that happy, healthy people have a passion for life, and bring that energy to work. No matter what your specialty or where you are in the world, your unique contributions will make a difference.  Our multi-dimensional culture blends our different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. Here, it isn’t about fitting into our culture, it’s about adding to it - and we can’t wait to see what you’ll bring.  Job Responsibilities  At JMP a sales management trainee can become a: Sales expert: Establish a strong presence in the market and drive sales growth. Strategic expert: Closely follow industry and market trends and lead strategic cooperation between JMP and its customers. Operations expert: Establish business rules, control transaction quality, and help customers achieve business success. Project management expert: Lead various types of projects, mobilize internal resources, and ensure project profitability and customer satisfaction. Key Responsibilities  Primary individuals responsible for engaging with customers; formulating plans for, establishing, maintaining, and promoting customer connections; and developing customer relationships.  You will represent customers internally, understand and accurately communicate customer requirements, help improve corporate management and capabilities, mobilize both internal and external resources to provide business solutions, and effectively achieve business targets.  You will also represent the company externally, solve customers' business, improve customer satisfaction, and build mutual trust and win-win partnerships.  Position Requirements Majors in engineering, computer science, mathematics, physics, materials, etc., or other related disciplines. description: The APAC Commercial Banking Team is responsible for the overall relationship management and credit requirements of the APAC subsidiaries of our US Commercial Banking clients. Leveraging the firm's capabilities to meet our client's domestic and international financial needs, the team provides dedicated client service, local market expertise and industry knowledge, combined with active coordination, domestically, regionally and internationally of J.P. Morgan's extensive product and service expertise to deliver comprehensive solutions across multiple product and service disciplines. Traditional Commercial Banking product and service capabilities include, but are not limited to: bilateral and syndicated commercial lending, treasury services, trade finance, global markets and asset management.  The Commercial Banking Relationship Manager in Shanghai will provide client coverage of CB clients' international subsidiaries in China and work closely with headquarter origination teams (International Product Specialists (IPS) in the US, parent bankers, treasury sales officers, as well as product specialists from across the firm to identify and support the banking needs and requirements of Commercial Banking clients.  Key Responsibilities Manage and grow a diverse portfolio of Medium-sized and Network Commercial Banking clients with a focus on local/regional decision makers based in China. Establish and maintain local contacts with the client's subsidiary and work closely with IPS teams and parent bankers to increase wallet share of existing clients and cross sell APAC countries. Typical client requirements will focus on financing, trade, risk & treasury management. Types of credit facilities range from working capital lines with parent guarantee support to syndicated transactions. Size up market opportunity, identify, solicit & develop new CB relationships by active local prospecting and execution of key deals originated from the headquarter teams. Analyse complex financial information to structure appropriate client solutions, credit facilities and execution of banking transactions. Take responsibility for the renewal of all credit facilities in the client portfolio. Provide quality and tailored business solutions to CB clients through the partnership with different Product teams including treasury services, trade services, global markets, asset management & Credit Risk Management to deliver comprehensive JPM products. Assist the senior bankers in preparation and submission of RFPs i.e., lead the end-to-end process Ensure necessary oversight and onshore accountability to support local client on-boarding, partnering with local risk management (e.g., Compliance, Legal, Tax, etc.) and middle/back office teams as needed to support transactional, service or credit activities. Responsible for client due diligence to provide the necessary oversight and local accountability to new transactional or service related activities in line with JPM Chase policies and local Regulatory requirements covering credit documents, Compliance, Know Your Customer (KYC), Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Window Guidelines, etc. Promote and sustain strong engagement and mutually beneficial relationships with key internal stakeholders including US based IPS teams, Parent Bankers, Underwriters and Credit Committees, in addition to local and regional product and service delivery partners, Legal, Compliance, plus mid and back office support teams across the firm. General Knowledge And Experience Required Minimum 7-8 years relevant banking experience in China, with a strong command of financial services, regulatory environment, corporate banking products, debt products, trade finance, transaction services (core cash management, liquidity, FX) and derivatives. Good relationship management and credit risk management expertise in the corporate &/or MNC market segments. Relevant international banking experience in the US/China/Asia markets and/or prior experience of managing APAC regional relationships would be a strong advantage. Proven expertise in credit analysis, structuring and negotiating domestic and cross border credit risk transactions, both in bilateral and syndicated loan formats. Prior experience of working in the field of cash management would be a strong advantage. Good client relationship management skills together with well-developed business development skills. Proven ability to work professionally and effectively across diverse product and service capabilities. Excellence in oral and written communication (English and Chinese) with proven strength for personal engagement. Flexibility to co-ordinate and manage multiple transactions and processes contemporaneously ensuring delivery against deadlines, client expectations and business priorities. Ability to work consistently across different time zones and geographies, dealing with numerous stakeholders. Is aware of the importance of building partnerships across the organization and knows which partners are the key to success. Can influence key stakeholders to ensure projects and business opportunities are successfully realized. Escalates appropriately to alleviate bottlenecks in the process. Is astutely aware of how to communicate ideas across/up/down the organization to gain maximum acceptance quickly. Enthusiastic and team orientated. Language Requirements Fluent in spoken and written English and Mandarin. Proficient in Japanese is a plus. Formal Qualifications Bachelor/Degree Qualified in Business, Finance, Accounting &/or Economics CFA or CPA is a strong advantage J.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world's most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.  We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.

jobTitle: FY22 Trainee CCDP 商业人才职业发展计划（CS Sales Shanghai）
description: 项目信息：  该项目是通过系统化的高效培训和实践，培养优秀应届毕业生或毕业1-2年的高潜力人才成为西门子医疗的商务精英。 该项目将通过入职引导帮助培训生了解公司战略、企业文化和关键业务流程，还将通过一系列的产品知识培训和专业技能培训帮助培训生熟悉医学影像/体外诊断业务领域和提升综合能力。此外，还将通过带教机制锻炼培训生的一线销售能力和商务敏感度。  该项目将根据实际业务需求在医学影像售前、售后服务以及大客户管理团队进行轮岗。  让我们一起助力医疗服务提供者提升价值，改善患者体验、推进精准医疗、转化诊疗模式、实现数字化医疗!  你的职责是：  以客户为中心，积极维护客户关系，开发客户需求 根据客户需求提供产品和服务解决方案，达成销售目标 与客户保持持续和有效的沟通交流，以维持高水平的客户满意度 积极参与所负责区域的市场活动，向客户推广西门子医疗品牌形象及公司价值 维护商业渠道，与商业伙伴建立可信赖的合作关系 积极协调跨部门合作，确保项目顺利实施  要成功应聘本职位，你应当具备以下技能和经验：  2022年毕业，本科及以上学历，理工、商科类相关专业 工作富有激情并把医疗行业销售作为今后的职业发展方向 具备自我驱动力，渴求成功 积极主动，业务及人际敏感度高，优秀的沟通能力 时间管理能力，快速适应能力，拥有良好的自我激励和自主学习能力，良好的团队合作 良好的英文能力 愿意在不同的城市工作，具备一定的灵活性（除北京、上海、深圳，南京、成都、长沙、广州等省会城市或者其他二三线城市） 愿意长期在医疗领域发展并为影像技术、医学检验、医疗保健和医疗环境不断完善做贡献  加入项目，你将获得  职业发展：  对于刚入职的应届生，通过全方面的培训和学习，你将在短时间内掌握医学影像的产品及行业知识，为将来的职业发展打下坚实的基础。同时，带教形式将能帮助你快速熟悉市场和客户群体，在销售市场领域完成从萌新到职场精英的蜕变  公司内部多维度、多方向机会：  西门子医疗几乎所有业务都需要建立在对业务的了解基础上，成为一个优秀的销售后，可以在公司的市场、销售、产品管理等多部门探寻自己的横向/纵向发展机会  Organization: Siemens Healthineers  Company: Siemens Healthineers Ltd.  Experience Level: Recent College Graduate  Job Type: Full-time
industries: Medical Devices, Hospital & Health Care, and Biotechnology

description: Hermès Perfume & Beauty  Our métier: the creation, production and distribution of Perfumes, associated scented products, and Beauty products. description: 项目信息：  该项目是通过系统化的高效培训和实践，培养优秀应届毕业生或毕业1-2年的高潜力人才成为西门子医疗的商务精英。 该项目将通过入职引导帮助培训生了解公司战略、企业文化和关键业务流程，还将通过一系列的产品知识培训和专业技能培训帮助培训生熟悉医学影像/体外诊断业务领域和提升综合能力。此外，还将通过带教机制锻炼培训生的一线销售能力和商务敏感度。  该项目将根据实际业务需求在医学影像售前、售后服务以及大客户管理团队进行轮岗。  让我们一起助力医疗服务提供者提升价值，改善患者体验、推进精准医疗、转化诊疗模式、实现数字化医疗!  你的职责是：  以客户为中心，积极维护客户关系，开发客户需求 根据客户需求提供产品和服务解决方案，达成销售目标 与客户保持持续和有效的沟通交流，以维持高水平的客户满意度 积极参与所负责区域的市场活动，向客户推广西门子医疗品牌形象及公司价值 维护商业渠道，与商业伙伴建立可信赖的合作关系 积极协调跨部门合作，确保项目顺利实施  要成功应聘本职位，你应当具备以下技能和经验：  2022年毕业，本科及以上学历，理工、商科类相关专业 工作富有激情并把医疗行业销售作为今后的职业发展方向 具备自我驱动力，渴求成功 积极主动，业务及人际敏感度高，优秀的沟通能力 时间管理能力，快速适应能力，拥有良好的自我激励和自主学习能力，良好的团队合作 良好的英文能力 愿意在不同的城市工作，具备一定的灵活性（除北京、上海、深圳，南京、成都、长沙、广州等省会城市或者其他二三线城市） 愿意长期在医疗领域发展并为影像技术、医学检验、医疗保健和医疗环境不断完善做贡献  加入项目，你将获得  职业发展：  对于刚入职的应届生，通过全方面的培训和学习，你将在短时间内掌握医学影像的产品及行业知识，为将来的职业发展打下坚实的基础。同时，带教形式将能帮助你快速熟悉市场和客户群体，在销售市场领域完成从萌新到职场精英的蜕变  公司内部多维度、多方向机会：  西门子医疗几乎所有业务都需要建立在对业务的了解基础上，成为一个优秀的销售后，可以在公司的市场、销售、产品管理等多部门探寻自己的横向/纵向发展机会  Organization: Siemens Healthineers  Company: Siemens Healthineers Ltd.  Experience Level: Recent College Graduate  Job Type: Full-time
industries: Medical Devices, Hospital & Health Care, and Biotechnology

jobTitle: 2022 Deutsche Bank Summer Internship: Corporate Bank - Shanghai
description: About Deutsche Bank: The Deutsche Bank Internship Programme  At Deutsche Bank, we’re changing what it means to be a bank. We’re looking for creative thinkers who are ready to make a difference from day one. On our internship, you’ll experience what life is like on our Graduate Programme and start developing the skills you need to succeed in finance. You’ll be supported to immediately take on real responsibility on real projects, start building your network and learn from senior leaders across our business. You’ll also see how important diversity and inclusion are to our business and what it means in reality. If you’re looking for a head start in your finance career, this is your chance to learn first-hand how and what we deliver for clients from colleagues leading the industry.  About Corporate Bank  The Corporate Bank is a market leader in risk management for FX and Rates, cash management, lending, trade finance, trust and agency services as well as securities services.  Products  Cash Management  Delivers a wide range of payment and cash management related products to corporates and non-bank financial institutions.  Trade Finance & Lending  Covers the full range of corporate lending solutions and provides solutions related to imports, exports or domestic trade transactions.  Trust & Agency Services  Delivers a wide range of Agency and Fiduciary services to Capital Markets instruments and provides a full range of Depositary Bank services to global issuers, investors and brokers.  Securities Services  Partnering with clients along the securities trading/investment process.  Risk Management  Market leading FX and Rates risk management services for our corporate & commercial clients.  Coverage  Our Coverage team manages the Corporate Bank’s key client relationships across the full suite of Corporate and Investment Bank products.  Central  The Central Team works closely with the business divisions and infrastructure functions to execute our strategy, enables the bank to operate safely and to be commercial.  Within each area you will have the opportunity to perform multiple roles such as Sales, Product Management, Client Service & Delivery or Business Management.  Our internship programme  Our interns are given the opportunity to learn about our business from different viewpoints, giving you a career advantage. Working on our day-to-day business as well as on special projects, you will contribute to the innovation of new ideas to help our customers achieve their financial goals. You will gain experience in different areas of our business and discover our market-leading solutions first hand. The internship is an ideal way of finding out whether a career in Corporate Bank meets your needs and aspirations.  What We Look For  We recruit highly intelligent interns who are committed and adaptable. They have degrees in many different disciplines. Even though good levels of numeracy are important for some roles, you won’t necessarily need a formal mathematical or financial background. We have very comprehensive training programmes that will give you all the technical knowledge you’ll need to build a career with us. Above all, we’re looking for entrepreneurial people who thrive best in a diverse culture where innovation and agile thinking abound.  You are passionate about helping clients meet their financial goals and navigate in dynamic investment landscape. You already have a record of outstanding academic achievement and you’re eager to go on learning at the same intensive rate. So you’ll thrive on working in a highly collaborative environment with some of the best minds in banking.  How To Apply  Please visit https://careers.db.com/ to apply. Applications close 31 October 2021 (Beijing Time 23:45). This opportunity is open to students graduating between July 2022 to July 2023 only.  Our values define the working environment we strive to create – diverse, supportive and welcoming of different views. We embrace a culture reflecting a variety of perspectives, insights and backgrounds to drive innovation. We build talented and diverse teams to drive business results and encourage our people to develop to their full potential. Talk to us about flexible work arrangements and other initiatives we offer.  We promote good working relationships and encourage high standards of conduct and work performance. We welcome applications from talented people from all cultures, countries, races, genders, sexual orientations, disabilities, beliefs and generations and are committed to providing a working environment free from harassment, discrimination and retaliation.  Click here to find out more about diversity and inclusion at Deutsche Bank.
职位来源于实习僧。 协助网站改版事宜（无须IT知识） 核对、整理网站内容 市场活动协助 其他 善于沟通 做事仔细、有耐心 能熟练使用office软件 英语较熟练 大二大三大四皆可。 职位薪资：  100-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.bureauveritas.cn

description: 职位来源于实习僧。  Intern - Zenith Commercial team  Job Description  By project Coordination of different sales initiatives (e.g. sales rehearsal competition, ICLOUD implementation) Online training: store anticipation process & rate follow-up Ongoing commercial support Support sales managers with ongoing regular inquiries/coordination from stores Store daily inquiries: SAV issues, gifting, store maintenance stuffs Coordinator between stores & marketing team & sales manager Stuffs logistic & implementation coordination for trade events & VM Translation: commercial & training relevant files Payment: including Capex, construction, DOS related expenses etc. Contract: retailer agreement chopping process, DOS related contract/chop follow up Additional office paper work support & data combination Job Requirements Related major will be preferred A plus for retail industry experience Availability to last for at least 6 months, working for 5 days a week Detail oriented and self-motivate Excellent writing skills in Chinese, English, proficiency spoken and written in English Able to onboard within 2 weeks CV Requirement: English must, Chinese nice to have  Office Location: 上海市静安区南京西路恒隆广场一期办公楼  职位薪资：  150-150/天

Job Reference #  235976BR  City  Shanghai, China  Your role  Do you want to help our clients buy and sell equities, foreign currencies, interest rates and credit? You’ll help our clients buy and sell on the phone and using our online systems (on a client team) be promoting products and trading opportunities to clients based on an in-depth understanding of their needs and investment styles (as a sales trader) be the link between clients and traders, giving clients useful information about what’s happening in the markets and executing their trades at the best prices (as a trader) seek the best prices to execute our clients’ sales orders and make markets in listed and over-the-counter equities, equity derivatives and equity-linked securities  Your team  You’ll be working in Global Markets, looking after professional investors like asset managers and fund managers. You’ll give them advice and do everything that’s needed to buy and sell securities for them. From start to finish. You’ll be able to draw on the strength of our platforms, products, services and people worldwide to give your clients whatever they need.  Your expertise  You need to be graduating in 2023, and with less than two years of work experience. It doesn’t matter what you’re studying. (Really, it doesn’t.) But we’d like to see evidence that you can analyze a problem, take a view and come to a decision plan, organize and communicate well make things happen stick with a task work in a team come up with ideas Perhaps you’ve organized a fundraising event or taken part in team sports? Or persevered and passed an exam in a subject you found challenging? Think about how things you’ve achieved match the skills we’re after.  About Us  Expert advice. Wealth management. Investment banking. Asset management. Retail banking in Switzerland. And all the support functions. That's what we do. And we do it for private and institutional clients as well as corporations around the world.  We are about 60,000 employees in all major financial centers, in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?  Join us  We're a truly global, collaborative and friendly group of people. Having a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace is important to us. And we support your career development, internal mobility and work-life balance. If this sounds interesting, apply now.  Disclaimer / Policy Statements  UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.
industries: Banking, Financial Services, and Investment Banking

description: We are looking for lively and charismatic individuals to help us bring the Lark brand to life by engaging with eco conscious consumers and communicating our brand values through memorable experiences.  Your responsibilities include performing market research, meeting with focus groups, and putting on events where consumers get to interact directly with you and Lark Oral Care products.  Responsibilities Participate in consumer engagement events. Develop brand awareness among potential consumers. Develop creative ideas for experiences based on our brand messaging. Support all elements of production for virtual and physical events. Lead reporting for events and execute regular pipeline follow-up process.  Qualifications Recently awarded or currently pursuing a Bachelor or Master degree in relevant discipline. Professional experience in advertising, marketing, event planning, or sales. (preferred) Excellent language skills in either Chinese or English (written and oral). Possessing both is a plus. Excellent motivational, oral/written presentation, negotiation and communication skills.  Time Commitment: Flexible  Work Location: Fully Remote  Other Benefits:  Professional development assistance. Referral program.  All your information will be kept confidential according to Equal Employment Opportunities guidelines.  Join us on our mission to reduce human caused destruction to the earth through sustainable oral care products that replace single use plastics.  Apply now!

jobTitle: Recruitment Consultant Trainee and Experienced Hire
description: Tidalwave Solutions is a highly specialised recruitment consulting firm based in China and serving industry leading clients from financial services and fintech industries. Instead of a simple CV macthing process we emphasis on right talents to right positions and we only hire best consultants to work with our clients to provide holistic approaches to thier talent needs and working with them as a long term business partner in talent seaching, engagement, consulting on leadership placements and ongoing talent review and adjustments.  We are very selective on our clients and cases working on, once we decided to work for those clients we are committed to high quality services and adding true value as a professional consultant. We are one of the first 伯乐奖得住 rewarded by Shanghai 人社部，for our excellent performance of placing hundreds of excellent talents for our clients from global channels and we are continually doing so for coming years.  We are now hiring entry level and experienced consultants to join our high quality team and we would like to invite following type of talents to join us  Responsibilities Actively source and qualify candidates Manage the client's needs and expectations Maintaining strong relationships in the market Working to improve recruitment efficiency Provide top quality services and professional practices to clients and candidates Continually learning and improving selves  Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience Goal oriented and super proactive Able to meet strict deadlines Independently motivated Fluent in English and Chinese communication Strong sales capability while always adopting a professional approach Team player

In this role you will help gather, analyze and interpret marketplace trends and customer data to create product development strategies.  Key Accountabilities Conduct some analysis requiring a basic understanding of the commodity or market. Contribute to research of competitor behavior including marketing strategies, pricing, sales and methods of operation. Help monitor market conditions, trends and competitors to project demand and inform product launch timing. Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned Qualifications  Minimum Qualifications Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience

description: About The Job  Disclaimer: This position is expected to start from July 2021 and continue through the entire through December if available. We ask for a minimum of 12 weeks, full-time, for most internships. Please consider before submitting an application.  Internship Program at Tesla  The Internship Recruiting Team is driven by the passion to recognize emerging talent. Our year around program places the best students in positions that they will grow both technically and personally through their experience working closely with their Manager, Mentor, and team. We are dedicated to providing an experience that allows for the intern to experience life at Tesla by given them projects that are critical to their team’s success.  Locations Beijing Shanghai Lingang The Role  Tesla is seeking a hardworking and passionate Product Manager intern. This Product Manager intern will be part of a startup team that is focused on delivering a highly scalable platform that enables growth of current and future products and services to our customers.  Responsibilities   Establish a vision for your product, lead ideas alongside your peers, and drive execution to ship simple and creative features that solve real user problems   Marry both qualitative and quantitative testing methods to drive the road map, often which may require unconventional solutions and approaches   Work with engineering, UX, and business stakeholders including finance to deliver business specific value   Work with engineering team to deliver a scalable architecture that not just meets current needs, but considers future growth scenarios   Prioritize between existing versus new customers, and between features, architectural improvements and operational excellence  Requirements   Currently in the process of obtaining, a BS, MS, MBA or other technical degree in relevant program including, but not limited to: Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Data Science   Strong analytical and quantitative skills with ability to use data and metrics for making assumptions and decisions   Ability to successfully work with cross range of teams including engineering, UX, legal, finance, sales and operations   Good understanding and working experience in technology development best practices (such as, Agile, etc.) and product management technologies   Excellent written and verbal communications across technical and non-technical stakeholders   Previous internship and/or project experience is a plus

ZS is a professional services firm that works side by side with companies to help develop and deliver products that drive customer value and company results. From R&D to portfolio strategy, customer insights, marketing and sales strategy, operations and technology, we leverage our deep industry expertise and leading-edge analytics to create solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. ZSers are passionately committed to helping companies and their customers thrive in industries ranging from healthcare and life sciences, to high-tech, financial services, travel and transportation, and beyond. ZS' Business Consulting group delivers solutions to a broad spectrum of sales and marketing challenges. We also help our clients transform their sales and marketing strategies and organizations to improve their effectiveness. Our recommendations and solutions are based in rigorous research and analysis underpinned by deep expertise and thought leadership across the demand generation process. ZS’s Corporate Enterprise Functions operate the firm’s core internal functions. Our global teams comprise team-oriented, pragmatic and results-driven people who thrive in a challenging work environment. Our people come from diverse backgrounds but share a passion for quality customer service and dedication—whether our customer is a client or another ZS employee. Part-Time Associate We seek a part-time associate to support our project teams led by several Principals (Partners), Associate Principals, and Managers. This role provides opportunities for derive insights and solve business problems. In particular, PTAs apply problem-solving frameworks to client issues, support clients in change initiatives and employ standard analytic techniques to help guide client decisions. This position will be based in located in Shanghai.   Responsibilities: Conduct market research and/or desk research to derive insights and inform client decision making; Design custom analyses using tools like Excel, Access, Confirmit and ZS's proprietary software; Synthesize and communicate results to ZS teams; Other responsibilities assigned by project leaders.  Qualifications: Bachelor's or master's degree in any discipline, strong academic performance with analytic and quantitative coursework is required (business, economics, marketing, psychology, physical or life sciences, engineering, applied mathematics, statistics or relevant fields) Medical background or relevant preferred; Graduate in 2022 or afterwards; Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite; Strong analytical skills; Effective oral and written communication skills; Strong attention to detail, with a quality-focused mindset High motivation, good work ethic, maturity and personal initiative; Self-discipline for planning and organizing tasks; Aptitude for, and enjoyment of, working in teams Flexible hours to participate projects (require to work in office at least 3 days per week)

REDFERN DIGITAL – BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER  WHO ARE WE?  RedFern Digital is a China specific, full-service digital agency that helps brands navigate the digital ecosystem, increase their brand awareness and convert that awareness into sales. After 15 years in China, RedFern has grown alongside our clients, some of which are now among the most successful brands in-market. Our team specializes in Digital Marketing & Strategy, Consumer Research & Monitoring, Creative Design & Branding, Social & Paid Media, as well as Ecommerce and Technical Integration.  To learn more about us, check out our website at www.redferndigital.cn  JOB DESCRIPTION  Location: Changning, Shanghai Type: Internship Reporting line: HR Manager  RedFern Digital is seeking a Recruiting Intern to join our international team to cultivate and support our team. Requirements and Qualifications  · University degree of Bachelor or above;  · Good in both oral and written English;  · Proficient in the usage of office, Word, Excel;  · Good communication & coordination skills;  · Good planning and organization skills; Self-motivated and proactive;  · The ability to handle multiple tasks and work under pressure, be independent to deliver work results

This internship can lead to a full-time job, upon productivity, team spirit, and set KPIs.  Meet with the team aTalent marketing team plays a vital role of delivering key messages to the market. We tell the stories of how aTalent Talent Management Platform fulfills customers’ needs, make data-driven decisions, and turn insights into tangible marketing solutions. jobTitle: Account Manager 客户经理（应届毕业生）
description: Position Summary: The position of Account Manager is responsible for developing new business relationships and serving as the first level of support to existing clients.  We look for and appreciate anyone who is willing to roll up their sleeves and get stuck in. Our sales professionals are solution explorers, working to identify prospective client solutions while maintaining positive relationships with existing clients — all while having fun!  If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you! We have over 100 offices worldwide but this particular opportunity is based in our APAC Headquarter, Hong Kong. We offer career development and a fast growth path, full training around our services, and  TransPerfect is far from “just a translation agency”. Our services portfolio covers everything from business support services such as interpretation, multicultural and digital marketing, SEO and website globalization to multimedia work, video, e-learning and training, and legal support services. All services and client partnerships are aided by best-in-breed software platforms, specialized in optimizing business processes.  Job Description:   Establish and maintain excellent relationships with clients, sales staff and production colleagues worldwide. Respond to client requests for new project initiatives. Collaborate with various members of the production and sales teams to assess the scope of work and produce cost estimates. Assess the competitive landscape, develop project proposals, negotiate budgets and schedules with the client. Monitor and communicate project progress, ensure strict adherence to deadlines and budgets and ultimately produce high quality deliverables. Take a proactive role in learning about clients’ industry, business needs and company culture, educating the project team, identifying new business opportunities and providing a high level of service. Responsible for growing new business from existing clients, including working closely with senior leadership to expand current relationships and upsell the TransPerfect portfolio. Creatively problem solve to improve current new business development strategy Educate prospective and existing clients regarding the translation process, including TransPerfect’s rates, justification for turnaround time, and competitors’ information Liaise with production to ensure that all jobs are handled appropriately and with keen attention to detail, resulting in a perfect product Consistently follow up with clients to ensure their satisfaction with delivery, quality and customer service Understand all industries that TransPerfect markets to including industry leaders, current events and any other pertinent data Perform other special projects or duties when required  Required Skills:   Excellent written and verbal English communication skills Minimum Bachelor's degree or equivalent Excellent problem solving and analytical skills Strong interpersonal skills Effective time management

jobTitle: FY22 Trainee CCDP 商业人才职业发展计划（CS Sales Chengdu）
description: 项目信息：  该项目是通过系统化的高效培训和实践，培养优秀应届毕业生或毕业1-2年的高潜力人才成为西门子医疗的商务精英。 该项目将通过入职引导帮助培训生了解公司战略、企业文化和关键业务流程，还将通过一系列的产品知识培训和专业技能培训帮助培训生熟悉医学影像/体外诊断业务领域和提升综合能力。此外，还将通过带教机制锻炼培训生的一线销售能力和商务敏感度。  该项目将根据实际业务需求在医学影像售前、售后服务以及大客户管理团队进行轮岗。  让我们一起助力医疗服务提供者提升价值，改善患者体验、推进精准医疗、转化诊疗模式、实现数字化医疗!  你的职责是：  以客户为中心，积极维护客户关系，开发客户需求 根据客户需求提供产品和服务解决方案，达成销售目标 与客户保持持续和有效的沟通交流，以维持高水平的客户满意度 积极参与所负责区域的市场活动，向客户推广西门子医疗品牌形象及公司价值 维护商业渠道，与商业伙伴建立可信赖的合作关系 积极协调跨部门合作，确保项目顺利实施  要成功应聘本职位，你应当具备以下技能和经验：  2022年毕业，本科及以上学历，理工、商科类相关专业 工作富有激情并把医疗行业销售作为今后的职业发展方向 具备自我驱动力，渴求成功 积极主动，业务及人际敏感度高，优秀的沟通能力 时间管理能力，快速适应能力，拥有良好的自我激励和自主学习能力，良好的团队合作 良好的英文能力 愿意在不同的城市工作，具备一定的灵活性（除北京、上海、深圳，南京、成都、长沙、广州等省会城市或者其他二三线城市） 愿意长期在医疗领域发展并为影像技术、医学检验、医疗保健和医疗环境不断完善做贡献  加入项目，你将获得  职业发展：  对于刚入职的应届生，通过全方面的培训和学习，你将在短时间内掌握医学影像的产品及行业知识，为将来的职业发展打下坚实的基础。同时，带教形式将能帮助你快速熟悉市场和客户群体，在销售市场领域完成从萌新到职场精英的蜕变  公司内部多维度、多方向机会：  西门子医疗几乎所有业务都需要建立在对业务的了解基础上，成为一个优秀的销售后，可以在公司的市场、销售、产品管理等多部门探寻自己的横向/纵向发展机会  Organization: Siemens Healthineers  Company: Siemens Healthineers Ltd.  Experience Level: Recent College Graduate  Job Type: Full-time

Sales Intern, Supply or Demand  Vungle is the way developers put video ads in their apps. Globally, we provide advertisers and publishers a way to monetize mobile apps. We have been growing rapidly since our product was released in June 2012, gaining traction with brands, agencies and app developers alike.  Since launching, Vungle has been aiming to power the in-application mobile video advertising ecosystem by helping developers win valuable new users, brands to deliver impactful advertising messages, and publishers to earn sustained increased revenue across their content.  Throughout the year, Vungle’s Beijing Sales team has opportunities for interns in both our Supply (Publisher) and Demand (Advertiser) sales teams. This internship opportunity gives amazing insight into how Vungle helps both publisher and advertiser clients make money.  We welcome interested candidates who can commit to a 5-6 month internship period to apply and talk with us at any time!  Responsibilities Support Account Executive/ Manager with client relationships management Assist in developing client monthly business review reports and weekly data processing Conduct market research on new market opportunities Maintain key domestic and international partners relationships over SKYPE, WeChat, and QQ Assist Account Manager to optimize placements opportunities Assist Account Manager with internal and external reporting Assist Account Manager to give creative insights to clients Onboarding of new clients Qualifications College students in junior / senior year / postgraduate student and be able to work 3-4 days a week Interested in online/mobile advertising industry and app economy. Related industry knowledge or experience is a plus Mobile game player is a plus. Excellent in written English, basic fluency in speaking Strong analytical and quantitative skills with working knowledge of Excel/Word/PPT Ability to multitask, manage prioritize and produce results quickly Excellent communication skills to effectively report findings and influence change Attention to detail and excellent organizational skills We Provide Flexible working environment Excellent international team Opportunity to understand the internet video advertising industry Free and unlimited snacks and drinks About Vungle  Vungle is the trusted guide for growth and engagement, transforming how people discover and experience apps. Mobile application developers partner with Vungle to monetize their apps through innovative in-app ad experiences that are inspired by insight and crafted with creativity. Advertisers depend on Vungle to reach, acquire, and retain high-value users worldwide. Vungle develops tools that include data-led buying and UX recommendations, ad format innovation, creative automation, and more. Vungle's data-optimized ads run on over 1 billion unique devices to drive engagement and increase returns for publishers and advertisers ranging from indie studios to powerhouse brands, including Rovio, Zynga, Pandora, and Microsoft. The company is headquartered in San Francisco and has offices around the world in London, Berlin, Beijing, Tokyo, Seoul, and Singapore. For more information, visit www.vungle.com or follow the company on Twitter @Vungle  Agency And Third Party Recruiter Notice  Vungle does not accept unsolicited resumes from individual recruiters or third-party recruiting agencies in response to job postings. No fee will be paid to third parties who submit unsolicited candidates directly to our hiring managers or Recruiting Team. All candidates must be submitted via our Applicant Tracking System by approved Vungle vendors who have been expressly requested to make a submission by our Recruiting Team for a specific job opening. No placement fees will be paid to any firm unless such a request has been made by the Vungle Recruiting Team and such candidate was submitted to the Vungle Recruiting Team via our Applicant Tracking System.  1

jobTitle: 2022 Equities Sales Analyst Summer Internship Program in China
description: We Offer  Join us as a China summer analyst in our Equities franchise! This is a 10-week program designed to give students a taste of life at the world’s leading integrated Wealth Manager and Investment Bank, with the potential to join the Graduate Program.  Over the course of the internship you will make valuable contributions to the bank’s work, develop skills, expand your knowledge and grow in confidence. Your participation in the real-world business challenges presented by Sales and Trading across multiple markets in real-time will allow you to expand your experience and build valuable networks across the wider firm.  Program elements include: One day orientation followed by first week training Mid-term and final review to gauge your progress vs. your objectives Summer speaker series where you'll hear from senior representatives across different divisions Mentorship from an experienced member of the business A balance of work, social events and networking opportunities  The Sales internship is based in Shanghai and the Trading Internship in Shenzhen.  Submit your application and complete the online assessments by October 30, 2021.  Your field of responsibility  This will be a structured program in the Equities sales or trading business. There will be invaluable hands-on and shadowing experience to enhance your personal development.  Throughout you will receive invaluable on-the-job training, guidance and mentoring that will further develop your skills and knowledge.  Your future colleagues  Be part of the dynamic and innovative environment that is the trading floor, delivering outstanding investment solutions to our global institutional client base. Equities, with its global distribution and reach, is core to the Asia Pacific business model in delivering long-lasting value to our clients.  We are a department which values Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) and is committed to realizing the firm’s D&I ambition which is an integral part of our global cultural values.  You Offer  You will be graduating between December 2022 – June 2023 with an undergraduate or post graduate degree and must be available between June – August 2022. Whatever your background, you have keen interest in financial markets!  You have: Proficient written and spoken communication skills in English and Mandarin Familiarity of coding languages, statistics, or mathematics is valued Excellent analytical skills, initiative, and a proven problem solver Experience working in a team, collaborating with others to achieve strong results  You understand the value of diversity in the workplace and dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture in all aspects of working life so that people from all backgrounds are treated equally and can bring their full, authentic selves to work to realize their full potential.  China - Mainland-Shanghai-Shanghai

If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you! We have over 100 offices worldwide but this particular opportunity is based in our APAC Headquarter, Hong Kong. We offer career development and a fast growth path, full training around our services, and  TransPerfect is far from “just a translation agency”. Our services portfolio covers everything from business support services such as interpretation, multicultural and digital marketing, SEO and website globalization to multimedia work, video, e-learning and training, and legal support services. All services and client partnerships are aided by best-in-breed software platforms, specialized in optimizing business processes.  Job Description:   Establish and maintain excellent relationships with clients, sales staff and production colleagues worldwide. Respond to client requests for new project initiatives. Collaborate with various members of the production and sales teams to assess the scope of work and produce cost estimates. Assess the competitive landscape, develop project proposals, negotiate budgets and schedules with the client. Monitor and communicate project progress, ensure strict adherence to deadlines and budgets and ultimately produce high quality deliverables. Take a proactive role in learning about clients’ industry, business needs and company culture, educating the project team, identifying new business opportunities and providing a high level of service. Responsible for growing new business from existing clients, including working closely with senior leadership to expand current relationships and upsell the TransPerfect portfolio. Creatively problem solve to improve current new business development strategy Educate prospective and existing clients regarding the translation process, including TransPerfect’s rates, justification for turnaround time, and competitors’ information Liaise with production to ensure that all jobs are handled appropriately and with keen attention to detail, resulting in a perfect product Consistently follow up with clients to ensure their satisfaction with delivery, quality and customer service Understand all industries that TransPerfect markets to including industry leaders, current events and any other pertinent data Perform other special projects or duties when required  Required Skills:   Excellent written and verbal English communication skills Minimum Bachelor's degree or equivalent Excellent problem solving and analytical skills Strong interpersonal skills Effective time management
jobFunction: Sales, Business Development, and Customer Service

description: Kempinski Hotel Yinchuan is superbly located in Yinchuan, the capital of the Western Xia Empire. Kempinski Hotel Yinchuan brings the traditional taste of luxury to this remarkable city as the first and only five-star international brand in Yinchuan, situated in the heart of the city’s central business district, Jinfeng District, and only a 30-minute drive from Yinchuan Hedong Airport. The hotel is adjacent to the International Conference and Exhibition Centre and Museum of Ningxia and close to the Science and Technology Museum and the People’s Square. Kempinski Hotel Yinchuan is ideal for both business and leisure travelers.  Front Office Management Trainee  Under the guidance of the Front Office Manager assess, evaluate and ensure that long-term and short-term of the department are met. Support and assist Front Office and all Departments in the hotel to ensure a smooth, prompt and effective service to all guests.  Key Responsibilities Ensures the smooth running of the operations on a day to day basis and in a pro active manner. Ensures that as per Kempinski Health & Safety Policy the Fire Exits are free of obstacles. Support and assist all Front Office sections. Ensures that all guests receives prompt, cordial attention and personal recognition and resolves related problems. Inform and co-ordinate with other operating departments e.g. Housekeeping, Engineering, Sales and Butlers of Front Office matters which may concern them. Check all correspondence of the day’s arrivals to familiarize with arrived and arriving guests and their needs, follows up as required. Control room availability for walk-ins and established accountability for guests departure dates and times. Follow up with Housekeeping any unresolved room discrepancies. Maintain reservation procedures, same day arrivals. Check all arrivals folios, follows up on credit standing of walk-in guests and validity of account to company instructions. Check all billing instructions and guest credit for accuracy. Follow up and resolve related issues. Maintains appropriate standards of conduct, dress, uniforms, hygiene, appearance and posture for all departmental employees. Ensures that all departmental information is kept accurately and up to date. Promotes in house sales and facilities to maximize hotel revenues. Understand and carries out duties in line with Hotel Emergency Procedure Inspects Front and Back of house for cleanliness, Health & Safety and reports any faults to concerned departments. Co-ordinates/Assists security personnel in all related matters. Responds promptly to any operational requests from Front Office and other hotel departments. Attends to referred and unsolved problematic situations. Co-ordinates and assists with accommodation and transportation of guests in overbooked situations.Completes VIP, delegations and group leaders welcome and farewell as appropriate. Conduct efficient hand-over with coming Manager. Innovation project to increase hardware and software of the hotel for improvement and upgrade Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the hotel. We are dedicated to please, educated to entertain, and we never compromise on the European elegance of service. We pride ourselves on delivering a beautiful performance for each and every one of our guests. And for our employees, we provide a stage on which they can flourish and realise their full potential. About The Job  Disclaimer: This position is expected to start from July 2021 and continue through the entire through December if available. We ask for a minimum of 12 weeks, full-time, for most internships. Please consider before submitting an application.  Internship Program at Tesla  The Internship Recruiting Team is driven by the passion to recognize emerging talent. Our year around program places the best students in positions that they will grow both technically and personally through their experience working closely with their Manager, Mentor, and team. We are dedicated to providing an experience that allows for the intern to experience life at Tesla by given them projects that are critical to their team’s success.  About The Teams  Tesla is looking for talented, highly motivated university students for our various applications engineering teams to continue to be at the forefront of building a consistent and trustworthy experience across all touch points from digital, sales & service, infrastructure engineering, factory software, to internal application touch points and much more! Our support engineers are helping our operations by supporting varied in-house applications.  As You Continue To Discover Your Passion And Strengths In Navigating Your Career Path, You Can Be Part Of One Of Our Internship Programs Within The Following Application Support Teams   Factory Software – Focus on supporting General Assembly in all automotive lines at the Tesla Factories   Enterprise Resource Planning – Focus on system software development from Purchasing to Sales, Logistics and Delivery to Inventory & Costing and much more   Digital Experience - Focus on customer experience interaction from tesla.com to the Tesla App   Financial Platforms – Focusing on Tesla financial platforms   Service and Customer support – Focus on the interaction and experience of the end user from phone/road assistance, to service centers, to body repair shops to name a few  Responsibilities   Responsible for assigning all customer technical inquiries, including technical assistance, best use of product, additional products and services.   Provides outstanding customer service to Tesla Motors application users.   Provides second level technical solutions, according to established service levels.   Offers a single point of contact and ensures that all application support requests are recorded in a timely, courteous, and accurate manner.   Escalates issues within the IT department to ensure issues that cannot be addressed at first level are responded to timely, working to maximum uptime for customers.   Follow-up on tickets resolved by internal IT teams to ensure communication to the customer with high degree of satisfaction based on results and level of service.   Liaison for Level III Information Technology development support.   Executes monitors and completes assigned tasks on multiple computer systems and platforms.   Documents and maintains shift documentation in ticket management system.   Work closely with the business and IT counterparts and Leads in ensuring timely resolution of issues.  Requirements   Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or equivalent degree   SQL and reporting skills   Knowledge of operating production software   Well Developed Multi-tasking Capabilities And Experience Under Pressure   Ability to thrive in an extremely fast paced environment   Communication skills: the ability to both express and understand technical problems   Programming skills in a scripting language is a big plus, Python or Golang preferred   Able to communicate in English
