jobTitle: Management Trainee Program - Client Success Function (2022 intake)
description: Location:  Gopher Center (歌斐中心), Huangpu District, Shanghai    About Our Program  Our Management Trainee Program is designed to equip you for a successful career in the SAAS industry by giving you real exposure to clients right at the start of your career and preparing you for leadership responsibility in our Greater China team.  It is a structured program with a clear career path from entry level through to management.  We strongly believe in promoting from within and this program is how we build our leadership team for the long run.  We focus on developing people quickly from individual contributor to leadership and your rate of progression is determined by your own pace of learning and development.    What do we offer? Meltwater University - You will receive comprehensive training on our principles, values, products, sales methodology and industry specific knowledge through classroom, on the job training and online learning Sponsorship from Meltwater leadership team - You will have access to senior leadership both on a local and regional level.  We pride ourselves on a flat hierarchy and our leadership will be available to you. Regular goal setting and feedback session - You will receive regular support from your manager who will act as your mentor, providing regular feedback and coaching as your progress through the program. Stages of the Program  At each stage of the program, you will be making a real impact on our business by contributing directly to the growth and development of our client base. As you progress through the program you’ll also be directly responsible for developing and nurturing talent for the business  Phase 1: Client Success Analyst (Duration 3-6 Months)  Key Learning: How to support clients needs and learning about account management through shadowing a manager  Phase 2: Client Success Representative (Duration 12-18 Months)  Key Learning: Through owning your own portfolio, you’ll learn the full client lifecycle from onboarding through to renewal.  Phase 3: Client Success Manager (Duration 12-24 Months)  Key Learning: How to motivate and teach a team of 1-2 reps, managing team targets.  Phase 4: Managing Director (Duration 24 Months+)  Key Learning: Running a business unit, reporting to executive team, leading strategy and recruitment.  What We’re Looking For A minimum bachelor’s degree in any subject with evidence of high achievement in academics and extracurricular activities. Work experience in any client facing roles Fluent in written and spoken English & Cantonese or Mandarin Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Team player mentality with the ability to work independently toward lofty goals Well-rounded with varied interests, background, and proven leadership experience Passionate about entrepreneurship and business Have strong interest in news and current affairs A quick learner that opens to feedback and dedicate to consistent self-improvement   What We Offer Uncapped commission scheme, there’s no limit on what you could earn Prizes, competitions, and additional sales incentives. 20 Days paid holidays Comprehensive training program. New hire training programs, conference, seminar, up skill session, business case sharing session for your personal and professional growth Fun, ambitious and international working environment Team activities and events About Us  Founded in 2001, headquartered in San Francisco, Meltwater is the global leading AI-powered media monitoring, social listening & PR Analytics software. Our mission is to help companies make better and more informed decisions. With over 2000 employees and 55 offices globally, we help over 30,000 companies to stay on top of billions of online conversations, extract valuable data, and consult our clients to transform their businesses in this new digital reality.  Meltwater is recognized as a great place to work for talents globally. We have won several Top Employer awards worldwide and most recently been accredited as “Asia's Best Multinational Workplaces”, “Best Companies to Work For in Hong Kong”, “Best Companies to Work For in Greater China” by Great Place to Work™.  Meltwater operates the Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology (MEST), a nonprofit organization devoted to nurturing future generations of entrepreneurs. MEST has invested over $20million into training 400+ individual entrepreneurs and invested in over 50 early stage tech startups. Learn more about us on https://www.meltwater.com/ and https://outsideinsight.com/

jobTitle: Management Trainee Program - Client Acquisition Function (2022 intake)
description: Location:  Gopher Center (歌斐中心), Huangpu District, Shanghai    About Our Program  Our Management Trainee Program is designed to equip you for a successful career in the SAAS industry by giving you real exposure to clients right at the start of your career and preparing you for leadership responsibility in our Greater China team.  It is a structured program with a clear career path from entry level through to management.  We strongly believe in promoting from within and this program is how we build our leadership team for the long run.  We focus on developing people quickly from individual contributor to leadership and your rate of progression is determined by your own pace of learning and development.    What do we offer? Meltwater University - You will receive comprehensive training on our principles, values, products, sales methodology and industry specific knowledge through classroom, on the job training and online learning Sponsorship from Meltwater leadership team - You will have access to senior leadership both on a local and regional level.  We pride ourselves on a flat hierarchy and our leadership will be available to you. Regular goal setting and feedback session - You will receive regular support from your manager who will act as your mentor, providing regular feedback and coaching as your progress through the program. Stages of the Program  At each stage of the program, you will be making a real impact on our business by contributing directly to the growth and development of our client base. As you progress through the program you’ll also be directly responsible for developing and nurturing talent for the business  Phase 1: Business Development Representative (Duration 3-6 Months)  Key Learning: How to identify strong prospects and setting meetings  Phase 2: Business Development Consultant (Duration 12-18 Months)  Key Learning: Through leading your own sales pipe, you’ll learn the full sales cycle from initial call through to client & onboarding.  Phase 3: Business Development Manager (Duration 12-24 Months)  Key Learning: How to motivate and teach a team of 1-2 consultants, managing team targets  Phase 4: Managing Director (Duration 24 Months+)  Key Learning: Running a business unit, reporting to executive team, leading strategy and recruitment.  What We’re Looking For A minimum Bachelor’s degree in any subject with evidence of high achievement in academics and extracurricular activities. Work experience in any client facing roles Fluent in written and spoken English & Cantonese or Mandarin Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Team player mentality with the ability to work independently toward lofty goals Well rounded with varied interests, background and proven leadership experience Passionate about entrepreneurship and business Have strong interest in news and current affairs A quick learner that open to feedback and dedicate to consistent self-improvement   What We Offer Uncapped commission scheme, there’s no limit on what you could earn Prizes, competitions, and additional sales incentives. 20 Days paid holidays Comprehensive training program. New hire training programs, conference, seminar, up skill session, business case sharing session for your personal and professional growth Fun, ambitious and international working environment Team activities and events About Us  Founded in 2001, headquartered in San Francisco, Meltwater is the global leading AI-powered media monitoring, social listening & PR Analytics software. Our mission is to help companies make better and more informed decisions. With over 2000 employees and 55 offices globally, we help over 30,000 companies to stay on top of billions of online conversations, extract valuable data, and consult our clients to transform their businesses in this new digital reality.  Meltwater is recognized as a great place to work for talents globally. We have won several Top Employer awards worldwide and most recently been accredited as “Asia's Best Multinational Workplaces”, “Best Companies to Work For in Hong Kong”, “Best Companies to Work For in Greater China” by Great Place to Work™.  Meltwater operates the Meltwater Entrepreneurial School of Technology (MEST), a nonprofit organization devoted to nurturing future generations of entrepreneurs. MEST has invested over $20million into training 400+ individual entrepreneurs and invested in over 50 early stage tech startups. Learn more about us on https://www.meltwater.com/ and https://outsideinsight.com/

Kempinski Hotel Chongqing  Conveniently connected to the Chongqing International Convention & Exhibition Centre, a 30 minute drive from Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport. The hotel features 416 rooms and suites, and offers guests a variety of dining choices. Five innovative food and beverage options include, Elements All Day Dining Restaurant, Guo Hui Yan Chinese Restaurant, Paulaner Brauhaus, The Lounge and the Kempi Deli. For meetings and weddings, a 650 sqm Ballroom and 6 luxuriously appointed meeting-and boardrooms are available.  Management Trainee  The Management Trainee supervises all operational aspects of a specific outlet within the Food & Beverage Department including the development and performance management of colleagues, optimizing profits and increasing sales. Resumes full responsibility of a specific shift as assigned and has a hands-on approach. He/She leads by example by actively assisting in the running of meal periods towards the achievement of high guest satisfaction.  Key Responsibilities Learn and assist manager to maintain departemnt normal operation. Learn and assist manager to manage the team. Coordinate annual projects and interact with customers. Learn the skills of training and communication. Additional responsibilities and tasks can be added at any time according to the needs of the business and of the hotel.  Desired Skills & Qualifications English – excellent oral and written skills Knowledge of FO. Work permit needed. At least 12 months internship. Bachelor degree at least. Hospitality management related major. Graduated with master’s diploma but haven’t work within one year. Excellent performance in university. Germans or Europeans are preferred About Kempinski At Kempinski Hotels we provide ourselves on delivering a beautiful performance for each and every one of our guests. Dedicated to please, educated to entertain and never compromising on the European elegance of service, we are driven by our passion for crafting distinct and meaningful experiences. Each of our remarkable properties is a stage upon which our people perform their best and every day is an opportunity to apply their unique talents. We offer recognition for your skills, an environment that encourages personal growth, and respect and support from colleagues and leaders. Connected by our shared values, our passion for craftsmanship, and our care for one another, we are a global community of hoteliers. Your stage awaits. Discover a career crafted by you.  Organization  Kempinski Hotel Chongqing China  Primary Location  China-Chongqing  Job Type  Regular  Schedule  Full-time  Shift  Day Job  Job Posting  Apr 6, 2021  Unposting Date  Ongoing

description: Primary Purpose  The Sales Training Specialist is responsible for ensuring sales learning offerings to be delivered correctly, effectively and in time, providing support on learning offering operation and management, analyzing data to better provide solutions to employee in effective way.  Typical Duties Support to conduct the annual training survey and competency assessment and support to implement the annual sales training plan Support sales enablement initiatives and programs and daily work to ensure a good delivery, including proper communication and on-site workshop/training to ensure the activity runs smoothly when needed Handle sales training administration/logistics: scheduling, email communication, pre and post-training survey, enrolment monitoring, material preparation, training venue setup etc. Coordinate with training stakeholders and vendors on training request submission, needs clarification and communication. Responsible for contracting and payment process. Be responsible for sales training and activity data and materials and record management, including data collection, analysis and reporting. Prepare and conduct on site/online trainings, followed up with result tracking Manage the E-Learning platform including courses management, upload, maintenance, promotion and result tracking Support to design assessment tool to track and monitor behavioral and/or technical change Support any projects that are assigned by the line manager Requirements Bachelor’s degree required in Business/Science/Finance/Economics or other appropriate discipline. At least 1 years of learning & development, sales training and training program execution experience Fast learner, self-motivated, reliable, logical and organized Proactive and passionate about learning and development Good oral and written English Have good interpersonal communication skills Be willing and good at hearing people out widely Excellent office skills, especially on PPT and excel Good at Adobe photoshop/illustrator Graphic Design ability is a plus About Clarios  Clarios is a world leader in advanced energy storage solutions. We partner with our customers to meet increasing market demand for smarter applications, on a global scale. Our 16,000 employees develop, manufacture and distribute a portfolio of evolving battery technologies for virtually every type of vehicle. Technologies that deliver uniquely sustainable, next-generation performance, and bring reliability, safety and comfort to everyday lives. We add value at every link in the supply chain, contributing to the progress of the communities we serve and the planet we all share. As a 2020 signatory of the United Nations Global Compact, Clarios is committed to aligning our strategies and operations with universal principles focused on human rights, labor, environment and anti-corruption. Clarios is a subsidiary of Brookfield Business Partners, a business services and industrials company focused on owning and operating high-quality businesses that benefit from barriers to entry and/or low production costs.  To all recruitment agencies: Clarios does not accept unsolicited agency resumes/CVs. Please do not forward resumes/CVs to our careers email addresses, Clarios employees or any other company location. Clarios is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/CVs.  Clarios, LLC is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. For more information, please view EEO is the Law, EEO is the Law (supplement), and Pay Transparency Non-discrimination. If you are an individual with a disability and you require an accommodation during the application process, please email Special.Accommodations@Clarios.com.

职位来源于实习僧。  【RCC销售是干嘛的】  1、 产品是信息互联网平台，主要协助客户发现商机，找到合作来源，同时有利于客户控制成本，提高效率，与客户利益直接挂钩；  2、 作为B2B信息服企业，我们服务的主要有开发商（包括万达、恒大、绿地等）、建材商（包括ABB、飞利浦、格力等大型企业），设计院，施工单位，政府单位等，沟通对象都是职场精英；  3、 因为我们是互联网产品，客户遍布全国，谈单主要是通过电话销售和邮件往来，也会上门拜访当地客户；  4、 关于客户资源，公司的CRM系统能提供丰富的客户来源也可以在公司资源的基础上自己进行搜索开发新的客户资源。  【对销售的要求】  1、 大专及以上学历，专业不限，普通话很重要；  2、 有销售实习经验尤佳；  3、 作为21世纪新人类，必须懂得办公三把斧（office，Email，Internet）；  【RCC的有什么福利】  我们坚信福利就是员工的战斗力！：  1、 购买“五险一金”，每年享受健康体检；  2、 除了所有正常法定节假日以外，每年享受带薪年假7天，普通员工可以享受10天年假，同时享有带薪福利病假；  3、 奖项丰富：年终奖、忠诚员工奖、业务精英奖、员工奖、园丁奖、全勤奖、人才推荐奖；  4、 丰富多彩的员工活动：业务精英海外游（新加坡、普吉岛、韩国都留下我们的足迹）、部门活动、半年度旅游或者拓展、RCC活动日、年夜饭晚会及抽奖、员工表彰等；  5、 福利多多：过节礼品、生子礼品、生日礼品、下午茶；  6、 人性化关怀，为员工的父母寄送感恩礼品，员工提供哺乳间，贴心！！  7、每周五天八小时，周末双休，朝九晚六；  8、公司额外提供员工补充医疗保障计划；  职位薪资：  150-300/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.rccchina.com

We’re building a movement - an education revolution.  We’re building a world where anyone, anywhere can have access to the best education regardless of where they were born. At our core, we believe education is a right, not a privilege. To that end, we’re building a company and a suite of products to lead the charge in transforming access to education.  ApplyBoard is an online platform that empowers students around the world to access the best education by connecting international students, recruitment partners, and academic institutions. We simplify the study abroad search, application, and acceptance process. Not only do we help students with their study abroad journey, but we also help academic institutions to find the best students globally. Our goal is to help enable better, more diverse, schools that are enriched with cultures from all over the world.  The Role  We are looking for an experienced, well connected, organized and International Student Recruitment Manager in Mainland China to join our growing Sales team and take our company and platform to the next level!  In this role, you will:  Represent the ApplyBoard brand to promote ApplyBoard services to recruitment partners, international educators, and prospective students Increase international student enrolment at ApplyBoard by recruiting international students from diverse regions Negotiate terms of engagement, provide training to recruitment partners and their staff, and keep the recruitment partner contacts engaged with ApplyBoard through regular communication Undergo presentations in the local marketplace to further promote ApplyBoard Train and guide recruitment partners to improve the quality and volume of international applicants, ensuring top quality Disseminate communications and activities online using CRM and social media platforms including delivering key messages and encouraging engagement from potential and current students Implement marketing and recruitment strategies through research and market analysis to maximize international student outreach Proactively undergo recruitment partners outreach  Qualifications:  Minimum 2 years of international student recruitment experience for secondary and/or post-secondary institutions Post-secondary education or equivalent experience Exceptional communication, verbal and written skills Autonomous self-starter, with the ability to work independently within a team-based environment Aptitude for prioritizing tasks with an attention to detail to ensure information accuracy Exceptional problem-solving skills under ambiguous circumstances to ensure you provide the best outcome for our students while maintaining integrity with our partner relationships Experience working with educational consultants and or postsecondary institutions directly; considered a bonus Experience working with a CRM (HubSpot); considered an asset  Life at ApplyBoard:  By joining our team, you have the opportunity to be part of one of the fastest-growing technology companies, not only in Canada but the world. With that, you will have many opportunities for professional growth and advancement. Work alongside a globally diverse team of more than 1,000 team members from 25+ countries , representing 30+ nationalities , and speaking 50+ languages.  Make a difference in the lives of thousands of students as they explore educational opportunities.  About ApplyBoard:  ApplyBoard empowers students around the world to access the best education by simplifying the study abroad search, application, and acceptance process to more than 1,500 institutions across Canada, Australia, the United States, and the United Kingdom. ApplyBoard, headquartered in Kitchener, Ontario, Canada, has helped more than 200,000 students from more than 125 countries along their educational journeys since 2015.  ApplyBoard was named the fastest-growing technology company in Canada by Deloitte, ranking #1 on the Technology Fast 50™ list in 2019 and #2 in 2020. ApplyBoard was also been named to LinkedIn’s list of Top Startups in 2020 and TechTO’s list of top Canadian Rocketship companies to accelerate your career in the Tech Industry.  In 2021, ApplyBoard announced a C$375M Series D funding on a C$4B valuation. This funding will allow us to further invest in our technology, grow our team around the world, and serve more students on our mission to educate the world. Thank you for your interest in ApplyBoard. Please note that only qualified applicants that have been selected for an interview will be contacted.

This is Energizer Holdings, Inc.  At Energizer Holdings, we are passionate about bringing our brands and products to the world better than anyone else. It’s our passion and drive that makes us proud stewards of iconic brands including AC/Pro, Armor All, Energizer, Rayovac and STP, part of our broad portfolio of products that millions of consumers know, trust, and rely on every day.  When you come to work here, you’ll quickly see that we love what we do, we care about each other, and we continuously learn and improve to meet the needs of our customers and consumers around the world.  We have talented colleagues around the world with varied skillsets, backgrounds and experiences, and we embrace this diversity because it’s a big part of what helps us deliver results to grow the company. Whatever your specialty, you'll find that excelling at Energizer provides opportunities to grow in ways you never expected. We support flexible working arrangements whenever possible.  Position Summary  In this new position, you will be part of the China eCommerce team, which is part of the Global Digital Economy organization within Energizer Holdings.  As an ecommerce coordinator, you play an important role to support the team in sales and operations support. You get access to the latest trend in China ecommerce, cope with the changes in the market and can get lots of learnings from Energizer big family.  Accountabilities  Support The ECommerce Team In Sales And Operations Daily liaison with both internal team and distributor to ensure smooth operations of the eCommerce platforms Compile and distribute routine reports to monitor necessary KPIs Assist on the documents preparation for new product launch and product version upgrade by coordinating with global & local team Follow up on after sales services & report preparation and analyse consumer insights. Keep track on the competitor actions in the market Provide administrative support to eCommerce Team Perform ad-hoc duties as assigned Required Skills and Experience Current students, 2022 graduate students are preferred. Chemistry related major is a plus Proactively and can work under pressure, good teamwork player with excellent communication skills and interpersonal skills Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese Willing to learn Preferred Skills and Experience Current students, 2022 graduate master’s degree students are preferred. Heavy user of eCommerce Interested in study new trend or technology of digital world Working Relationships & Environment Sits in China eCommerce team and a member of the Digital Economy Team, which reports into the Commercial organization Reports to the Senior eCommerce Business Account Manager Collaborates with a large number of cross-functional stakeholders including other internal Digital Economy team members (e.g., content, media, analytics), Supply Chain, Finance, Commercial team (e.g., channel conflict management), Legal, Regulatory and Marketing Position can but does not need to be office-based An Offer to Grow On  Come join us!  Energizer offers a competitive total rewards package which includes a range of health, wellness and retirement savings coverage, paid time off and holidays, and many opportunities to learn, develop and grow. At Energizer, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute and make an impact every single day.  Energizer is an equal opportunity employer, and we prohibit discrimination based on age, color, disability, marital or parental status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other legally protected status in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws.

F&B Management Trainee - Kempinski Hotel Hangzhou  The overall scope of the job includes serving food and beverages to guests in the assigned place of work, providing a courteous, professional, efficient and flexible service consistent with the standards of the hotel and Kempinski in order to encourage sales and maximize guest satisfaction.  Key Responsibilities Assist in departmental training and assessments Be alive to new ideas and system which could benefit the department and hotel Handle guest requests and takes personal responsibility to ensure request is met by following up with relevant departments Responds immediately on medical requests and emergencies Assist in investigating and resolving written guest complaints Maintain good and smooth guest relations, builds rapport and offer personalized service and assistance Assist other departments in resolving problems when necessary. Supervise work operations of the department Resolve disputes Deliver high quality service to guests Ensure guest needs and reasonable requests are met Seek opportunities to continually improve guest service Take appropriate action to resolve guest complaints Maintain a high level of product and service knowledge in order to explain and sell services and facilities to guests Adhere to the hotel’s and emergency policies and procedures Be familiar with property safety, current first aid and fire emergency procedures Desired Skills & Qualifications Work experience in F&B in another 5 Star Hotel for more than 1 year. Familiar with Chinese/Western Restaurant/ Banquet service process Good Western/Chinese restaurant knowledge of food & set-up Good wine knowledge & service skill Good skills in handling guest complaints Ability in staffing management College degree or above, major in Hotel Management or Tourism Management Excellent English skills (written & verbal) Computer operation and familiarity with Microsoft office&Word&Excel& PPT Good leadership skills / good communication skills /Strong organization skills Open minded and outgoing personality About Kempinski  At Kempinski Hotels we pride ourselves on delivering a beautiful performance for each and every one of our guests. Dedicated to please, educated to entertain and never compromising on the European elegance of service, we are driven by our passion for crafting distinct and meaningful experiences. Connected by our shared values, our passion for craftsmanship, and our care for one another, we are a global community of hoteliers. Your stage awaits.  Discover a career crafted by you. jobTitle: 大客户销售经理（B2B互联网行业）
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  1、 产品为面向企业客户的互联网信息服务，我们采用顾问式销售模式；需要具备良好的分析能力，针对客户痛点、难点和需求点，提供相关产品方案和服务；  2、 专业的产品讲解能力；公司产品包含网站服务、APP、Saas软件，为客户提供一站式整体解决方案，需要具备优秀的产品演示能力，呈现公司的产品优势；  3、 熟练掌握电话营销技能；公司的销售模式是“电销+拜访”双模式，产品具有刚需性和专业性，无需盲打，需要全方位了解客户的组织结构和产品需求点；  4、 热爱销售工作，对结果有足够的要性；产品成交单额皆上万，销售提成点高；产品为高增值的服务，只要要性十足，没有业绩天花板！  5、 刚需性产品+垂直领域冠军，无明显淡旺季之分，无需体验过山车式的薪酬变化。  岗位要求：  1、 本科及以上学历  2、 有销售或客户服务经验  3、 欢迎优秀应届毕业生；  4、 沟通流畅，乐观积极，能够适应快节奏、高效率的工作环境；  5、 认真踏实、专注且有韧性，具有百折不挠的精神；  6、 团队合作能力强，善于向其他团队成员学习并乐于分享；  专业的培训系统：  1、 你一进 RCC，你就被培训部“盯上”了，他们会打造重新“做”人的培训计划；  2、 公司培训部提供系统化的入职培训（2-3周，免费带薪）；  3、 团队给你配备一名师傅，实行师徒制传带教模式；  4、 主管绩效仅与团队业绩挂钩，全力扶持员工业绩提升；  5、 公司精心研发 E-learning 系统，体系化，科学化学习，记录你成长的点点滴滴。  福利多多：  1、 入职签订正式劳动合同。按国家规定购买“五险一金”，每年享受健康体检；  2、 每周五天八小时，周末双休，上午 9:00-下午 6：00，中午 12:00-13:00 休息。  3、每年享受带薪年假 7 天，***可以享受 14 天年假，享有带薪福利病假，所有法定节假日均提供假期等；  4、奖项丰富：年终奖、忠诚员工奖、业务精英奖、全勤奖、人才推荐奖；  5、福利多多：过节礼品、生子礼品、生日礼品、下午茶；公司为入职满2年的员工购买补充医疗保险；  6、丰富多彩的员工活动：业务精英海外游 （新加坡、韩国、迪拜、塞班岛都留下我们的足迹） 、部门活动、半年度旅游或者拓展、年度晚会、优秀员工表彰等；  职位薪资：  250-500/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.rccchina.com

Overview  Abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life. Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, medical devices, nutritionals and branded generic medicines. Our 103,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries. Abbott has more than 6,000 employees in China, headquartered in Shanghai.  The purpose of the MBA Internship Programs is to create a talent pipeline for direct hire opportunities in commercial management positions in Core Diagnostics of Abbott China. Candidates should be currently enrolled in a reputable MBA program, and have demonstrated leadership skills, innovative and creative thinking, and analytical capabilities. MBA interns at Abbott are assigned to commercial leadership positions, including sales, marketing, or business development where they work to complete a project in a domestic market. Our MBA interns will work on a project that will impact the business and provide them with an overview of the healthcare industry. Assignments are approximately 8-12 weeks in length and include MBA Intern Week and final presentation of the project results to senior leaders, division executives and colleagues. The MBA Internship Program will provide you with access to industry experts, senior leadership and numerous networking opportunities throughout the summer.  Qualifications MBA candidate (completed 1st year by Summer 2021) from a reputable program, with an emphasis in sales, marketing, strategy or business operations Commitment of long-term career development in China after graduation of MBA 3 to 5+ years of work experience, exposure in the healthcare sector preferred Marketing, sales and/or project management experience in China Proven track record of accomplishments Experience in working in a team-oriented & collaborative environment Strong analytical and communication skills Leadership potential Proficient in Mandarin & English Candidates from Greater China preferred LOCATION  Shanghai, China

description: Job Description  Are you ready to seize a new opportunity within Danfoss? If so, then you might be our new Application Engineer at Danfoss. As Application Engineer for Danfoss you will support the products throughout the product life cycle, advice and support our customers from a technical point of view, as well as ensure that new potential opportunities are pursued and evaluated.  Job Responsibilities  Responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following. Offer technical support and consulting towards customers and sales Coordinate activities between sales, supply chain and engineering. Support and attend technical customer meetings. Identify and evaluate new opportunities for existing customers as well as prospects and sales. Background & Skills The ideal candidate will hold a degree in engineering and preferably 3+ years of experience. Alternatively, you may succeed as a recently graduated engineer with a passion and solid understanding for this specific area. You like the combination of the technical and commercial aspect of the job and thrive in an independent position. Creative, highly communicative and open-minded team player, who is willing to work to achieve team targets. Danfoss – Engineering Tomorrow  At Danfoss, we are engineering solutions that allow the world to use resources in smarter ways – driving the sustainable transformation of tomorrow. No transformation has ever been started without a group of passionate, dedicated and empowered people. We believe that innovation and great results are driven by the right mix of people with diverse backgrounds, personalities, skills, and perspectives, reflecting the world in which we do business. To make sure the mix of people works, we strive to create an inclusive work environment where people of all backgrounds are treated equally, respected, and valued for who they are. It is a strong priority within Danfoss to improve the health, working environment and safety of our employees.  Following our founder’s mindset ‘action speaks louder than words’, we set ourselves ambitious targets to protect the environment by embarking on a plan to become CO2 neutral latest by 2030.  Danfoss is an EO employer and VEVRAA Federal Contractor. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or other protected category.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Mechanical or Industrial Engineering

jobTitle: Business Developer Intern商务拓展实习
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  Job Title: Sales Representative Permanent/Intern, Full-time  Location: Xuhui, Shanghai Salary: Competitive  About Us  Coderbunker is a community of developers that provides engineering solutions for companies and individuals. Our unique business model allows companies to avoid the costly and lengthy process of hiring, providing companies with the flexibility to obtain engineering resources effectively and fast without the commitment of hiring full-time. We are trusted by a wide range of customers from large multinationals to thriving start-ups and entrepreneurs.  About Your Role：  As a Sales Representative, you are likely to spend your day to day ensure current customers have the right products and services, identify new markets and customer leads, and pitch prospective customers. The sales representative may also do everything from answering phones to monitoring the competition, all while maintaining good customer relations and pursuing new sales opportunities.  Responsibilities Reach out to customer leads through cold calling Present, promote and sell products and services using solid arguments to our existing and prospective customers Continuously improve through feedback and self-evaluation of your own work Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Economics or any other related field Strong English communication skills, both oral and writing; native Chinese speakers preferred Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the client needs Strong ability to document and analyze the sales flow Ability to work comfortably in a fast-paced environment Possess excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills Possess prospecting and closing skills Accountable and competitive What We Offer Career acceleration plan; opportunities for you to learn and grow fast Be part of a rapidly growing international company in Shanghai with opportunities to work with other growing startups and multinational technology companies Chance to solidify your understanding of the current state of the global Digital Ecosphere Sense of accomplishment in solving day-to-day challenges Learn the fundamentals and grow your marketing and sales abilities fast Attractive remuneration according to experience 关于我们:  Coderbunker是一个开发人员社区，为公司和个人提供工程解决方案。我们独特的业务模式使公司避免了昂贵且冗长的招聘过程，从而使公司可以灵活，高效，快速地获取工程资源，而无需全职招聘。从大型跨国公司到蓬勃发展的初创企业和企业家，我们得到了广泛客户的信赖。  关于商务拓展实习生职责：  寻找市场需求、梳理客户需求，寻找合作伙伴和合作媒体，推销潜在客户。商务拓展还可能负责所有事情，从接听电话到监视市场竞争，建立，发展和维持积极的业务和寻求新的销售机会。    要求： 拥有商业，市场营销，经济学或任何其他相关领域的学士学位 良好的英语口语和写作能力;母语为中文的人优先 强大的记录和分析销售流程的能力 能够在快节奏的环境中舒适地工作 具有良好的沟通和谈判能力 具备探矿和交易技巧 负责任和有竞争力 我们提供： 职业加速计划；您学习和快速成长的机会 成为上海快速成长的国际公司的一部分，有机会与其他成长中的初创公司和跨国技术公司合作 有机会巩固您对全球数字生态圈现状的理解 解决日常挑战的成就感 学习基础知识并快速提高营销和销售能力 经验丰富的薪酬 职位薪资：  120-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.agora-space.com

jobTitle: Accelerated Development Program Trainee – Product Sales Support
description: Our Company: Trane Technologies (NYSE:TT) is a global climate innovator. Through our strategic brands Trane® and Thermo King®, and our environmentally responsible portfolio products and services, we bring efficient and sustainable climate solutions to buildings, homes and transportation. For more information, please visit https://www.tranetechnologies.com.   We offer competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits and programs that help our employees thrive in both their professional and personal lives. We are committed to achieving workforce diversity reflective of our communities. We share passion for serving customers, caring for others, and boldly challenging what’s possible for a sustainable world.   Our Program: Trane Technologies’ Accelerated Development Program (ADP) is a 30-month rotational program designed to develop function senior professionals who can innovate proactively, engage our customers and drive business results; and to cultivate Trane Technologies’ future leaders who can act with our core values, advocate our cultures and equipped with our leadership capabilities.   We offer our early talents with challenging assignments, leadership training and valuable exposure to our company's senior leaders. Through rotations and experiences in multiple business locations, our ADP enables you to build diverse skill sets and a strong foundation for a successful and fulfilling career with Trane Technologies.   Rotation plan: Materials Management, Operation Excellence, Product Sales Support, Production, etc. The rotation plan will be fin-tuned according to the actual assignments.   Qualifications    1. Academic and Social Experience 0. Recent 2 years’ fresh graduates with Bachelor or Master Degree in HVAC, Refrigeration & Cryogenics Engineering, Thermal Engineering, Power Engineering, etc. 1. Minimum of two relevant internships or six months of working experience 2. Experience in leadership roles while in university, work or community 3. CET- 6 above, and proficient in both verbal and written English   0. Key Competencies 0. Passion for leading the changes: Strong desire to challenge the status quo, develop new approaches, make continuous improvement, and inspire others to do the same to promote changes in terms of Strategy, Business Model, Organization, People, Process, Tools, etc.,  with the aim to stay competitive for sustainable growth. 1. Open minded learning agility: Strong agility to learn things fast, deal with ambiguity, be open to feedback and go beyond boundaries. 2. Execution for driving results: Understand the strategy and direction and build capability foundations to deliver premier performance, by working on great details with strong accountability and responsibility. 3. Include and uplift one another: Embrace differences and value the opinions and contributions of each person, and work collaboratively to magnify impact. 4. Do what’s right, always: D emonstrate integrity and ethical behavior and have the courage to speak up for what is right.    0. Mobility 0. Willing and able to rotate in different roles/locations 1. Motivation to reach higher levels within the company at an accelerated rate
industries: Information Technology and Services, Staffing and Recruiting, and Human Resources

description: Who we are  Artefact is a global service company that sits at the intersection of marketing, consulting and data science. Our 1000 people break business and IT silos and transform organizations into consumer-centric leaders using digital, data and AI. Artefact offers a broad range of services – from strategy to operations – that help companies capture the competitive edge of data transformation.  We specialize in: Data consulting: We spot data opportunities and translate business needs into data-driven solutions which maximize operational efficiencies; Data marketing: We leverage Data, Technology and AI to increase sales and optimize marketing spends; Digital activation: We are the most data-driven digital marketing agency (covering SEO, SEA, Paid Social, Display / Programmatic and Affiliate Marketing).  Artefact is partnering with more than 300 blue-chip clients all over the world. Our main clients are global Brands that are moving toward consumer and data-centric models.   What you will be doing: Key responsibilities  Support the Partner and the Managing Consultant in growing our Consulting Department in country. The leadership structure for this Department is a partnership, similar to those found in Management Consulting ﬁrms so your typical day is similar to those in management consulting: • Deliver the highest standards of quality on your projects; • Ensure the highest level of quality of output to your clients;  However, a big difference is that you will work closely with data scientist and data engineers to use big data analytics to crack the toughest Executive level problems. Data guys will write the code and algorithms in a business context.  Big plus, you will take more responsibilities and have more client’s exposure from your very first day: • Build proposals identifying client’s needs, meeting client’s requirements, answering RFP’s; • Develop clients portfolio (business development and hunting), leveraging on existing clients, Group clients, personal networks, cold calls etc.; • Monitor the commercial pipeline and follow-up with leads appropriately; • Embark our clients into a transformation of their marketing department and make sure Artefact is their preferred partner in this endeavour;  In addition, you will help grow our business: • Support the Group on any admin tasks related to new oﬃce set up • Undertake ad hoc assignments from time to time and other duties as requested by management • Support your managers in deﬁning HR needs and the process to attract and retain the best talents from the consulting and the data space;  Last but not least, you will: • Pursue continuing professional development in relation to the role and its duties and responsibilities;   What we are looking for:  • Have a dream to be a consultant • Logical and flexible • Can work under pressure • Fluent in English and Chinese • Can work 5 days/week  • ANALYTIC : you LOVE data and think every company should take their decisions with facts • MOVER AND SHAKER : you have a hacker mindset and always ﬁnd the quick wins • AUTONOMOUS : you’re an entrepreneur… • HUNTER : you identify business opportunities and enjoy   Why you should join us • Artefact is the place to be: come and build the future of data consulting • Progress: every day offers new challenges and new opportunities to learn • Culture: join the best team you could ever imagine • Entrepreneurship: you will be joining a team of driven entrepreneurs. We won’t give up until we make a huge dent in this industry!
industries: Marketing and Advertising and Management Consulting

Job Reference #  235770BR  City  Beijing, Shanghai, China  Your role  Do you have an affinity for researching and analyzing complex information? We're looking for a research associate who can help us Analyze the fundamentals of companies and markets, so we can advise clients on their investment decisions Monitor events and developments in your global sector, and work with our sales and trading teams to assist our clients in finding opportunities Interact with a global team of colleagues and analysts who are eager to hear your insights and support your development.  Your team  You will be working in the Global Research team, looking after professional investors like asset managers and fund managers. You'll conduct research and give them advice about the best securities for them. Roles are primarily focused on a micro-level working in sector teams covering companies, but we also have some potential opportunities working in a more macro or quant-oriented framework. You'll be able to draw on the strength of our platforms, products, services and people worldwide to provide insightful and differentiated research.  Your expertise  You need to be graduating in 2023 and have experience in a role like this A good handle on accounting, including reviewing and interpreting annual reports and financial statements Solid know-how of Microsoft Excel An excellent communicator, able to educate through the creation of innovative reports and presentations (you love this stuff, and it shows) Inquisitive, organized and able to work independently Fluent in English and Mandarin About Us  Expert advice. Wealth management. Investment banking. Asset management. Retail banking in Switzerland. And all the support functions. That's what we do. And we do it for private and institutional clients as well as corporations around the world.  We are about 60,000 employees in all major financial centers, in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?  Join us  We're a truly global, collaborative and friendly group of people. Having a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace is important to us. And we support your career development, internal mobility and work-life balance. If this sounds interesting, apply now.  Disclaimer / Policy Statements  UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

description: Job Description  Brewing is not just a job, it's a passion.  We're about more than just credentials. We want people who believe in our culture, our values and Dreaming big is in our DNA. Brewing the world's most loved beers and creating meaningful experiences is what inspires us. We are owners, empowered to lead real change, deliver on tough challenges, and take accountability for the results.  We are looking for talent that shares these values, that is ambitious, bold & resilient. We want talent that is looking for fast career growth, cross-functional experiences, global exposure and robust training & development.  If this sounds like you, then we encourage you to apply to our Global MBA Program. The Full-Time Global MBA Program is a 1-year high potential leadership program for MBAs from top ranked schools across the world.  A Few Of The Program Highlights Are Global Induction with CEO, C-Level, and senior leaders. Deep dive immersions into unique markets in different parts of our global business. Access to the GMBA Alumni Community that will connect you with over 200+ GMBAs across AB InBev. Robust learning opportunities including Innovation training, Marketing Academy & Coaching Circles on capabilities. Unique high-touch leadership development from an Executive Coach and Senior Alumni Mentor. AB InBev GMBA Summer Internship  Functional Internship Roles Offered  The Global MBA Summer Internship is the pipeline for the Full-Time Global MBA Program. We only select our GMBA candidates from our GMBA Summer Internship Program. It's a 10 to 12-week internship where you'll be given the chance to complete a real-world strategic project with the opportunity to present to senior leaders at summer's close. Marketing Sales (including Direct to consumer & BEES – B2B) Finance Procurement & Sustainability Supply & Logistics Solutions (Technology) ZX Ventures (global growth and innovation group within AB InBev) What We Require  Job QualificationsQualifications First year MBA candidate from a top-tier business school. Authorization to work permanently in the country of internship and full-time placement. 4+ years of relevant working experience in any relevant business function. Not afraid to take risks, strong desire to achieve success, constant seeker of evolution. Challenges the status quo and always looking for consumer centric solutions. Quickly adapts to ever changing environments with incomplete information and thrives under pressure. Demonstrated leadership in previous work experience and extracurricular activities. Actively listens, seeks diverse opinions, comfortable in a team-based environment. Global mindset (international experience or cross-cultural exposure). Company  Anheuser- Busch InBev (China) Co., Ltd.  Job  Talent Programs  Primary Location  China-Shanghai  Schedule  Part-time  Job Posting  Sep 27, 2021, 5:16:35 AM  Unposting Date  Ongoing
industries: Information Technology and Services, Consumer Goods, and Financial Services

jobTitle: Owner Advisor Trainee， Shenzhen Longgang Wanda
description: Responsibilities Manage the customer’s Tesla experience in the most positive way. Welcome all walk in guests, answer questions and enthusiastically educate all customers and fans about the benefits of going electric, generally publicize going electric knowledge. Responsible for collecting qualified customer information, assist market events, explore customer needs, stimulate customer demand, cooperate with Owner Advisor to meet store’s sales target. Provide high quality service to existing Tesla owner community. Help Tesla enthusiasts and future owners stay up to speed with Tesla by promoting company’s updated news. Employee must learn about the company and products related knowledge, keep up with industry trends and best practices Develop amazing customer relationships on the sales floor and during test-drive experiences to ultimately create a brand experience customers will recommend to their friends. Competency certification, Probation Review, otherwise he or she will not be able to meet the full time employee’s requirement. Communicate with the external clients and partners in a professional way, and also ensure effective communication and great cooperation with internal colleagues (Among same and different function/ store/region). Keep inventory full and neat (if applicable). Other Responsibilities: Perform other related duties as assigned, based on the business need. Requirements ork experience in retail, industry and key account sales with proven track record to meet or exceed targets and goals. Highly appreciate Company culture and value. Strong communication and customer service experience required. Exceptional self-management and self-learning ability. Positive, enthusiastic and passionate about the changes in the personal transportation industry. Ability to understand and convey business issues and technical concepts. Strong sense of team mentality and reliability. Ability to work evenings and weekends in retail environment. Retail, industry and key account sales experience preferred. During the probationary period, including not limited to transfer, promotion, etc., are not considered to pass the probationary period and the employee is required to pass the probationary period. Valid driver's license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills.

jobTitle: Product Marketing Intern 产品市场实习生
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  Key Responsibilities Support the line Mgr. in the PPVMT process and PMC process Support to make product, pricing, specifications for China market engagement Day to day management of the OXO chart-detailed product definition including the technical translation into Chinese. Support pricing paper sign-off process Support on the internal communication of product briefing and development of sales guidebook Prepare SAP maintenance to support launch process Develop the order-guide/vehicle specification strategies. Preparation of the dealer product & pricing bulletins to support smooth launch process Detailed responsibility of the product correctness (including translation) of the website, brochures etc Vista validation with Sales Ops Monitor and follow up of the competitive environment and positioning Market analysis, quick response to the product changes of core competitors with aids of CAM system Undertake ad hoc studies and projects as appropriate to the general objectives of the department Skills, Experience And Qualifications Required Automotive or Mechanical Design bachelor degree or above. Understand the automotive market and JLR products Analytical, systematic and logical thinker with the ability to lead a multifunctional team. Proficient in both written and spoken English, a third language will be an added advantage. 职位薪资：  120-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.jaguarlandrover.com

职位来源于实习僧。  「GLD is on the hunt for go-getters ⚡」  GetLogic Digital (GLD) is…  A digital boutique that provides global businesses with plug-n-play growth solutions. Join us on a pivoting journey into the cross-border e-commerce sector and help more Chinese brands to establish strong presence in overseas markets.  You Will Be Having fun by solving non-trivial problems and making impact on business operations; Scouting new business opportunities that would bring company forward; Analyzing market landscape, identifying growth opportunities; Polishing existing and developing new sales materials; Developing online presence for the company across Chinese and English platforms; Collaborating with other teammates in order to make that next great thing happen; You Are a Great Fit IF  ☑️ You are an adult (aka need no supervision);  ☑️ You are competitive;  ☑️ You are not boring;  ☑️ You know how to get sh*t done;  ☑️ You get along with yourself and other people people;  ☑️ You have international academic experience;  ☑️ You are ready to commit for at least 2 months;  ☑️ You are native in Mandarin and fluent in English;  GLD Values  ☉ Growth is a recurring choice;  ☉ Normal sucks;  ☉ Be to the point;  ☉ Mediocrity is an excuse for lazy butts;  ☉ Grow 1 %%%%%%%% every day;  ☉ Fail faster and create systems;  ☉ Innovate by working smarter. Get lucky by working harder;  Perks  ⚖️ Competitive compensation package;  ♨️ Performance based bonuses;  ⚙️ Work directly with the founder;  ⛺ No cubicles. Work from wherever you please;  ⛽ Training materials and library;  地址：北京市、上海市、广州市、深圳市、厦门、南京市、天津市、苏州市、西安市、长沙市、沈阳市、青岛市、郑州市、大连市、东莞市、宁波市、海口、三亚  职位薪资：  80-150/天

jobTitle: Business Management Leadership Program Intern (BMLP EID)
description: Job Description Summary Business Management Leadership Program is a career accelerator program designed for highly talented MBAs who have a passion for healthcare industry and strive to be a GE Healthcare business leader of tomorrow. You'll assume responsibilities that challenge you as you drive continuous improvement throughout different business units and or functions within GE Healthcare. With an about 5-year development track you will be stretched to lead one impactful company project and be provided robust and systematic trainings including leadership, commercial and Lean. More importantly you’ll take different roles designed to bridge the gaps between your current knowledge and the experience needed for success as a business leader. There will be 3 to 4 12-24 months assignments which will focus on:• Commercial (Sales or Marketing)• Product Management• Operations (Supply Chain, Lean or Service)BMLP EID is an internship program to build talent pipeline for 2022 BMLP hiring. During the internship, BMLP EID will have chance to work on critical business projects in Sales, Modality, Marketing, Product Management functions.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Required Qualifications  Top-tier and high potential full time MBA students (to graduate in 2022); Minimum of three years of working experience … Healthcare related experience preferred; Chinese speaking and understanding China context is a must; Available for at least 2 month full time internship; Fluency in English; Willing to relocate to meet business needs;  Desired Characteristics  Be agile and authentic; Embrace challenges and courage to drive change; Ability to solve problems and develop solutions using data-driven insights; Innovative thinking; Ability to thrive in a highly complex and global work network; Have high passion for healthcare industry;  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.
industries: Hospital & Health Care, Medical Devices, and Pharmaceuticals

description: 工作职责:  Job Purpose and Impact  The Sales Associate III will participate in face-to-face and remote selling to our new and existing customers, selling directly or indirectly through various sales channels. We seek a detail-oriented professional who, with guidance, will help assess customer needs and suggest appropriate products, services and solutions.  Key Accountabilities Help develop and deliver sales bids, proposals, presentations and participate in conducting product demonstrations. Help identify and contact prospective customers. Build customer relationships that help generate future sales and repeat business. Apply broad theoretical job knowledge to sell directly to customers. Handle complex clerical, administrative, technical or customer support issues under minimal supervision, while escalating only the most complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned Qualifications Minimum Qualifications Minimum of four years of related work experience Other minimum qualifications may apply 任职条件:  Same as above

jobTitle: 服装导购/品牌代表Brand Representative
description: 公司简介  Abercrombie & Fitch Co. 是一家全球连锁的专业零售商，旗下品牌 Abercrombie & Fitch, abercrombie kids, 和 Hollister Co. 致力于为有着积极、年轻生活方式的男士、女士和儿童提供高质量的休闲服装。A&F 成立于1892年，总部位于 New Albany, Ohio。A&F 通过设在美国、加拿大、欧洲、亚洲、墨西哥和中东的零售店销售商品。公司同时运营线上购物网站 www. abercrombie.com, www.abercrombiekids.com 和 www.hollisterco.com  职位描述  A&F/Hollister的理想员工是自信的。他们通过观察和响应顾客的要求，提供出色的顾客服务。这样的人性格开朗，风格时尚又乐于助人。他/她们始终通过保持乐观，亲切温暖来展现对店铺环境的敏锐意识。他们也能真诚流畅地与顾客交流，自然与友好的沟通为顾客关系搭建桥梁，从而实现顾客至上的服务理念。举止充满关怀、自信和有吸引力，最终成功完成每一笔交易。  职位要求  学历：全职：要求高中文凭/高中同等学历。兼职/实习：无学历要求。  零售经验：全职：要求1-2年客户服务经验。 兼职/实习：无需专业零售经验。  主管/管理经验：全职：无需主管/管理经验。 拥有1-2年主管经验者优先考虑。兼职/实习：无需主管/管理经验。  工作时间安排要求  全职 - 每周工作40个小时。品牌代表需要在大部分周六和/或周日以及在节假日高峰的几周期间工作。具体的工作时数和天数可能因业务 、中国法律及雇用合同（如有）而有所不同。  兼职 - 每周平均有2-3次轮班，每次轮班大约4-5小时。轮班时间有弹性。  实习 - 每周小于40个小时。工作时间有弹性。  您需要哪些能力来胜任这个职位  适应能力/灵活变通能力 乐于助人  压力承受能力 性格开朗  应用学习 风格时尚  同时处理多重任务 沟通  职业道德  您将从职位中学到什么  全职 - 领导能力 监督卖场  全职/兼职/实习 - 业务了解 关注细节  任务  门店运营（仅全职）- 执行所有收银机职能和现金相关程序。根据需要监督卖场，以确保顾客体验到达公司标准，包括最大程度减少排队情况和确保卖场有适当的员工部署。  顾客体验 -与顾客沟通并协助客户，以确保他们在店内获得出色的购物体验。洞察顾客需求、领会身体语言和根据线索帮助顾客。随时掌握商品选择的最新资讯，并使用建议性的销售方式/与顾客分享全套服装搭配技巧。提供以顾客为中心的店内体验，确保快速、轻松和气氛活跃的购物体验。遵守所有试衣间流程。  商店成列和卖场 - 通过根据USR报告、计划和视觉指南完成和设计所有购物台面层次以及人体模型和展品的变化，维持和更新整合商店的视觉和成列标准。清洁、整理和维护商店。核查尺寸供应情况、高效和快速地补充商品以及确保指定区域标准化，商品被熨烫并叠放整齐，以方便购物。完成商品补货。确保每间试衣间干净且没有损坏。  沟通 - 与他人建立和谐的工作关系。让经理了解顾客与商品（列如摆放、供应情况和顾客试衣）和业务流程（例如在收银台或试衣间的长队伍）问题。以适当的方式及时与他人沟通。尊重并重视他人的多样性。  资产保护和盘亏 - 遵守公司的所有安防政策，包括手册政策，以及管理指示和指派。遵守个人仪表的着装要求指南（例如整洁、适当着装）。遵守有关商店开门营业和关闭的标准程序。换班时，及时到达、打卡上班和打卡下班。操作收银机和所有销售点（POS）设备。  培训和发展 - 作为团队成员，积极参与实现团队目标。参加培训会议，以确保符合公司标准（例如五分钟会议）。寻求、听取并利用反馈，以提升工作绩效。  请至https://careers.hollisterco.com/ 或 https://careers.abercrombie.com/ 提交申请  官方招聘微博 @WORKAT_ANFHCO  Powered by JazzHR  20FLPAFv10
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Nonprofit Organization Management, and Retail

jobTitle: 服装导购/品牌代表Brand Representative
description: 公司简介  Abercrombie & Fitch Co. 是一家全球连锁的专业零售商，旗下品牌 Abercrombie & Fitch, abercrombie kids, 和 Hollister Co. 致力于为有着积极、年轻生活方式的男士、女士和儿童提供高质量的休闲服装。A&F 成立于1892年，总部位于 New Albany, Ohio。A&F 通过设在美国、加拿大、欧洲、亚洲、墨西哥和中东的零售店销售商品。公司同时运营线上购物网站 www. abercrombie.com, www.abercrombiekids.com 和 www.hollisterco.com  职位描述  A&F/Hollister的理想员工是自信的。他们通过观察和响应顾客的要求，提供出色的顾客服务。这样的人性格开朗，风格时尚又乐于助人。他/她们始终通过保持乐观，亲切温暖来展现对店铺环境的敏锐意识。他们也能真诚流畅地与顾客交流，自然与友好的沟通为顾客关系搭建桥梁，从而实现顾客至上的服务理念。举止充满关怀、自信和有吸引力，最终成功完成每一笔交易。  职位要求  学历：全职：要求高中文凭/高中同等学历。兼职/实习：无学历要求。  零售经验：全职：要求1-2年客户服务经验。 兼职/实习：无需专业零售经验。  主管/管理经验：全职：无需主管/管理经验。 拥有1-2年主管经验者优先考虑。兼职/实习：无需主管/管理经验。  工作时间安排要求  全职 - 每周工作40个小时。品牌代表需要在大部分周六和/或周日以及在节假日高峰的几周期间工作。具体的工作时数和天数可能因业务 、中国法律及雇用合同（如有）而有所不同。  兼职 - 每周平均有2-3次轮班，每次轮班大约4-5小时。轮班时间有弹性。  实习 - 每周小于40个小时。工作时间有弹性。  您需要哪些能力来胜任这个职位  适应能力/灵活变通能力 乐于助人  压力承受能力 性格开朗  应用学习 风格时尚  同时处理多重任务 沟通  职业道德  您将从职位中学到什么  全职 - 领导能力 监督卖场  全职/兼职/实习 - 业务了解 关注细节  任务  门店运营（仅全职）- 执行所有收银机职能和现金相关程序。根据需要监督卖场，以确保顾客体验到达公司标准，包括最大程度减少排队情况和确保卖场有适当的员工部署。  顾客体验 -与顾客沟通并协助客户，以确保他们在店内获得出色的购物体验。洞察顾客需求、领会身体语言和根据线索帮助顾客。随时掌握商品选择的最新资讯，并使用建议性的销售方式/与顾客分享全套服装搭配技巧。提供以顾客为中心的店内体验，确保快速、轻松和气氛活跃的购物体验。遵守所有试衣间流程。  商店成列和卖场 - 通过根据USR报告、计划和视觉指南完成和设计所有购物台面层次以及人体模型和展品的变化，维持和更新整合商店的视觉和成列标准。清洁、整理和维护商店。核查尺寸供应情况、高效和快速地补充商品以及确保指定区域标准化，商品被熨烫并叠放整齐，以方便购物。完成商品补货。确保每间试衣间干净且没有损坏。  沟通 - 与他人建立和谐的工作关系。让经理了解顾客与商品（列如摆放、供应情况和顾客试衣）和业务流程（例如在收银台或试衣间的长队伍）问题。以适当的方式及时与他人沟通。尊重并重视他人的多样性。  资产保护和盘亏 - 遵守公司的所有安防政策，包括手册政策，以及管理指示和指派。遵守个人仪表的着装要求指南（例如整洁、适当着装）。遵守有关商店开门营业和关闭的标准程序。换班时，及时到达、打卡上班和打卡下班。操作收银机和所有销售点（POS）设备。  培训和发展 - 作为团队成员，积极参与实现团队目标。参加培训会议，以确保符合公司标准（例如五分钟会议）。寻求、听取并利用反馈，以提升工作绩效。  请至https://careers.hollisterco.com/ 或 https://careers.abercrombie.com/ 提交申请  官方招聘微博 @WORKAT_ANFHCO  Powered by JazzHR  7xSfqY1NdK
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Nonprofit Organization Management, and Retail

jobTitle: 服装导购/品牌代表Brand Representative
description: 职位描述  A&F/Hollister的理想员工是自信的。他们通过观察和响应顾客的要求，提供出色的顾客服务。这样的人性格开朗，风格时尚又乐于助人。他/她们始终通过保持乐观，亲切温暖来展现对店铺环境的敏锐意识。他们也能真诚流畅地与顾客交流，自然与友好的沟通为顾客关系搭建桥梁，从而实现顾客至上的服务理念。举止充满关怀、自信和有吸引力，最终成功完成每一笔交易。  职位要求  学历：全职：要求高中文凭/高中同等学历。兼职/实习：无学历要求。  零售经验：全职：要求1-2年客户服务经验。 兼职/实习：无需专业零售经验。  主管/管理经验：全职：无需主管/管理经验。 拥有1-2年主管经验者优先考虑。兼职/实习：无需主管/管理经验。  工作时间安排要求  全职 - 每周工作40个小时。品牌代表需要在大部分周六和/或周日以及在节假日高峰的几周期间工作。具体的工作时数和天数可能因业务 、中国法律及雇用合同（如有）而有所不同。  兼职 - 每周平均有2-3次轮班，每次轮班大约4-5小时。轮班时间有弹性。  实习 - 每周小于40个小时。工作时间有弹性。  您需要哪些能力来胜任这个职位  适应能力/灵活变通能力 乐于助人  压力承受能力 性格开朗  应用学习 风格时尚  同时处理多重任务 沟通  职业道德  您将从职位中学到什么  全职 - 领导能力 监督卖场  全职/兼职/实习 - 业务了解 关注细节  任务  门店运营（仅全职）- 执行所有收银机职能和现金相关程序。根据需要监督卖场，以确保顾客体验到达公司标准，包括最大程度减少排队情况和确保卖场有适当的员工部署。  顾客体验 -与顾客沟通并协助客户，以确保他们在店内获得出色的购物体验。洞察顾客需求、领会身体语言和根据线索帮助顾客。随时掌握商品选择的最新资讯，并使用建议性的销售方式/与顾客分享全套服装搭配技巧。提供以顾客为中心的店内体验，确保快速、轻松和气氛活跃的购物体验。遵守所有试衣间流程。  商店成列和卖场 - 通过根据USR报告、计划和视觉指南完成和设计所有购物台面层次以及人体模型和展品的变化，维持和更新整合商店的视觉和成列标准。清洁、整理和维护商店。核查尺寸供应情况、高效和快速地补充商品以及确保指定区域标准化，商品被熨烫并叠放整齐，以方便购物。完成商品补货。确保每间试衣间干净且没有损坏。  沟通 - 与他人建立和谐的工作关系。让经理了解顾客与商品（列如摆放、供应情况和顾客试衣）和业务流程（例如在收银台或试衣间的长队伍）问题。以适当的方式及时与他人沟通。尊重并重视他人的多样性。  资产保护和盘亏 - 遵守公司的所有安防政策，包括手册政策，以及管理指示和指派。遵守个人仪表的着装要求指南（例如整洁、适当着装）。遵守有关商店开门营业和关闭的标准程序。换班时，及时到达、打卡上班和打卡下班。操作收银机和所有销售点（POS）设备。  培训和发展 - 作为团队成员，积极参与实现团队目标。参加培训会议，以确保符合公司标准（例如五分钟会议）。寻求、听取并利用反馈，以提升工作绩效。  请至https://careers.hollisterco.com/ 或 https://careers.abercrombie.com/ 提交申请  官方招聘微博 @WORKAT_ANFHCO  Powered by JazzHR  Q5AdI2Oene
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Nonprofit Organization Management, and Retail

description: Job Summary:  HR and Admin related interns will have opportunities to join Human Resources, Operations Integration（Operations Training and Documentation）, Permitting Record and Information Management, Sales and Cast Housing Departments. You will assist in promoting Shanghai Disney Resort internal policies and resources, coordinating cross function cooperation, and providing administrative support for departments’ daily operation. You will not only learn Disney's legendary culture, meet other amazing Cast Members, experience professional on-job training and career development guidance. Join us to start your career story at Shanghai Disney Resort.  Responsibilities:  You have opportunity to join:  Human Resources  Recruitment: You will help to facilitating on-site/off-site recruitment process and assisting with team admin works. HR Operations / Global Mobility: You will support new employee onboarding process, documentation, and other admin related work. HR Business Partner: You will help to book meeting room and schedule meetings for the Business Partner team, and consolidate data and collect information to maintain regular reports. Learning and Development: You will provide administrative and logistical support for all orientation classes, communicating with facilitators and supporting them on daily basis responding to questions and requests related to their courses and participants.  Operations Training and Documentation  Operations Training: Interns in Operations Training team, you will assist in coordinating training courses and maintaining system data. Operations Documentation: Interns in Operations Documentation team, you will assist in the collation, editing and typesetting of training materials and documents.  Permitting Record and Information Management  You will schedule and coordinate meetings, and draft meeting minutes; Translate and update relevant government documents, important clauses in laws and regulations as well as Permitting, Record and Information Management team working files.  Sales  You will assist the Sales Services team to serve internal sales teams and external partners, ensuring contract signing, team order processing, sales data integration, etc.  Cast Housing  You will assist in daily guest services communication and feedbacks, check in and check out, managing housing events and activities.  Basic Qualifications:  Undergraduate or graduate students in Universities Proficient in using Microsoft (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) Proficient in spoken and written English To commit 3 working days attendance per week  Additional Information:  We are taking a responsible approach to creating environments that allow us to do what we do best – welcome and entertain millions of guests each year from across the country and around the world. As part of our commitment to health and safety, we require all newly-hired employees to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 prior to their onboarding dates.  postingchannel:wechat  763498BR

jobTitle: 商务拓展实习Business Developer Intern
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  Job Title: Sales Representative Permanent/Intern, Full-time  Location: Xuhui, Shanghai Salary: Competitive  About Us  Coderbunker is a community of developers that provides engineering solutions for companies and individuals. Our unique business model allows companies to avoid the costly and lengthy process of hiring, providing companies with the flexibility to obtain engineering resources effectively and fast without the commitment of hiring full-time. We are trusted by a wide range of customers from large multinationals to thriving start-ups and entrepreneurs.  About Your Role：  As a Sales Representative, you are likely to spend your day to day ensure current customers have the right products and services, identify new markets and customer leads, and pitch prospective customers. The sales representative may also do everything from answering phones to monitoring the competition, all while maintaining good customer relations and pursuing new sales opportunities.  Responsibilities Reach out to customer leads through cold calling Present, promote and sell products and services using solid arguments to our existing and prospective customers Continuously improve through feedback and self-evaluation of your own work Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Economics or any other related field Strong English communication skills, both oral and writing; native Chinese speakers preferred Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the client needs Strong ability to document and analyze the sales flow Ability to work comfortably in a fast-paced environment Possess excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills Possess prospecting and closing skills Accountable and competitive What We Offer Career acceleration plan; opportunities for you to learn and grow fast Be part of a rapidly growing international company in Shanghai with opportunities to work with other growing startups and multinational technology companies Chance to solidify your understanding of the current state of the global Digital Ecosphere Sense of accomplishment in solving day-to-day challenges Learn the fundamentals and grow your marketing and sales abilities fast Attractive remuneration according to experience About Us  Coderbunker is a developer community that provides engineering solutions for companies and individuals. Our unique business model allows the company to avoid costly and lengthy recruitment processes, so that the company can obtain engineering resources flexibly, efficiently and quickly without the need for full-time recruitment. From large multinational companies to thriving start-ups and entrepreneurs, we have gained the trust of a wide range of customers.  Responsibilities of the business development intern: look for market needs, sort out customer needs , find partners and cooperative media, and promote potential customers. Business development may also be responsible for everything, from answering calls to monitoring market competition, establishing, developing and maintaining active business and seeking new sales opportunities.     Requirements  Have a bachelors degree in business, marketing, economics or any other related field   Good English speaking and writing skills ; native Chinese speakers are preferred   Strong ability to record and analyze sales process  Able to work comfortably in a fast-paced environment   Have good communication and negotiation skills   Have prospecting and trading skills   Responsible and competitive  We Provide   Career acceleration plan; your chance to learn and grow quickly   Be part of Shanghais fast-growing international company and have the opportunity to cooperate with other growing startups and multinational technology companies   Have the opportunity to consolidate your understanding of the status quo of the global digital ecosystem   A sense of accomplishment in solving daily challenges  Learn the basics and quickly improve marketing and sales capabilities  Experienced salary  PLEASE NOTE: This is an "onsite" position. Candidates must be based in Shanghai and available to work for AT LEAST 3 MONTHS  职位薪资：  100-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.agora-space.com

工作职责:  岗位职责 负责在指定的治疗领域和区域内开展日常拜访及宣传推广工作； 配合完成各类学术会议，提高公司产品的市场份额； 专业化的推广，为公司营造良好的学术氛围； 及时收集并反馈客户信息和市场情况，了解最新的行业动态、产品知识； 任职条件:  任职条件 全日制大专及本科2022 届毕业生 专业不限，医学、药学、生物、化学等相关专业优先 学习能力强，抗压力强，良好的人际沟通能力，愿意接受挑战和变化 每周确保3天以上实习

description: 职位来源于实习僧。  Responsibilities Administrative support to PFS (Porsche Financial Services) Sales Department, including meeting room reservation, express parcel delivery and receipt, contract management, etc. Marketing Support, including market research, goods receipt & distribution record consolidation, document translation and other miscellaneous support. Sales support, including Dealer Visit Calendar review, VJV report review, wholesale financing contract process monitoring, recommendation letter preparation, vehicle certificate system management, and other support based on project/task demand, etc. Requirements: Bachelor degree, internship experience in Automotive industry is preferred Excellent intercultural and communication skills, proactive attitude, diligent, stress resistant and willing to learn Familiar with MS Office (word, excel, PowerPoint) Fluent in both oral and written English Committed and available to work at least 4 days a week for 6 months. 职位薪资：  120-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：http://www.porsche.cn

About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know our Team:  Strategic Partnerships is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda’s non-accommodation partners and promote Agoda’s top and bottom line growth. We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.  The opportunity:  An Inventory Management (IM) Intern works for the Agoda Strategic Partnerships Travel Distribution Team which supports a rapidly growing number of travel industry partners buying and selling hotel inventory.  An IM Intern supports daily inventory management and also works with account managers closely to grow hotel coverage, continuously improve inventory mapping , and will gain an understanding of the whole OTA accommodation supply chain.  In this role you will get to: Support daily inventory management by using our inventory system tool to improve distribution quality Support suppliers upload hotel/room content, validate the successful creation of hotel/room in Agoda systems and provide feedback to partners to correct content where unsuccessful Monitor and optimize supplier inventory mapping success ratio by improving content quality Support account managers on other daily operations work What you’ll Need to Succeed: Students currently completing a Bachelor’s or Master’s program Able to work with a multi-cultural group of professionals Able to work in Agoda Shanghai office for at least 3 days a week for 3 months Positive attitude and open to learn/adapt to different challenges Good command of English Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.  We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .  To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

jobTitle: 大客户销售支持实习生
description: 【职位描述】 1.积极配合与各地教育领域相关政府机构及合作单位沟通，完成领导交办任务； 2.日常有效维护客户和合作伙伴，提升客户满意度； 3.积极支持公司其他市场活动，完成公司交办的其他销售事务； 4.协助制作标书，协助推进业务项目。  【任职要求】 1.2022届海内外本硕毕业生和在校生 2.有政府、教育类大客户市场开发的相关工作实习经验优先考虑 3.较强的沟通能力和应变能力，理解行业和客户的本质需求 4.性格开朗，有团队精神，逻辑分析能力强，有较强的学习能力、抗压能力 5.可熟练操作office办公软件 6.能力优秀者要求可适当放宽

职位来源于实习僧。  主要职责： 基于公司提供的潜在客户名单和意向客户名称，进行电话沟通，理解客户需求，介 绍公司服务和优势，达成公司管理和业务人员约定销售会议的目的； 根据客户要求理解的加深和公司业务发展的情况，不断学习和总结，提高自己对客 户和业务的理解以及开拓业务的能力； 将获取信息反馈给业务人员，改进公司服务内容和业务拓展对象和方式，获得更好 的结果； 领导布置的其他工作。 职位要求： 大学本科及以上，有高端产品电话销售经验者优先； 沟通能力良好； 结果导向，有一定的抗压能力； 英语听说读写流利者优先。 上班地点： 上海市浦东新区东方路3601号丰华园3号楼5楼MEC  实习报酬 100元/天  职位薪资：  80-100/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：http://www.martecchina.com.cn/

jobTitle: 2022 Equities Trading Analyst Summer Internship Program in China
description: We Offer  Join us as a China summer analyst in our Equities franchise! This is a 10-week program designed to give students a taste of life at the world’s leading integrated Wealth Manager and Investment Bank, with the potential to join the Graduate Program.  Over the course of the internship you will make valuable contributions to the bank’s work, develop skills, expand your knowledge and grow in confidence. Your participation in the real-world business challenges presented by Sales and Trading across multiple markets in real-time will allow you to expand your experience and build valuable networks across the wider firm.  Program elements include: One day orientation followed by first week training Mid-term and final review to gauge your progress vs. your objectives Summer speaker series where you'll hear from senior representatives across different divisions Mentorship from an experienced member of the business A balance of work, social events and networking opportunities  The Sales internship is based in Shanghai and the Trading in Shenzhen.  Submit your application and complete the online assessments by October 30, 2021.  Your field of responsibility  This will be a structured program in the Equities sales and trading business. There will be invaluable hands-on and shadowing experience to enhance your personal development.  Your future colleagues  Be part of the dynamic and innovative environment that is the trading floor, delivering outstanding investment solutions to our global institutional client base. Equities, with its global distribution and reach, is core to the Asia Pacific business model in delivering long-lasting value to our clients.  We are a department which values Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) and is committed to realizing the firm’s D&I ambition which is an integral part of our global cultural values.  You Offer  You will be graduating between December 2022 – June 2023 with an undergraduate or post graduate degree and must be available between June – August 2022. Whatever your background, you have keen interest in financial markets!  You have: Proficient written and spoken communication skills in English and Mandarin Familiarity of coding languages, statistics, or mathematics is valued Excellent analytical skills, initiative, and a proven problem solver Experience working in a team, collaborating with others to achieve strong results  You understand the value of diversity in the workplace and dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture in all aspects of working life so that people from all backgrounds are treated equally and can bring their full, authentic selves to work to realize their full potential.  China - Mainland-Shenzhen-Shenzhen

职位来源于实习僧。  关于易界  易界集团专注于中欧跨境并购，核心业务分为三大板块：资产管理、投行业务及数据平台。易界成立于 2014 年，目前在上海和伦敦设有两个办公室，并于 2019 年被评为上海市高新技术企业。  易界依托线上平台、线下团队，为中外家族及企业提供深入全面的募集资金和并购交易咨询服务，寻找长期增长并有跨境视角的优质企业。截至目前，易界已服务逾 40 位客户，成功完成了 11 笔国内外投资及并购交易，总交易金额约为 250 亿人民币。易界的使命是作为中国跨境并购的领导者推动中国在全球并购中的崛起。  易界投资业务  战略投资：聚焦于寻找长期增长并有中国视角的欧洲优质企业。易界专注于投资欧洲强韧行业，通过中国价值创造带来的额外成果可获得约 3 倍的可观收益。  跟投：提供优质的财务投资机会，为投资者开启海外配置便利之门。  易界投行业务  并购交易：我们利用中国与全球投资者网络，为企业家提供卖方并购咨询服务。作为客户的财务顾问为客户安排路演，会见高质量的投资者并执行交易。  债务融资：我们协助客户与国内外信贷机构协商有利的债务融资条件，包括人民币和美元。  股权融资：我们帮助企业家为他们的企业或他们建立的基金向全球投资者募集资金  工作职责：  1 运用专业知识、工具，协助潜在全球投资并购的交易信息挖掘、收集及筛选  2 熟练掌握并购相关英语专业词汇并进行快速英语阅读，从海外消息源中进行有效精简的要点归纳及总结  3 具备一定的翻译能力，将总结后的原文进行翻译、复查及上传  4 协助执行&管理公司信息平台（微信群、微博、知乎等）的内容发布与维护  5 协助执行大型活动，如行业峰会、论坛、沙龙等  任职资格：  1 本科及以上学历，金融、经济背景，英语优良者优先  2 有跨境并购、新闻报刊杂志相关工作经验，具备相关专业知识技能者优先  3 能熟练使用Excel等办公软件  4 具备强烈进取心与高度的工作热情；良好的团队合作精神及高度的责任心  5 可以保证至少3个月的实习，每周至少3天以上  实习地点：上海市静安区南京西路1038号3002室  实习薪酬：150元/天  职位薪资：  150-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.dealglobe.com
