companyName: 上海融文商务咨询有限公司
description: 该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述：  About This Role  The Business Development Representative role is the first stage of Meltwater's Management Trainee Program, in the business development function. This program is both intense and rewarding, designed to give candidates an accelerated career trajectory within the organization. The program is open to fresh graduates from all specializations and backgrounds.  There are 3 parts to our program and by the end of it you will not only have developed excellent B2B sales skills, but also leadership and management skills, and achieve all of this in a workplace with a history of legendary culture!  Here is the 3-step career pathway laid out for you: Business Development Representative(6-12 months): You’ll be working together with our Account Executive team(Strategic Account BD), speaking to the clients portfolio across all industries. Sales Consultant(12-24 months): Here, you'll learn all the ropes of B2B sales and become an expert on our platform, media intelligence, and sharpen your business acumen. Sales Leader: You'll either be a sales manager to take part of recruitment, training and managing a team, or join our Account Executive team to develop the strategic accounts and help them drive the media monitoring and social analytics strategy. Meltwater values hiring on potential rather than experience. Rest assured, we'll ensure you're fully prepared and geared for success. We have lots of training and development in place in both media intelligence and all things sales! The training doesn't stop here – throughout your management program, you'll constantly be mentored by senior leaders.  You will be pitching to a wide range of companies across all industries, and get a chance to work with some of the most exciting companies throughout Shanghai. The right candidate will be responsible for the entire sales process as they liaise with C-Level Executives and directly pitch Meltwater's software solutions to them.  What you will be doing?   B2B sales role where you are responsible for driving Meltwater’s revenue growth through consultative sales and acquisition of new clients   Focus on driving the top of the sales funnel – such as sales pipeline generation, and lead qualification of new & existing clients for the purpose of driving sales & revenue   Qualify inbound leads, and reach out to outbound prospects effectively, ensuring a growing and steady stream of opportunities to be converted to successful deals   Manage a pipeline of inbound and self-sourced leads to identify, engage, and develop relationships with potential prospects   Educate and guide prospects through the buyer’s journey to help them understand how Meltwater can help drive their business goals and objectives   Diligently keep informed of product developments, competitor movements and industry trends to stay ahead of the curve   Collaborate and work closely with key internal stakeholders such as Client Success, Operations and Legal, etc.  任职要求：Skills & Requirement  What we would like to see from you Currently based in or willing to relocate to Shanghai Bachelor’s degree or above. Any majors are welcome! Entry level / have up to 1 year of relevant work experience Curious about and understand the value of digital marketing / social media / MarTech / MarCom Interest in tech & SaaS / media intelligence, and a regular consumer of the news / media High level of drive & stamina to succeed in sales Prior experience cold calling, booking and conducting software demos, or exposure to sales processes from prospecting to closing of deals Good to have track record of successes and highlights in sales achievements Exceptional interpersonal, communication and stakeholder management skills Self-motivated, proactive, and organized with the ability to work under tight deadlines and in a high-pressure environment What do we offer? Competitive remuneration package, with uncapped monthly commissions and quarterly bonuses! Recipient to numerous global employer awards, including recognition by Great Place to Work® across our many international offices Young, fun and ambitious working environment A career path with plenty of opportunities for personal and professional growth in a dynamic, fast-growing and international company

Whole life cycle portfolio management, and prepare product materials Internal/ external communication to generate total solution including tracer, equipment, and software. description: 公司介绍： 【始祖使命】 始祖科技致力于提升中国制造企业的生产与流通效率，用数智赋能中国制造。 始祖科技由哈佛学子创立，团队毕业于北大，清华，中科院计算研究所，哈工大等国内外知名院校，在字节，腾讯，西门子，大众等工业与互联网企业有丰富工作经验。 始祖科技通过为中国传统制造业客户提供SaaS软件系统产品（制造业云端MES生产执行系统和ERP企业资源管理软件）与Al解决方案,为客户打造一站式智能化产品，帮助企业降本增效，提升质量品质，做出更数据驱动的决策，实现数字化和智能化转型。 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------  【职位描述】 1．带领战略团队对国内及海外市场、业务模式，以及特定产品的分析研究; 2．深度观察和调研业务相关行业，分析定性定量信息，为管理团队提供决策建议，协助制定国内市场 的业务发展战略。  【职位要求】 1．有SaaS/制造业从业经历; 2.VC/基金/咨询/互联网战略2-5年工作经验; 3．在某一行业具有成熟的研究框架，并有过至少1例在研究产出上领先同行认知的案例; 4．强自驱强好奇心，能够将认知变为现实，并能够组织调动资源，推动策略的落地实施; 5．拥有SaaS相关经验优先; 6．良好的团队合作和沟通能力，具备系统思考能力、逻辑思维能力、分析能力、快速准确的理解能力、以结果为导向;工作积极主动，有责任心，耐心、热情，能从容面对并解决业务方提出的各类问题; 7．极强的自我驱动力，执行力和抗压力强，主动性高，强烈的目标感，优秀的自我管理能力。

The Role  The Internal Training Specialist role is responsible for empowering all Airwallex Sales Team employees with training and education on Airwallex product and process. This role lives and breathes in the ability to function beyond an educator; it is also a strategic go-to-market partner, as well as a trusted advocate for our merchants and Sales team members in communicating back to product developers and process owners. It requires endless proactivity, ingenuity, and meaningful internal and external communication.  Specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to Training Expertise Become an expert in payment industry by working with product development teams to understand their release cycles and socialize new features.  Lead the way in building and presenting curriculum and high quality training for audiences big and small, including 1on1 sessions.  Develop and partner in the creation of training programs and individual training curriculum -- including but not limited to documentation, video, web-based e-Learning tutorials, etc.  Discover, recommend and socialize new workflows to facilitate change management via training & education. Cross-functional Collaboration Develop connections with internal teams throughout the company to further key relationships and shared goals.  Communicating back to product teams and process owners of commercial team’s feedback and get things improved.  Develop relationships with new employees to aid in their onboarding training.  Develop relationships with veteran employees to aid in ongoing educational opportunities.  Qualifications Has excellent presentation, communication and interpersonal skills. Has 5+ years formal training-related experience Is passionate about leaning into new ideas and helping others overcome legacy concepts. Is flexible amid an ever-changing and growing environment. Is willing & able to run lean with a DIY mentality. Has a passion and curiosity to explore an evolving industry. Has the skill to design & create easy to understand documentation and graphics for training curriculum. Related industry experience is a plus, such as financial service, payment, ecomm, etc Prior experience of leading a project or managing people is a strong plus.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Financial Services

jobTitle: 2022 Budweiser APAC Technology & Analytics Management Trainee Intern Program
description: Job Description  Anheuser-Busch InBev is a publicly traded company (Euronext: ABI) based in Leuven, Belgium, with secondary listings on the Mexico (MEXBOL: ANB) and South Africa (JSE: ANH) stock exchanges and with American Depositary Receipts on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: BUD).  We are AB InBev. Committed to driving growth that leads to better living for more people in more places. Through brands and experiences that bring people together. Through the dedication to brewing the best beer with the best ingredients. And through the commitment to helping farmers, retailers, entrepreneurs, and communities grow.  Our diverse portfolio of well over 500 beer brands includes global brands Budweiser, Corona and Stella Artois; multi-country brands Beck’s, Castle, Castle Light, Leffe and Hoegaarden; and local champions such as Aguila, Antarctica, Bud Light, Brahma, Cass, Chernigivske, Cristal, Harbin, Jupiler, Klinskoye, Michelob Ultra, Modelo Especial, Quilmes, Victoria, Sedrin, Sibirskaya Korona, and Skol.  At present, AB InBev has 35 world-class breweries in more than a dozen provinces in China, with a total of nearly 19,000 employees. The diversified business layout and balanced development in mature and emerging markets have enabled Budweiser to give full play to its comprehensive advantages and continue to achieve impressive results. According to 2018 statistics, Budweiser’s total global revenue reached US$54.6 billion (excluding joint ventures and affiliates).  Budweiser Brewing Company APAC Limited is the largest beer company in Asia Pacific by retail sales value in 2018. The company produce, import, market, distribute and sell a portfolio of more than 50 beer brands, which it own or have licensed, including Budweiser, Stella Artois, Corona, Hoegaarden, Cass and Harbin. The principal markets of the company are China, South Korea, India and Vietnam.  2022 Technology And Analytics Management Trainee Program Overview  Technology and Analytics Management Trainee program is designed with the aim to attract and develop young graduates with high technical potential and outstanding learning agility to be our future technical leaders.  Talents in our TMT Program will have the great opportunities to experience and witness the digital transformation journey at Budweiser APAC by applying leading technology and analytics to engage our business partners and consumers, transform the business operation model, re-design E2E architecture and platform from Commercial, Procurement, Supply to Logistics across the board.  We convert TMTs from our TMT interns. We will extend full-time TMT offers to TMT Interns who have successfully completed the TMT Internship.  We Will Offer Internship Opportunities In The Following Areas Data Science (Recommender System, Forecasting, NLP, Computer Vision) DevOps (Developer, Testing, Platform, Vue, React, Spring Cloud) Product (UI, UE) TechOps (Architecture, Infrastructure, Cyber & Security) Job QualificationsQualifications Ph. D/Master/Bachelor’s candidates to be graduated in 2023 Majoring in Computer relevant areas, include but not limited in Computer Science/ information technology / Mathematics/ Physics / Statistics / Software Engineering, etc Have strong curiosity in keep learning leading technology Fluent in Chinese and English Ambitious and self-driven Adaptive, comfortable with ambiguity Legally authorized to work in China. If you have any questions, please contact: APAC.HQ.TMTProgram@Budweiserapac.com. (Please upload your CV and GPA Transcripts after you login Taleo)  Job  Talent Programs  Primary Location  China-Shanghai  Schedule  Part-time  Job Posting  May 23, 2021, 11:00:13 PM  Unposting Date  Ongoing
industries: Information Technology and Services, Consumer Goods, and Financial Services

description: 工作职责:  Elite Trainee Program  The Elite Trainee Program of TKE aims to select and train young talents with leadership potential, develop them through structure rotation, training, stretch assignment with mentoring support from management, fill them in the frontline leadership pipeline and train them with cross functional management abilities.  Training Plan Training Period: 18~24 months Centralized Training: the centralized training will be scattered in two years, which includes professional knowledge, basic techniques, practical operation of Elevators/Escalators, management and soft skills, advanced training etc.. Rotation Practice: the company will provide cross functional rotation practice to the participants through learning professional knowledge, completing challenging tasks, the assessment system and regular mentoring dialogue to care about and support their growth and career development. Career Development After 2 years, the company will offer the participants the stretch positions like project manager or similar level. For over 4 years, the participants will be promoted to department manager/above level. Position  Elite Trainee (Sales Support Management/Project Management)  Working location: Shanghai  Job Description Participate in manufacturing projects under the guidance of the mentor, learn project process and management of China manufacturing. Be familiar with the production process and operation management through structured rotation. Cooperate with relevant departments and colleagues to develop the company business. 任职条件: Bachelor degree or above, graduate in 2021/2022 or less than 2 years’ experience. Major in mechanical engineering, automation, electronics, industrial engineering or electrical engineering or related. Be curious, strong learning ability. Leadership potential, good communication ability. Reliability and credibility, good team spirit. Result orientation, react effectively to pressure and challenge. Good command of both oral and written English. Be willing to work across the country.

公司介绍： 【始祖使命】 始祖科技致力于提升中国制造企业的生产与流通效率，用数智赋能中国制造。 始祖科技由哈佛学子创立，团队毕业于北大，清华，中科院计算研究所，哈工大等国内外知名院校，在字节，腾讯，西门子，大众等工业与互联网企业有丰富工作经验。 始祖科技通过为中国传统制造业客户提供SaaS软件系统产品（制造业云端MES生产执行系统和ERP企业资源管理软件）与Al解决方案,为客户打造一站式智能化产品，帮助企业降本增效，提升质量品质，做出更数据驱动的决策，实现数字化和智能化转型。 --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 【职位描述】 1．通过各种渠道开发新客户和维护老客户，完成企业客户拜访和销售指标，跟客户公司的法人代表或市场负责人进行洽谈跟进服务以此达成合作; 2.配合区域营销完成平台方案路演、产品演示，根据企业客户需求提供文字、PPT解决方案，并展现出良好的职业素质和形象;根据实际情况，协调现场实施顾问解决客户问题，为客户提供咨询服务，准确识别和理解客户需求，并将客户需求和反馈进行收集分析，并收集客户新需求并反馈给后台运营; 3．完成公司下达的企业客户签约、试点项目上线和全面推广任务;对老客户进行定期维护，包括咨询跟进、问题处理、培训提升、知识库汇总等支持服务;及时了解客户需求，把握客户心理，完成销售，维护客户粘性; 4．建立客户档案，洞察客户的生命周期，针对不同阶段客户给予相应的支持; 5．对产品的日常使用行为数据进行分析，形成改进方案，推动产品功能和客户体验的优化;维护品牌口碑并将来自市场的信息; 6.负责完成续费、增购，具备—定的销售能力。 【职位要求】 1.21-30岁大专及以上学历，有经验者可放宽，熟悉B2B、SAAS、产业互联网平台产品及业务推广模式; 2,熟悉ToB销售模式，具备拓展客户资源和谈判能力; 3.有云计算、大数据、Al、SaaS、营销科技、行业软件、企业信息化/数字化解决方案以及集成类项目销售工作经验优先;有稳定行业客户资源和人脉者优先;在以往销售经历有top销售经验优先; 4．优秀文字表达能力，PPT、Word撰写及Excel建模能力;熟练掌握思维导图等提案工具;通过实践摸索，积累销售方法论和自己的见解; 5．性格外向、表达能力强，具有较强的沟通能力及交际技巧;对销售工作有极高 的热情; 6.良好的团队合作和沟通能力，具备系统思考能力、逻辑思维能力、分析能力、快速准确的理解能力、以结果为导向;工作积极主动，有责任心，耐心、热情，能从容面对并解决业务方提出的各类问题; 7．极强的自我驱动力，执行力和抗压力强，主动性高，强烈的目标感，优秀的自 我管理能力; 8．欢迎优秀的应届毕业生以及愿意挑战自我。  8000/月，按回款提成，交通补助，话补，年终奖，绩效奖金

职位来源于实习僧。  职位信息  一、岗位职责：  负责Amazon平台英国站的运营工作，根据公司的总体销售策略以及销售目标制定销售计划，达成团队和个人业绩。主要内容：  1、审查产品的图片、描述、价格，服务条款等，完善产品的上架工作；  2、维护和优化listing页面，跟进市场行情，制定合理有竞争的销售价格；  3、对产品进行广告投放和站内推广，提高曝光度和产品排名，提升转化率和成交量；  4、分析销售数据和库存数据，结合市调和历史数据预估未来销量，制定销售策略和备货计划（FBA和海外仓），保持健康的库存周转；  5、及时了解行业动向、价格体系、新政策信息并执行所负责品类的促销计划；  6、对接产品和客服部门，共同提高产品质量、客户好评率和满意度，提升产品的复购率和客户忠诚度。  二、岗位要求：  1、本科及以上学历，德语四级或B2以上水平；  2、较强的逻辑思维能力，擅长数据分析，对市场和客户需求敏感；  3、对跨境电商有浓厚的兴趣和激情，有条理性，能承受压力，有开拓创新精神；  4、工作态度认真负责，有良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神。  公司福利：  工作时间：实行5天半工作制、每天工作7.5小时。周一至周五时间：（9:00-12：00,13:30-18:00）。 周六工作时间：（9:00-12:00）  年终抽奖：公司按照员工全年的绩效情况及公司的经营情况发放年终奖金。  员工奖金： 公司每季度评选优秀员工并发放特别奖金，以鼓励其为公司做出的贡献。  浮动底薪：根据业务的增长，增长相应底薪，以资鼓励。  带薪假期：员工除了享有法律法规规定的假期外，按照工龄还可享受到5天、10天、15天不等的带薪年假。  拓展旅游：为了让员工在努力工作的同时享受生活，达到工作与生活的平衡，公司每年度会不定期组织员工旅游度假。  趣味活动：公司特点是员工年轻化（90后居多），在这年轻有活力的团队，公司定期组织集体趣味活动，丰富员工生活，提高正能量。  保险：为保障员工的生活，公司为每一个员工购买五险与重大疾病险。  生日会：员工生日发放生日金。  补贴：餐补。  住宿：公司提供住宿。  工作地点：郑州市金水区民航路15号（英协路和民航路交叉口）企业壹号 801室  联系人：薛小姐  职位薪资：  100-150/天

jobTitle: 商务总监助理（三方岗）-上海
description: 工作职责:  1、定期更新政府部门要求的各种文件，管理商务合同；  2、人事档案管理；  3、按时上交各种报告，如：人事编制、医院和商业报表等；  4、协调和支持各类销售市场活动，如：学术会议，内、外部培训等；  5、确保公司内部和公司外部的有效沟通；  6、为区域日常运作提供秘书服务，协助商务总监处理相关行政和销售事务。  任职条件:  1、本科学历，英语/文秘专业优先；  2、至少2年以上相关工作经验；  3、良好的英语口头、书面沟通及电脑操作能力；  4、良好的沟通技巧

职位来源于实习僧。  Job Location: Shanghai, China  Reporting Line: Head of Operation  Salary & benefits: benefits according to local law, plus international medical insurance  Word Permit: Available  Company Profile  HSC (Houghton Street Consulting) is a leading TPA company in insurance consulting industry. We provide full-scope solution to insurance companies from product design, sales management, operation outsourcing and reinsurance management. With representative offices all over Asia, we have developed as the top service provider for global and local insurers Asia-wide.  Job Description Assist Head of Operation to monitor performance of all functions by following KPI system. Coordinate among different functions to ensure smooth workflows. Involve in various operation functions’ improvement and update SOP documents. Help various operation functions to properly manage filing and documentation. Assist in new projects launching as a project manager, making sure all lines are following planned schedule and delivering expected results. Requirements Open to any major Fluent English reading and writing Patient and strong sense of responsibility Good coordination skills and problem-solving ability Excellent interpersonal communication skills 职位薪资：  100-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.hsc-insurance.com

职位来源于实习僧。  （2021届）  岗位职责：  1、负责处理海外客户咨询、业务合作及投诉（售后）的服务需求；  2、及时处理海外服务的客户服务需求，解答并做客户资料记录；  3、处理客户关于产品质量的投诉，做好安抚及解答工作；  4、跟进客诉全环节，含物流跟进，客户回访等；  5、对有业务需求的客户信息，转接给对应负责人跟进处理；  6、记录每通客户信息，含客户联系方式及问题解决情况，完善新增客户资料；  7、负责海外产品的FAQ等产品资料文档的输出和翻译工作，以及服务器归档/管理工作。  工作要求：  1、全日制本科及以上学历，专业不限，德语专四/英语CET-6/日语N2，口语流利；  2、具备良好听说读写能力，熟练使用自动化办公软件等； 具备一定的客户沟通技巧，具备商务谈判能力、团队管理能力、组织协调和沟通能力、处理突发事件的能力。  薪资情况：  管培生综合年薪范围10万+；3-6个月通过培训考核晋升后调薪并有提成，年薪均为15万以上；3个月一个考核周期，火箭式晋升渠道，更有机会直达百万合伙人。  公司福利：  【浩方生态日】每个月最后一个工作日是浩方纪念情和承载情的日子，当天组织丰富多样的生态日活动“宠物狂欢”“ COSPLAY”“家人聚会”“吃货大放送”等等  【薪资福利】提供有市场竞争力的薪酬福利，火箭式晋升通道直达百万合伙人，还有丰厚的月度绩效奖金；若本科应届生申请落户深圳后，还可享有个人申报深圳住房补贴一次性即可领取15000元，硕士应届生25000元  【社保福利】入职即购买深圳市五险一金，养老、医疗、生育、失业和工伤保险，住房公积金  【舒适办公】360度全景落地窗的办公环境、绿色视野，坐落在现代创新园区一南山智园  【健康养生】公司提供全新的健身场地，专业健身器材供锻炼身体；还有年度体检  【幸福班车】浩方集团指定优享滴滴专车来保障员工回家幸福之路的安全。  【晚餐保障】免费供应线上订餐，多款营养膳食自由搭配舒适的就餐环境，方便每个员工吃上温暖的晩餐。  【甜蜜下午茶】公司贴心为同事每周都会准备美味应季的下午茶福利，惊喜满满。  【假期福利】周末双休，国家法定节假日、产假、婚假、带薪年假、节日特色礼包等。  【特色社群】瑜伽、羽毛球，神跑队，瑜伽，奶茶等有趣社区群，不定时组织有趣的户外扩展活动。  【股票期权和年终奖】公司核心骨干和未来中高管理层将会获得期权及年终奖福利。  为什么选择我们：  1、生态链布局，从0到1打造爆品  浩方集团通过为科创项目的成长加速提供创投服务、经验分享及资源共享，为全产业链各环节企业创造并实现价值连接，形成浩方集团独有的生态链布局。  2、品牌出海  通过与跨境电商优质生态链资源合作，浩方在帮助本地企业扩大海外销售的同时，优化产品结构和品牌意识，实现中国制造产品的品牌出海战略实施。  3、聚焦科创战略  旗下的浩方创投坚持为初创优秀企业提供支持，助力创新项目的孵化以及在全球范围内的快速成长，最大化地实现中国创新的价值。  4、始终相信年轻人  我们有25岁的合伙人、23岁的经理，下一个记录，你敢来打破吗？  职位薪资：  150-300/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.hofan.cn/

工作职责:  Job Overview  The Integrated Marketing Intern will support and implement ad-hoc marketing tasks, social media posts, campaign localization and events. As an intern, you will work with cross-functional teams from TE´s Energy Business Unit including sales, product management and the marketing team. You will get exposure to China and other APAC stakeholders and work with diverse cultural backgrounds.  Responsibilities Support and implement ad-hoc marketing tasks including translation, printing, giveaways, purchasing orders and payment follow up Assist in creation of content for social media posts, videos and other marketing collaterals such as brochures or catalogs Assist in the improvement of our webpage: improve translation, update/remove content Support events organization including webinars, seminars, trade shows Assist in launching new products when required Measure and report the results of marketing initiatives Research and evaluate the competitors marketing and digital content 任职条件:  Qualifications University under-graduated or above; majored in Marketing, Business or English is preferred Fluent in English Good Microsoft Office Skills; Photoshop & Adobe Illustration is preferred Detail-oriented, good learning attitude and cross function communication skills Durations 3-4 working days per week From 6 months to 1 year – negotiable

该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述：  The Business  Our Solution Is Including  At Willis Towers Watson, we help clients align their talent and rewards strategy with their business strategy to achieve long-term success. We rely on data, analytics and experience to pinpoint the talent and workforce needs that are vital to their overall performance. We develop compensation and broader rewards strategies and design and implement programs that address these needs, drive higher performance and ensure the right return on their investment in people. Backed by industry-leading technology, global workforce data, research and insights, we help our clients quickly transform ideas into action. Executive Compensation – We help management teams and board members create and implement pay programs that balance the interests of key stakeholders while driving performance and long-term alignment Rewards – We build and implement leading-edge organization, job and reward framework solutions that create an engaging employee experience and deliver the right return on investment to the organization Rewards Data and Software – We support our clients throughout the year as they develop and design an effective compensation strategy. From survey submission to job evaluation and everything in between, we bring a powerful combination of market-leading data, enterprise-strength technology and industry expertise to their pay programs — giving them clients everything they need to get compensation right for their organizations Talent Management & Organizational Alignment: We design the work experience to attract, retain and motivate people helping organizations optimize the way work gets done and drive performance by connecting the demand and supply for talent. Employee Insights: We help clients improve business performance by enabling them to better understand their employees’ perspectives, and take actions to improve employee engagement and company culture. Our Employee Engagement Software allows clients to quickly access employee opinions and reactions to events, giving leaders insight to enhance the employee experience. The Role  As an Analyst in Talent & Rewards, you will work beside some of the industry’s top consultants while you develop cutting edge technical knowledge and skills.  You will have immediate exposure to real client assignments which will draw on your imagination and creativity as well as your ability to analyze information, draw conclusions and present results. These experiences will help build your technical knowledge and overall industry expertise while you benefit from more structured learning interventions that are tailored to the business area you join.  Performance Objectives  Clients Collect and analyses data through market research including in-house and other data sources; Prepare letters and reports, client presentations and meetings, and proposals; Summarize and form conclusions based on analysis, and presenting results internally and with clients; Interact with clients in client engagements; Develop technical knowledge surrounding rewards, talent and performance management; Financial Meet chargeable hours targets; Contribute to sales and marketing efforts by supplying information for proposals; People Build relationship internally and collaborate effectively on cross-functional teams; Collaborate with others by conveying ideas, issues and information in a fluent and logical manner and providing constructive peer feedback; Demonstrate natural ease and effectiveness when dealing with clients/colleagues at all levels;  Excellence An eye for details, analytical, meticulous, insightful with a structured thought process; Intellectual curiosity and learning ability; Deliver on projects to meet or exceed client expectations; 任职要求：  The Requirements Bachelor’s degree above in economics, human resources, psychology, management, finance, mathematics, statistics, social science or any other major with significant quantitative course work, and a strong academic record; A problem solver: Be able to identify and solve challenging problems; Analytical: Be able to draw conclusions from data in a logical, systematic way; Conceptual: Be ability to go beyond the details and see the big picture; Results-driven: Be focused on achieving results that promote business success; Organized: Be able to work and think in a methodical and orderly way: Committed to quality: Continuously works to achieve the highest quality standards on works and able to meet tight deadlines Team player: Ability to work independently as well as in a team; Well-developed: Analytical, quantitative, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills; Good knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint is essential.

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责：  1、 完成销售数据整理、分析；  2、 完成部门会议纪要整理；  3、 完成部门行政事务支持；  4、 其它交办的日常事务。  招聘要求：  1、 本科以上在校生，金融、经济类相关专业；  2、 工作认真细致，有较强责任心，沟通能力良好；  3、 熟练使用各类office软件；  4、 对基金行业有兴趣，并有一定认识；  5、 每周保证4-5天实习.  职位薪资：  80-100/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：http://ftsfund.com/

职位来源于实习僧。  【We Are FMC/我们是谁】  FMC旨在支持猎头顾问持续成长，用团队的连接与协作助力个人梦想的实现！  21年的发展，丰富了我们的履历，也让我们更好地为大家创造价值： 我们是国内非常关注成长的综合性猎头公司，成立21年来专精于中高端人才招聘业务。 我们的业务覆盖互联网、新零售、先进制造、新能源汽车、大健康、金融及大地产等行业领域。 我们的客户爸爸有腾讯、阿里、B站、小红书、泡泡玛特、逸仙电商、喜茶、可口可乐、BP等独角兽及外资五百强客户。 我们的团队遍及北上广深及苏州、成都、武汉等全国各地及海外，团队朝气蓬勃，超有爱~ 我们有着富有前瞻性的企业文化格局，我们有着丰富多样的行业&客户资源，我们有着合理体系化的猎头成长体系&晋升机制……我们是Future Management Consulting！ 【Why Becoming ARecruiter/为什么要当猎头】 直接原因：猎头行业收入高，且收入公平，努力就有offer~财务自由指日可待~ 落实到日常的原因：猎头工作能让你快速提高人际沟通能力与识人判事能力。拥有这些从事任何职业都需要的技能，让你更难被“AI”取代！ 具有长远价值的原因：猎头能与行业内优秀人才打交道，丰富阅历，积累人脉资源。从顶尖人才身上学习，帮助你更好地规划与实现个人职业发展！ 【What FMC Can Offer You/我们能给你】 拒绝“水实习”！量身定制的体系化成长课程+1v1Leader专业带教+开放共享的内部学习资源，让你搭上成长快线！ 拒绝“办公室竞争”！团结友善的工作氛围+日常走心的工作福利+高端明亮的工作环境，让你工作有滋有味~ 拒绝“求职卷”！高转正留用率，毕业直通offer~（实习生） 收获Leader职业经验分享、开拓眼界与格局、扩展人脉、丰富履历……你想要的我们都有！ 【We Need You/我们需要你】 在资深猎头顾问的指导下，理解客户及客户的招聘需求； 通过公司内部系统以及外部招聘渠道，寻找符合职位需求的候选人, 进行联系与筛选； 安排并参与由资深猎头主导的候选人面试，整理候选人简历信息做成推荐报告； 及时将候选人的相关信息录入人才系统； 猎头顾问安排的其他工作。 【We Are Looking For/我们希望你】 全日制统招本科及以上学历，专业不限，经验不限； 每周能工作三天以上，持续三个月及以上者优先，有转正机会； 熟悉使用计算机办公软件； 具备极强的自我驱动力与学习能力，热爱挑战与自我成长，能适应快节奏的工作方式； 思路清晰，逻辑成熟，拥有良好的沟通协调能力与服务意识； 拥有较强的责任感与抗压性，分享共赢的价值观。 职位薪资：  120-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.fmces.com

jobTitle: 新华三大学-培训运营专员
description: 工作职责:  1、培训交付管理：课程项目交付资源管理、课程学员服务、课程项目收支管理。  2、培训资源管理：讲师、供应商等资源管理及流程优化  资源采购流程优化  教室等平台资源管理+。  3、平台系统运维管理：教学数字化转型工作交付侧支撑  大讲堂等学习平台运维管理  交付管理系统运维管理。  4、配合主管开展业务预算规划及核算工作  根据业务运营指标体系，建立业务运营多维度分析模板，开发并不断更新各类报告模板，为管理层决策提供有质量的分析支持  5、负责内部运营平台优化，主动发现、收集并整合与业务运营相关的数字化转型需求，并推动开发落地。  任职条件:  1、具备较强的组织协调能力、项目管理、流程建设及质量管控能力  2、熟练使用WORD、EXCEL、PPT等办公软件  精通Excel、Visio、PPT，掌握SQL,BI,MATLAB等数据分析相关工具为加分项。  3、具备良好的人际沟通和协调能力，有较强的分析与解决问题的能力  4、有责任心，上进心，吃苦耐劳，具有较强的团队合作精神  5、本科及以上学历。
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Internet

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Our Opening and Your Responsibilities  Are you looking for a successful career start after your graduation? Do you have a good backpack full of theoretical knowledge and want to gain practical experience? Then take your chance and join the Digital Talent Graduate Program.  Within Digital Business Services, we are looking for motivated and target oriented individuals willing to start their career in a challenging environment. Your responsibilities will be impactful, and will give you a good overview of the business, with mentoring by and collaboration with local and global management. The assignments within the program will be tailored to you, depending on your skill set and your preferences. Over a period of 18 months, you will be able to expand your knowledge and your network within different Business Units. Start date is September 1, 2021.  Our Responsibilities： Unit 1: Digital Business Services -4 assignments – Digital Business Services is a business focused and modern digitalization organization in METTLER TOLEDO that covers everything from infrastructure, applications, data and reporting to projects such as Blue Ocean Roll-ins, M365 implementation and infrastructure upgrades. Assignments are possible in departments such as Business Applications, Business Technology, Business Transformation, Data Governance, Digital Workplace Solutions, Enterprise Reporting & Analytics, Information Security & Governance Unit 2: China Market Organization – 1 assignment – Our China Market Organization serves the China market with all METTLER TOLEDO products and services. There are interesting departments to choose like Tele-Sales, Marketing, Finance, Customer Engineering or our Service Department Unit 3: Software Development Center – 1 assignment – Software Development Center is a professional software development center, which supports business units in implementing and supporting their Software needs in accordance with METTLER TOLEDO Software Strategies. Possible working assignments are in Testing, Software Development, Product Management, Project Management  What You Need to Succeed： A very good university degree (Master-Diploma) Initial experience and knowledge from internships, working student activities, etc. An entrepreneurial mindset, with a “can do” attitude, and a strong interest for technology and digital solutions Resilience, commitment and the wish to go the extra mile Open to change and with high learning agility Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken

该职位来源于猎聘  The Role  The Internal Training Specialist role is responsible for empowering all Airwallex Sales Team employees with training and education on Airwallex product and process. This role lives and breathes in the ability to function beyond an educator; it is also a strategic go-to-market partner, as well as a trusted advocate for our merchants and Sales team members in communicating back to product developers and process owners. It requires endless proactivity, ingenuity, and meaningful internal and external communication.  Specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to Training Expertise Become an expert in payment industry by working with product development teams to understand their release cycles and socialize new features.  Lead the way in building and presenting curriculum and high quality training for audiences big and small, including 1on1 sessions.  Develop and partner in the creation of training programs and individual training curriculum -- including but not limited to documentation, video, web-based e-Learning tutorials, etc.  Discover, recommend and socialize new workflows to facilitate change management via training & education. Cross-functional Collaboration Develop connections with internal teams throughout the company to further key relationships and shared goals.  Communicating back to product teams and process owners of commercial team’s feedback and get things improved.  Develop relationships with new employees to aid in their onboarding training.  Develop relationships with veteran employees to aid in ongoing educational opportunities.  Qualifications Has excellent presentation, communication and interpersonal skills. Has 5+ years formal training-related experience Is passionate about leaning into new ideas and helping others overcome legacy concepts. Is flexible amid an ever-changing and growing environment. Is willing & able to run lean with a DIY mentality. Has a passion and curiosity to explore an evolving industry. Has the skill to design & create easy to understand documentation and graphics for training curriculum. Related industry experience is a plus, such as financial service, payment, ecomm, etc Prior experience of leading a project or managing people is a strong plus.

公司介绍： 【始祖使命】 始祖科技致力于提升中国制造企业的生产与流通效率，用数智赋能中国制造。 始祖科技由哈佛学子创立，团队毕业于北大，清华，中科院计算研究所，哈工大等国内外知名院校，在字节，腾讯，西门子，大众等工业与互联网企业有丰富工作经验。 始祖科技通过为中国传统制造业客户提供SaaS软件系统产品（制造业云端MES生产执行系统和ERP企业资源管理软件）与Al解决方案,为客户打造一站式智能化产品，帮助企业降本增效，提升质量品质，做出更数据驱动的决策，实现数字化和智能化转型。 --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 【职位描述】 1.关注行业动态和竞品动态，深入用户使用场景，提出合理的产品方案并推动落地，持续创造产品竞争优势，进行产品模式的创新探索与落地; 2．负责企业应用SaaS产品迭代工作，包含产品规划、需求分析、落地实施以及流程与规范的制定; 3.负责SaaS相关产品的结构设计、需求分析、产品设计等，包括且不限于客户管理、订单交易、供应链等模块; 4.有效对接开发、测试、运营团队，实现产品开发管控、上线发布、运营方案实施、用户反馈跟进解决的完整闭环; 5．负责确定相关指标，收集及分析业务数据，持续迭代相关产品。 【职位要求】 6．本科及以上学历，2年以上B端或saaS产品从业经验; 7.熟悉B端产品架构、数据流转逻辑，有较高数据敏感性，逻辑思维能力强，思路清晰而有条理;关注行业动态与发展趋势; 8．良好的团队合作和沟通能力，具备系统思考能力、逻辑思维能力、分析能力、 快速准确的理解能力、以结果为导向;工作积极主动，有责任心，耐心、热情，能从容面对并解决业务方提出的各类问题; 9.极强的自我驱动力，执行力和抗压力强，主动性高，强烈的目标感，优秀的自 我管理能力。  200-250

jobTitle: 实习生（市场品牌营销方向）
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  实习生（市场品牌营销方向）  岗位职责： 品牌搭建：在现有基础上理解并完善品牌形象和市场定位，输出更完整的品牌定位方案， 协助对公司产品的市场调研活动； 品牌传播：制定具体的品牌传播方案，并完成创意与内容产生，实现客户与品牌的良性互动； 市场策划与执行：策划并实施市场宣传活动，搜集客户资源，拓展销售渠道；跟踪并监察各项市场营销计划的执行；参与协助营销、人事完成日常事务； 宣传平台维护：管理对外介绍和宣传的各个平台，形成定期维护流程； 任职要求： 大专及以上学历（在校/应届生均可），热爱市场工作，要求每周至少实习3天以上，最少持续3个月；（热爱中医和中国传统文化者享有优先转正机会） 熟悉品牌策划，有优秀的品牌年度规划、活动策划及营销活动执行能力； 踏实肯干，具有积极进取的精神及接受挑战的性格； 为人诚实、正直，性格开朗、责任心强，擅于与人沟通，自我学习能力强； 具有一定的组织协调能力，能承担和突破工作压力，是很好的时间管理者和自我任务驱动者； 非常强的成长意愿和自我迭代能力，执行力，能够适应不确定性 做过相关工作或实习的优先。 岗位职责： 品牌搭建：在现有基础上理解并完善品牌形象和市场定位，输出更完整的品牌定位方案， 协助对公司产品的市场调研活动； 品牌传播：制定具体的品牌传播方案，并完成创意与内容产生，实现客户与品牌的良性互动； 市场策划与执行：策划并实施市场宣传活动，搜集客户资源，拓展销售渠道；跟踪并监察各项市场营销计划的执行；参与协助营销、人事完成日常事务； 宣传平台维护：管理对外介绍和宣传的各个平台，形成定期维护流程； 任职要求： 大专及以上学历（在校/应届生均可），热爱市场工作，要求每周至少实习3天以上，最少持续3个月；（热爱中医和中国传统文化者享有优先转正机会） 熟悉品牌策划，有优秀的品牌年度规划、活动策划及营销活动执行能力； 踏实肯干，具有积极进取的精神及接受挑战的性格； 为人诚实、正直，性格开朗、责任心强，擅于与人沟通，自我学习能力强； 具有一定的组织协调能力，能承担和突破工作压力，是很好的时间管理者和自我任务驱动者； 非常强的成长意愿和自我迭代能力，执行力，能够适应不确定性 做过相关工作或实习的优先。 职位薪资：  50-100/天

jobTitle: 服装导购/品牌代表Brand Representative
description: 公司简介  Abercrombie & Fitch Co. 是一家全球连锁的专业零售商，旗下品牌 Abercrombie & Fitch, abercrombie kids, 和 Hollister Co. 致力于为有着积极、年轻生活方式的男士、女士和儿童提供高质量的休闲服装。A&F 成立于1892年，总部位于 New Albany, Ohio。A&F 通过设在美国、加拿大、欧洲、亚洲、墨西哥和中东的零售店销售商品。公司同时运营线上购物网站 www. abercrombie.com, www.abercrombiekids.com 和 www.hollisterco.com  职位描述  A&F/Hollister的理想员工是自信的。他们通过观察和响应顾客的要求，提供出色的顾客服务。这样的人性格开朗，风格时尚又乐于助人。他/她们始终通过保持乐观，亲切温暖来展现对店铺环境的敏锐意识。他们也能真诚流畅地与顾客交流，自然与友好的沟通为顾客关系搭建桥梁，从而实现顾客至上的服务理念。举止充满关怀、自信和有吸引力，最终成功完成每一笔交易。  职位要求  学历：全职：要求高中文凭/高中同等学历。兼职/实习：无学历要求。  零售经验：全职：要求1-2年客户服务经验。 兼职/实习：无需专业零售经验。  主管/管理经验：全职：无需主管/管理经验。 拥有1-2年主管经验者优先考虑。兼职/实习：无需主管/管理经验。  工作时间安排要求  全职 - 每周工作40个小时。品牌代表需要在大部分周六和/或周日以及在节假日高峰的几周期间工作。具体的工作时数和天数可能因业务 、中国法律及雇用合同（如有）而有所不同。  兼职 - 每周平均有2-3次轮班，每次轮班大约4-5小时。轮班时间有弹性。  实习 - 每周小于40个小时。工作时间有弹性。  您需要哪些能力来胜任这个职位  适应能力/灵活变通能力 乐于助人  压力承受能力 性格开朗  应用学习 风格时尚  同时处理多重任务 沟通  职业道德  您将从职位中学到什么  全职 - 领导能力 监督卖场  全职/兼职/实习 - 业务了解 关注细节  任务  门店运营（仅全职）- 执行所有收银机职能和现金相关程序。根据需要监督卖场，以确保顾客体验到达公司标准，包括最大程度减少排队情况和确保卖场有适当的员工部署。  顾客体验 -与顾客沟通并协助客户，以确保他们在店内获得出色的购物体验。洞察顾客需求、领会身体语言和根据线索帮助顾客。随时掌握商品选择的最新资讯，并使用建议性的销售方式/与顾客分享全套服装搭配技巧。提供以顾客为中心的店内体验，确保快速、轻松和气氛活跃的购物体验。遵守所有试衣间流程。  商店成列和卖场 - 通过根据USR报告、计划和视觉指南完成和设计所有购物台面层次以及人体模型和展品的变化，维持和更新整合商店的视觉和成列标准。清洁、整理和维护商店。核查尺寸供应情况、高效和快速地补充商品以及确保指定区域标准化，商品被熨烫并叠放整齐，以方便购物。完成商品补货。确保每间试衣间干净且没有损坏。  沟通 - 与他人建立和谐的工作关系。让经理了解顾客与商品（列如摆放、供应情况和顾客试衣）和业务流程（例如在收银台或试衣间的长队伍）问题。以适当的方式及时与他人沟通。尊重并重视他人的多样性。  资产保护和盘亏 - 遵守公司的所有安防政策，包括手册政策，以及管理指示和指派。遵守个人仪表的着装要求指南（例如整洁、适当着装）。遵守有关商店开门营业和关闭的标准程序。换班时，及时到达、打卡上班和打卡下班。操作收银机和所有销售点（POS）设备。  培训和发展 - 作为团队成员，积极参与实现团队目标。参加培训会议，以确保符合公司标准（例如五分钟会议）。寻求、听取并利用反馈，以提升工作绩效。  请至https://careers.hollisterco.com/ 或 https://careers.abercrombie.com/ 提交申请  官方招聘微博 @WORKAT_ANFHCO  Powered by JazzHR  u29Sh5bvQH
industries: Apparel & Fashion, Nonprofit Organization Management, and Retail

jobTitle: Assistant Recruitment Manager, Student Recruitment Beijing, China
description: Description  Assistant Recruitment Manager, Student Recruitment  Beijing, China  About Us  Shorelight is reinventing the international education experience for both students and universities. In partnership with leading U.S. institutions, we build innovative degree programs—whether on campus or cloud-based, in the United States or students’ home countries—that help students thrive and create a new generation of successful, globally minded alumni.  Job Overview  The Assistant Recruitment Manager, Student Recruitment, assists in executing a student recruitment strategy across North China that targets international students seeking U.S. university degrees. The role includes account management of Shorelight’s regional network of recruiters, schools, and universities, along with building and managing direct-to-student marketing campaigns that drive enrollments to Shorelight’s university partners.  Essential Functions Execute Shorelight’s university partners’ student recruitment strategies, partnering with the Recruitment Manager as well as Shorelight’s Global Marketing Team for all marketing and advertising strategies and collateral Help manage key channel accounts and partnerships to achieve enrollment targets for all university partnerships Maintain a data-driven approach to recruitment, monitoring enrollment trends, and reporting on all phases of recruitment process to the Recruitment Manager, using technology systems Maintain maximum levels of competitor awareness, product knowledge, and market intelligence Travel extensively to attend recruitment and outreach activities, seminars, conferences, meetings, and training events to build strong and lasting relationships with current and prospective students, families, faculty, staff, agents, partners, and other external institutions and vendors Execute efficient and streamlined processes for all stages of the recruitment process (inquiry, application, assessment, offer, acceptance, visa applications, orientation, etc.) with a strong focus on conversion of inquiries to applications Work effectively with the university liaisons to ensure smooth entry into the school or program (working with finance offices on incoming deposits, tracking of payments, processing of agent contracts and commissions, as necessary; assisting incoming students with form completion; coordinating arrival transportation for new, incoming students; etc.) Minimum Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or above, preferably in marketing, communications, business, international relations, or related area Proficient in English, Native in Chinese 3+ years of experience in the international education/recruitment industry in North China Strong sales and account management skills Proven track record of working collaboratively in a matrix governance model Proficient with technology and reporting programs/systems Excellent communication and presentation skills Exemplary customer service skills and ability to foster a customer service ethic within the work team Willingness to travel Eligibility to work in the hiring location without sponsorship Preferred Qualifications Strategic-minded and sales-driven, with strong drive for results, and pressure-resilient Existing network and relationships within the education industry in North China; strong working knowledge of key international markets, programs, and products; and US higher education are all pluses Application Process  To apply for this position, please visit the Shorelight Careers page to submit an application with a resume and cover letter or send application to [email protected]  Shorelight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
industries: Nonprofit Organization Management, Higher Education, and Education Management

description: 我们是华为背景的企业管理咨询公司--诚易达咨询。  职位描述： 负责策划、营销推广、运营、销售公司业务；打造品牌； 任职要求： 1、本科以上，有互联网思维，有互联网/新媒体推广经验优先录取； 2、积极向上勤奋努力，沟通能力强、有良好的团队合作精神。 3、具备优秀的服务意识，能以客户为中心，准确理解客户需求；有很强的责任心，把客户的事情当作自己的事业！  薪酬待遇：： 1、待遇面议(优于市场水平);很高的销售提成！ 2、工作满半年的员工，表现优秀者有机会获得股权激励。 3、能全面学习华为等标杆管理知识；与高水平的咨询专家们一起共事，将是极好的学习和锻炼，眼界水平等将得到大幅度提升。

jobTitle: Life Science Commercial Leadership Trainee - VOYAGE Program
description: 工作职责:  Program VOYAGE provides a unique opportunity for highly talented and motivated leaders to gain valuable experience and training in the multifaceted disciplines of Life Science Commercial. Throughout this program, members will experience rotational assignments covering functions like Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain or eCommerce , while actively contributing to our core business and various projects. After assignments at your home base in China, you will get the opportunity to experience cultural differences in another APAC country and expand your network.  任职条件:  MBA in Leadership, Commercial Functions and/or Digital and degree in Natural Science (e.g. (Bio-)Chemistry, Biology).  Minimum of 2-3 years of prior work experience with first exposure to supervision/management and/or strong preference for people leadership.  Outstanding academic performance (top scores)  International experience  High learning and change agility, curiosity and aspiration  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, authenticity and resilience as a leader  Strong interest in digital, data and analytics, as well as commercial awareness and result-orientation  Fluency in English  What we offer: With us, there are always opportunities to break new ground. We empower you to fulfil your ambitions, and our diverse businesses offer various career moves to seek new horizons. We trust you with responsibility early on and support you to draw your own career map that is responsive to your aspirations and priorities in life. Join us and bring your curiosity to life!  Do you want to become a VOYAGER? Apply and find more information at come2merck.com

Ensure achievement of training goals Conduct Orientation Training for each new hire Select training supplier and coordinate training arrangement Training needs analysis and helps implement Training course effectively Skills And Experience： Bachelors Degree Minimum 1-2 years of experience in a similar role Ability to build relationships and partner with sales force Strong presentation skills Good understanding of MS-Office Strong business acumen Fluent both in English and Chinese

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责： 负责潜在销售线索的追踪和回访，包括品牌和产品介绍； 负责外展活动的现场，支持公司新店的开设； 负责展厅Walk-in用户的接待； 协助试驾和销售转化，配合完成销售、服务和交付等任务； 会做简单的Excel，试驾单，数据统计，车辆的准备工作； 根据业务发展需要，完成团队指定的其他工作。 任职要求：- 每周能保证5天以上的实习时间（含周六周日）； 积极主动热情，具有团队工作意识和一定的抗压能力； 有新零售/中高端汽车/奢侈品销售和市场实习经验的优先考虑； 表现优秀的有留用的机会； 良好的抗压能力、耐心细致、责任心强； 具备良好的沟通和表达能力。 职位薪资：  150-200/天

Overview Of The Role  As an Associate, you will have responsibility for project managing all compensation and benefits surveys and consulting assignments for a specified industry (either Real Estate or Manufacturing or Consumer) across Mainland China.  You will be the main point of contact for clients within your industry and will be responsible for Market research in support of business development initiatives Design of HR trends/ pulse surveys and events Consulting projects such as: Market pricing, compensation/ benefit audits and special/ customized industry surveys Performance Objectives  Excellence Be the Industry Champion by building strong industry expertise in designated industry sector 'portfolio' through proactive research and following of industry market trends Manage all GDS activities for specified industry group, paying strict adherence to project management techniques and client requirements Champion regional and firm-wide survey methodologies and processes specifically helping clients to match their jobs to the WillisTowers Watson Total Reward Survey Ensure data checks, validation and analysis are appropriately carried out in order to guarantee that clients’ compensation and benefits data submissions are properly checked for completeness, accuracy and consistency Utilize regional and firm-wide survey methodologies and processes to ensure professional standards and excellence in client service Help improve work processes to achieve higher quality and efficiency People Work as a supportive and collaborative member of the China GDS team Build and develop a team of high performing associates committed to client satisfaction through excellence and continuous improvement Identify training and development needs and provide effective coaching to associates Clients Establish a trusted advisor jobTitle: 研究部实习生 Research Intern
description: 工作职责:  仲量联行拥有业界最全面的研究体系和专业团队对中国房地产市场进行研究。仲量联行研究部拥有超过50位专业研究人员，我们对高速发展的新兴领域和不断变化的市场基本面展开研究，为开发商、投资者和企业提供新颖的、高价值的房地产分析和数据。房地产市场研究团队致力于找出与房地产相关的各行业市场趋势，提供客观的、基于事实的房地产市场分析和评论。在向国内外投资者和开发商提供投资咨询方面，中国研究团队也有着不菲的业绩，提供了许多针对性的房地产市场研究报告。  团队目前正在寻找一位对数据收集和处理熟悉的实习生，以支持我们为客户提供有关华南地区房地产市场的深入见解和分析的工作。这是一个成为在行业知名的跨国企业中屡获殊荣的团队一份子的绝佳机会。该职位可以接触到业界最强大的物业和经济数据库，以及与各主要业务线和大型海内外客户的接触机会。在仲量联行研究部，您不仅将面临数据分析方面的挑战，同时也有机会获得在一家国际知名企业成长的潜力。  主要工作职责包括但不限于以下三方面： 负责房地产市场研究过程中的物业数据和经济调研、搜集、更新、统计、分析 利用MS Office进行数据分析和协助撰写报告； 协助监测房地产市场的发展，为研究项目提供支持。 任职条件: 硕士研究生以上（在校生）学历，经济学/城市规划/房地产经营管理相关专业者优先； Excel/PowerPoint 技能良好，懂得数据搜集，数据统计，表格制作； 具备一定的英语读写及翻译能力； 懂得使用ArcGIS者更佳。 具备较强的学习理解能力，以及良好的沟通和团队协作能力； 具有较强的数据敏感度和逻辑分析能力，能具备一定的独立调研能力。 欢迎有兴趣的同学，投简历至hr.gz@ap.jll.com，格式为“Research实习生+姓名+可到岗时间+电话”。我们会尽快安排面试，谢谢！

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责： 利用互联网平台进行产品推广； 回复公司分配的询盘， 编制报价，以邮件或者网络电话的形式商务谈判促成订单； 跟进客户运输单号信息； 业务相关资料的整理和归档； 任职资格：  1、本科以上学历，品学兼优，有责任心和承压能力；  2、专业不限国际贸易、商务英语类相关专业优先；  3、大学英语六级以上；  4、较强的英语口语，邮件回复水平。 能熟练运用办公软件，学习能力强、细心严谨；熟练运用EXCEL、WORD；  5、思维敏捷，善与人沟通，语言表达能力强，有较强的团队协作意识；  6、有外贸工作经验的优先。  薪资待遇： 入职底薪4000+提成 入职半年后6000+ 五险一金+底薪+提成 职位薪资：  150-200/天

该职位来源于猎聘  工作内容：  1、根据具体垂直行业，输出真实、有深度、有覆盖面、有市场策略的行业分析报告； 积极实施市场开发计划，扩大企业在市场中的影响力； 深入了解市场竞争信息，及时收集行业信息，跟踪国内外同行业技术、市场等方面的信息及其变化情况； 了解同行业动态，市场及产品营销动态、竞争对手状况，组织对各种信息进行整理、分析、建档； 负责公司品牌形象与市场营销； 组织实施品牌推广活动，在目标客户群中建立企业产品品牌的知名度和美誉； 任职要求：  1、本科及以上学历，有3年以上物联网或通信行业的市场或销售背景；  2、英语四级以上，具备优秀的英语听说读写能力者；  3、有项目管理、开发经验者优先；  4、有团队管理经验者优先，可承受一定频次的出差；  5、具备敏锐的市场分析及判断能力，良好的沟通与协作能力，以及用户服务意识；  6、熟练使用ppt、excel办公软件优先

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责：  1、负责开拓海外代理、需求挖掘、报价、合同谈判及签订工作；  2、收集客户档案，跟进潜在客户，开发新客户，努力完成销售任务；  3、回复客户询价，与商务部、订舱部、操作部较好的协调；  任职资格：  1、良好的英语听说读写能力，英语四级及以上优先；  2、大专以上学历，物流管理、航运、英语等相关专业优先；  3、可接受全职实习/应届毕业生。  职位薪资：  200-400/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：http://www.sz-fht.com/

jobTitle: 国际贸易与国际商务经理人实习
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  国际贸易与国际商务经理人实习2022-2023届  岗位职责：  此岗位发展方向为掌握国际贸易完整供应链与体系的国际贸易经理人。  涉及业务内容主要包含：国际贸易跟单，国际物流， 采购， 出口通关， 国际结算，外贸函电，电子商务，跨境电商，国际会展，国外商访与商务洽谈， 跨国合作与跨国协同。  希望应聘此岗位的学生能够德才兼备，值得托付并有志于在国际商贸领域长远发展。  任职要求：  1，此岗位提供给有志于在国际商贸领域长期发展并以此为职业路线的优秀在校生，以大三大四学生为主要发展对象。希望你有意向在深圳工作打拼并长期发展。  2，此岗位需要接触联络国际贸易供应链诸多环节，工作内容要求你是乐于并善于与国内外多方打交道，值得托付并善于协调沟通。  3，本科院校；英语6级以上，外语听说写能力优秀，能与国外客户高质量电话沟通面谈和面谈。  4，经济，贸易，物流，商务，语言类专业为主，不设限专业。  5，能够适应国内外出差及会展活动。根据公司业务拓展部分实习生可能会涉及到国内或国外出差，需要能灵活协调学校事宜。  6，有海外学习生活经历或多种外语能力优先。  7，符合条件的外籍留学生亦可。  实习生发展方向及职业路径  1，实习生从国际商贸跟单，国际物流，采购，助理支持类工作做起。-国贸跟单-经理助理3-6个月时间  2，根据指导维护开发国外客户，全流程处理出口业务，学习掌握国际贸易供应链体系。-国贸专员-1年时间  3，基于公司国内外展会，客户，合作方资源，自主开发境外目标市场。-国际贸易项目经理-职业化国际贸易经理人-1年时间  4，事业部主管或国家区域主管。  你将获得：  实习期薪资待遇 150/天。  优秀实习生可在正式毕业后根据双方评估及意愿申请转正继续发展。  实习期：3个月以上，优秀实习生可实习至毕业。  实习地点：深圳南山区  职位薪资：  150-200/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.betrust.cn

jobTitle: 平台活动运营实习生（电商）
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  【岗位职责】 协助上级运营，完成东南亚市场平台S级大促活动的策划、执行。 对活动进行数据监控及用户调研，分析用户活动路径，调整活动策略。 分析市场竞品，实时把握用户关注的热点及竞品活动动态，调研用户，协助上级运营整合多方资源，输出具有竞争力的活动玩法。 在活动体验上，敏锐捕捉用户使用体验优缺点，配合上级运营，产品经理提出相应的改进方案； 【岗位需求】 聪明好学，有快速学习能力，能快速理解业务诉求并快速执行； 有一定的互联网相关经验为佳，理解互联网项目流程的基础环节； 具备开阔的思路，优秀的文案功底，出色的审美感，良好的沟通能力； 有一定的数据敏感度，能够完成基础数据分析复盘工作 出色的英文书面沟通能力，能与国外同事进行流畅对接； 实习时间不短于3个月，大三/大四/研二/研三。 我们能提供： 跟来自微信、阿里大牛共事，培养互联网正确做事方法论，快速成长机会，探索东南亚出海金融电商平台玩法，能在职业起点打下全面视角； 充分发挥你的创新才能，一起探索新的玩法。学会如何高效将想法组织协调落地。 培养出色的数据分析框架及数据敏感度。 工作地点：深圳 南山 职位薪资： 150-200/天 想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.akulaku.com

该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述：  1．负责完成销售部下达的物联网领域销售任务；  2．负责本区域物联网项目拓展，联合代理商，管理、跟进并落地本区域机会点；  3．负责本区域客户关系的建设和维护，负责本区域合作伙伴的甄选和维护；  4．负责行业和区域的市场洞察，制订本区域的销售策略。  任职要求：  1．本科学历及以上；  2．年龄30岁以下，特别优秀者可放宽到32岁；  3．3到5年安防、商显、工业、运营商等行业无线通信模组、MCU或芯片销售工作经验；  4．有丰富的渠道和客户资源者优先；  5．为人正直，品行端正，有激情，有开拓精神。

职位来源于实习僧。  职位关键词：  英语，石油/石化，国际贸易  岗位职责：  1、主要负责贸易部业务对应的各类合同的单据编制、管理工作，  2、辅助其他商务专员处理业务合同和外部对接工作。  任职要求：  1、文化程度本科及以上  2、财务、金融、商科、文秘等相关专业  3、熟练使用办公软件  4、具备财务基础知识  5、大三、研二优先，暑期实习  职位薪资：  100-120/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：https://www.yutime.com/cn/

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责：  1、负责公司新客户的拓展和老客户的维护；  2、维护客户关系，联系客户沟通投资业务合作；  3、了解客户根本需求，为其提供资本规划和投融资规划；  4、积极完成个人和团队销售目标。  任职要求：  1、擅长沟通，善于处理人际关系；  2、善于面销和B端客户交流；  3、有金融行业销售、BD商务拓展经验优先考虑；  4、具有团队精神，能够吃苦耐劳。  韬伯资本是一家有情怀的服务创新创业的精品投行，公司业务包括股权投资、股权融资顾问、兼并与收购等，致力于寻找各行业销售人才，培养为优秀的投资行业精英。公司总部位于上海市虹桥商务区，并在苏州设有办公室。韬伯资本主要团队成员和资深顾问均来自于九鼎集团、光大证券、北拓资本等国内顶尖金融机构，在服务实体企业的过程中，积累了丰富的投融资经验和资方资源。韬伯资本将充分发挥团队、平台和渠道优势，不断为客户创造价值，努力打造一家深耕基层、融通资本的市场化全方位精品投行。自2014年创立以来，韬伯资本已成功完成私募股权投资、私募融资、并购等数笔交易。来到韬伯资本，你能得到：与优秀精品投行团队并肩作战的机会；与最顶尖的风险投资机构和创业者紧密工作的机会；在工作中不断学习前沿科技领域知识的机会。  公司愿景：成为一流的投资银行  公司宗旨：为员工的物质和精神财富而奋斗  企业文化：责任、史命、狼性、创新  职位薪资：  50-100/天

职位来源于实习僧。  试用期无责任高底薪、高提成 ，提供转正机会！  【岗位职责】  1、负责公司软件产品销售，通过各种渠道收集有效的客户资料；  2、以电话发掘并追踪潜在客户需求，积累客户资源；  3、对新客户促成签单，维护好已开发对接的客户；  4、结合项目内容、项目进展、常见客户问题完善话术，总结工作情况。  【任职要求】  1、专业和学历不限，计算机、市场营销、或其他专业有推广及销售能力的优先；  2、性别不限，亲和力好，开朗自信，普通话标准，有较强的语言表达及说服能力；  3、掌握基本的网络销售技巧，了解互联网和搜索引擎，有电话营销工作经验者优先。  职位薪资：  80-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.hdk.net

职位来源于实习僧。  我司这个岗位目前只接受大四和研二研三实习生，请知悉，谢谢。  岗位职责：  1、负责海外地区市场调研，海外展会的筹备和参加等事宜，前期市场推广工作，参与海外市场调研；  2、负责海外地区业务数据统计分析工作；  3、参与海外市场活动规划，根据市场规划，积极主动的策划市场活动；  4、参与海外业务的英文活动文案，广告文案以及新闻稿的撰写和执行；  5、完成公司安排的其他相关工作。  任职要求：  1、生物医药相关专业本科及以上学历，有海外背景优先考虑；  2、有较强的英文阅读和写作能力，具备的书面与口头表达能力；  3、具有较强的沟通、协调能力及较强的团队合作精神，能够正确对待工作压力；  4、具有良好的敬业精神和团队合作精神，工作有条理性、计划性，踏实，勤奋。办事沉稳细致，尽职尽责  职位薪资：  200-300/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.ubigene.com/

职位来源于实习僧。  工作内容：  1） 数据收集和分析，协助销售经理提供事务支持  2） 协助销售经理报价  3） 系统价格维护  4） 领导安排的其他工作  任职要求：  1） 能快速学习，做事仔细认真有责任心  2） 英语良好，读写流利（CET6或以上）  3） 熟练掌握Excel(vlookup)和Microsoft的其他办公软件  4） 一周至少工作3天  职位薪资：  150-150/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：http://www.dhl.com/en.html

companyName: 劳士领工程塑料(苏州)有限公司
description: Responsibilities 职责： Handling the daily enquiry from customers, quotation and order follow up 处理日常客户的电话询问、报价和订单的跟进工作； Prepare documents related to the sales work, such as quoatation, order confirmation, delivery order, etc 准备一切与业务有关的文件，如：报价单, 订单，出货单等； Follow up the custom clearance work, arranging transportation for the delivery and other after-sales work 追踪订单的清关情况、出货、货到后跟进售后工作； Working closely with salesperson and team members in the daily work. Communicate efficiently regarding order enquiries and complaints from customers 在日常的工作中，与销售经理和同事紧密配合，沟通有关订单问询与客户投诉的问题； Generate different kinds of weekly/monthly reports based on supervisor's instruction 每周、每月根据上级的要求制造各项报表。  Requirements 要求： Bachelor degree or above, 2021 graduates preferred 本科及以上学历，2021届毕业生优先； Fluent in English in both speaking and writing 具备良好的英语口语及书写能力； Team player with strong ambition to take on responsibility and can work in fast-paced work environment 具备团体精神，有责任感，能适应快速的工作节奏； Pleasant personality ; indoor-sales-oriented person 性格开朗，善于应对客户； Matured, meticulous in paper-work details and organisational admin-procedure 成熟，细心，善于应付文书类工作，服从公司定下的行政工作流程。

工作职责:  At Lilly, we unite caring with discovery to make life better for people around the world. We are a global healthcare leader headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. Our 35,000 employees around the world work to discover and bring life-changing medicines to those who need them, improve the understanding and management of disease, and give back to our communities through philanthropy and volunteerism. We give our best effort to our work, and we put people first. We’re looking for people who are determined to make life better for people around the world.  This is a MBA summer intern position created only for summer intern period.  The candidate will completed a project based on the scope, objective and deliverables shared from our team (multi-channel engagement, new commercial model, sales force empowerment, commercial analytics related projects).  She/he will create project charter, scope, objective, project plan and through internal/external interviews to understand current situation and come out project proposal and implementation milestones. CMO/MCE teams will provide sponsorship support and daily coaching, support.  Eli Lilly and Company, Lilly USA, LLC and our wholly owned subsidiaries (collectively “Lilly”) are committed to help individuals with disabilities to participate in the workforce and ensure equal opportunity to compete for jobs. If you require an accommodation to submit a resume for positions at Lilly, please email Lilly Human Resources ( Lilly_Recruiting_Compliance@lists.lilly.com ) for further assistance. Please note This email address is intended for use only to request an accommodation as part of the application process. Any other correspondence will not receive a response.  Lilly does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.  任职条件:  详情请见职位描述

职位来源于实习僧。  一．公司介绍：  中铖润智资产管理（上海）有限公司，位于陆家嘴金融中心。公司由来自北清复交研究生，具有丰富证券基金经验的专业人员组成，目前已发行多支各类型私募基金产品，有稳定的客户群。现为扩大公司业务，增强研究力量，特别面向全国重点大学研究生（硕士，博士）招聘专业行研人才。毕业正式入职前需在公司长期培训。  公司规模日益扩大，我们期待更多优秀的新生力量的加入。  二． 岗位职责：  1．根据投研框架的指引，对相应产业链进行研究，包括市场空间、竞争格局、供应链、产业动态等，对应产业链为大消费、大健康、科技中的子产业。  2．协助投资经理，完成相应上市公司基本面研究，完成公司估值分析。  三. 任职要求：  1．国内重点大学在读研究生（实习期间表现的2021年毕业生，公司提供转正机会）；  2．所学专业要求信息技术、应用数学、通信等专业；  3．具备良好的专业理论知识，具备数学统计分析能力、良好的文字表达与沟通能力、认真敬业的工作态度、积极的团队合作意识；  4．具备经济学、金融基础知识；  5．熟练掌握Wind，Choice，Excel等资讯或简单建模软件；  6．实习时间3个月以上，实习期间要求每周能固定时间、并且每周保证工作时间3天及以上到公司现场工作；  四. 你将获得： 公司将提供实习津贴和饭贴。 优秀实习生公司将留用。（已留用二位） 职位薪资：  100-150/天

该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述：  The Business  Our Solution Is Including  At Willis Towers Watson, we help clients align their talent and rewards strategy with their business strategy to achieve long-term success. We rely on data, analytics and experience to pinpoint the talent and workforce needs that are vital to their overall performance. We develop compensation and broader rewards strategies and design and implement programs that address these needs, drive higher performance and ensure the right return on their investment in people. Backed by industry-leading technology, global workforce data, research and insights, we help our clients quickly transform ideas into action. Executive Compensation – We help management teams and board members create and implement pay programs that balance the interests of key stakeholders while driving performance and long-term alignment Rewards – We build and implement leading-edge organization, job and reward framework solutions that create an engaging employee experience and deliver the right return on investment to the organization Rewards Data and Software – We support our clients throughout the year as they develop and design an effective compensation strategy. From survey submission to job evaluation and everything in between, we bring a powerful combination of market-leading data, enterprise-strength technology and industry expertise to their pay programs — giving them clients everything they need to get compensation right for their organizations Talent Management & Organizational Alignment: We design the work experience to attract, retain and motivate people helping organizations optimize the way work gets done and drive performance by connecting the demand and supply for talent. Employee Insights: We help clients improve business performance by enabling them to better understand their employees’ perspectives, and take actions to improve employee engagement and company culture. Our Employee Engagement Software allows clients to quickly access employee opinions and reactions to events, giving leaders insight to enhance the employee experience. The Role  As an Analyst in Talent & Rewards, you will work beside some of the industry’s top consultants while you develop cutting edge technical knowledge and skills.  You will have immediate exposure to real client assignments which will draw on your imagination and creativity as well as your ability to analyze information, draw conclusions and present results. These experiences will help build your technical knowledge and overall industry expertise while you benefit from more structured learning interventions that are tailored to the business area you join.  Performance Objectives  Clients Collect and analyses data through market research including in-house and other data sources; Prepare letters and reports, client presentations and meetings, and proposals; Summarize and form conclusions based on analysis, and presenting results internally and with clients; Interact with clients in client engagements; Develop technical knowledge surrounding rewards, talent and performance management; Financial Meet chargeable hours targets; Contribute to sales and marketing efforts by supplying information for proposals; People Build relationship internally and collaborate effectively on cross-functional teams; Collaborate with others by conveying ideas, issues and information in a fluent and logical manner and providing constructive peer feedback; Demonstrate natural ease and effectiveness when dealing with clients/colleagues at all levels;  Excellence An eye for details, analytical, meticulous, insightful with a structured thought process; Intellectual curiosity and learning ability; Deliver on projects to meet or exceed client expectations; 任职要求：  The Requirements Bachelor’s degree above in economics, human resources, psychology, management, finance, mathematics, statistics, social science or any other major with significant quantitative course work, and a strong academic record; A problem solver: Be able to identify and solve challenging problems; Analytical: Be able to draw conclusions from data in a logical, systematic way; Conceptual: Be ability to go beyond the details and see the big picture; Results-driven: Be focused on achieving results that promote business success; Organized: Be able to work and think in a methodical and orderly way: Committed to quality: Continuously works to achieve the highest quality standards on works and able to meet tight deadlines Team player: Ability to work independently as well as in a team; Well-developed: Analytical, quantitative, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills; Good knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint is essential.

What is Build the F uture?  Build the F uture is the Prysmian Group Graduate Program . The 202 2 edition of the program will be number 1 1 !  We aim to hire talents globally with diverse background and experiences who are eager to make our world a more sustainable place and ready to embrace new challenges.  Are you willing to make your mark in the Energy transition and Digitalization of our communities ?  We offer you the opportunity to work with products that help the world meet sustainable development goals. Whenever y our work will support the mass electrification in mobility or boost the development of 5G Network , you ’ll have a real impact on our communities .  Be part of this important change and help us build a better future for all of us . Joi n us!  Program Overview  Our Graduate Program provides an immersive experience in our company from day 1.  The program starts with a two-week Global Induction with trainings and activities led by the Prysmian Group Academy in collaboration with a Top -Ranking Business School.  Following your induction, you will be part of a one -year job rotation in 3 different departments: Research and Development, Operations in one of our production sites , and Sales Support/Technical Sales .  After the first year of rotation, you will start your international assignment for a duration of 3 years . The position will be either technical, mainly based in one of our production sites , or business related , strongly linked to the core of our business.  You’ll learn new ways of working, acquire new knowledge, meet new colleagues and embrace a new culture!  At the end of your assignment abroad, returning to the country you’ve been hired in , you will be ready to take on a new responsibility in the technical or business areas continuing your career in Prysmian Group.  What else is in for you? A competitive reward package , including a bonus opportunity . A training plan tailored for you in partnership with a Top -Ranking Business School . A buddy who will help you settle in quickly, during the first year of your journey. A wide range of training and career development opportunities based on performance . Mobility benefits during your international assignment . A global network of other 300+ colleagues who have already joined our graduate program . Who are you? You are keen on joining a career in our industry and you are ready to embrace a new challenge. You have graduated in the last 18 months or you are completing a degree in the Engineering, Technical or Business and Economics fields. We are a global company. Being fluent in English is key . You have worked or studied abroad and /or you are willing to join an international experience with Prysmian Group. You have excellent communication and presentation skills . You enjoy learning and working with other colleagues . Everyone at Prysmian Group has the potential to make their mark; because whatever you do, wherever you are based, you will be part of a company that is working to make our future greener . Just come as you are, bring ing all your energy , passion and ideas . Ready to start a new journey?  Prysmian Group, as an Equal Opportunity Employer, aims to attract and recruit individuals with diverse backgrounds, skills and abilities, who will enhance the quality of service and contribute to the Group’s success. Prysmian Group is committed to the development of an organization that prioritizes talent, where people feel respected, appreciated and free to fully express their human potential. Prysmian Group strongly believes that diversity drives meritocracy and brings significant value at all levels of the organization, increases the possibility of capturing market opportunities and maximizing value for our customers and shareholders. Prysmian Group bases its decisions on principles of equality, with evaluations based on the type of position and with a focus on best practices so individuals succeed based on their efforts and skills and their alignment with applicable job requirements.  Line Mangers, Hiring Managers, HR Corporate and HR Local are responsible for ensuring that diversity and inclusion are respected during the recruiting process. Unconscious bias and stereotypes must not influence our selection processes. We look for the best candidates and for the real value they can bring into the organization. We value meritocracy. We value diversity. We turn off our bias. All persons shall have the opportunity to be considered for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, alienage or citizenship status, age, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, military service and veteran status, pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local laws. Prysmian will endeavor to make a reasonable accommodation to the known physical or mental limitations of a qualified applicant with a disability unless the accommodation would impose an undue hardship on the operation of our business.  Your application data will be treated according to our Data Protection Policy. If you believe you require assistance to complete this form or to participate in an interview, please let us know.

jobTitle: 商标业务拓展主任实习生
description: 职位来源于实习僧。  工作职责：  1、按公司指定行业客户，进行定向业务发展；  2、制定客户名录，并持续进行专业拜访；  3、对目标客户进行业务展示和专业业务引荐；  4、接洽客户需求并和律师组协作为客户提供解决方案；  5、负责客户年度需求的获取和律师组工作间的协调工作。  岗位要求：  1、在读高校生；  2、男女不限，专业不限；  3、普通话准确流利，办公软件熟练。  其他要求：  1、热爱销售工作，心态积极，目标感强烈，具有团队合作意识；  2、对挖掘企业客户需求、创业群体需求、设计类群体需求有钻研兴趣或一定人脉资源；  3、有较强的自律能力和学习能力；  4、有销售和市场实习经历的优先考虑。  你将获得： 公司核心业务的专业化培训：入职培训、学习体验业务技能； 极具竞争力的薪酬模式：年底双薪、多项奖金、五险一金齐全、优厚的提成、透明的晋升机制；（未毕业期间入职，毕业前薪酬按日薪制+项目奖金；无责日薪80元、自第三个月开始增加为100元/日，最高达120元/日；秋招签署三方，转正按转正薪酬标准；毕业即签订劳动合同，并购买五险一金，基础底薪＋项目奖金。） 发展规划：工作业绩优异，可发展为项目负责人、区域负责人或行业负责人，并有机会参与公司年度分享计划。 团队氛围轻松和谐、年轻有活力； 更多真实成功业务案例； 已持续多年的防疫疫苗福利；并有月度例假半日免勤的特别关爱福利； 定期的团体运动； 周边高学历年轻群体聚集，居住便利、商圈中心、地铁出行便利； 职位薪资：  80-120/天

职位来源于实习僧。  首先来自我介绍一下我们的团队，我们是一家主打线上经营护眼仪、护颈仪、护颈枕等健康按摩类产品的公司，是一个年轻的初创型企业，80%%%%%%%%以上的员工均是高校毕业，有较强的学习能力，钻研精神，90后团队，人际关系简单，扁平化管理。  岗位职责：  1、与优质的KOL、MCN机构进行商业谈判，达成广告宣传合作；  2、与文案、视频剪辑和设计同事对接，共同策划出符合KOL风格的广告；  3、完成后期数据跟踪、广告效果检测以及客户关系维护；  任职要求：  1、一本及以上学历，专业不限（市场营销、国际商务等专业可以优先考虑）；  2、熟悉微博和B站的运作方式，并能够对KOL的数据进行初步的分析；  3、具有强大的心理素质和抗压能力，有销售相关经验者可以优先考虑；  4、注重个人发展，主观能动性强，善于学习和总结分析  我们公司拥有严谨的指标考核制度，拒绝给员工画大饼，加入我们，你将拥有行业内最具有竞争力的薪资待遇：  1、富有竞争力的薪资！薪资构成为基本工资（6500）+餐补（500）+全勤（100）+无上限的提成！刚刚毕业也可以迅速月入过万（实习生基本薪资是正式员工的60%%%%，其余待遇都与正式员工一样）  2、丰厚的福利待遇！五险一金+朝九晚六+周末双休+7小时工作制+节日津贴+生日福利+入职大礼包（办公用品+抱枕+躺椅+小风扇+望舒心产品）  3、广阔的发展和晋升空间！拒绝按照资历论资排辈，每年多次升职涨薪机会，只要你够努力，业绩突出，你的付出一定和收获成正比！  4、超大书架+每月购书额度！公司提供书架和书单，每月采购一次新书，想看什么书，公司直接帮你买买买  5、完善的培训制度！一对一新人培训，手把手为你指点迷津，帮助你迅速适应从懵懂学生到职场精英的转变~  职位薪资：  200-300/天

该职位来源于猎聘  2021-2022 Graduate/Intern –Human Capital Consulting Analyst (Shanghai/Beijing/Shenzhen/Guangzhou)  The Business  At Willis Towers Watson, we help clients align their talent and rewards strategy with their business strategy to achieve long-term success. We rely on data, analytics and experience to pinpoint the talent and workforce needs that are vital to their overall performance. We develop compensation and broader rewards strategies and design and implement programs that address these needs, drive higher performance and ensure the right return on their investment in  Our Solution Is Including  people. Backed by technology, global workforce data, research and insights, we help our clients quickly transform ideas into action. Executive Compensation – We help management teams and board members create and implement pay programs that balance the interests of key stakeholders while driving performance and long-term alignment Rewards – We build and implement organization, job and reward framework solutions that create an engaging employee experience and deliver the right return on investment to the organization Rewards Data and Software – We support our clients throughout the year as they develop and design an effective compensation strategy. From survey submission to job evaluation and everything in between, we bring a powerful combination of market data, enterprise-strength technology and industry expertise to their pay programs — giving them clients everything they need to get compensation right for their organizations Talent Management & Organizational Alignment: We design the work experience to attract, retain and motivate people helping organizations optimize the way work gets done and drive performance by connecting the demand and supply for talent. Employee Insights: We help clients improve business performance by enabling them to better understand their employees’ perspectives and take actions to improve employee engagement and company culture. Our Employee Engagement Software allows clients to quickly access employee opinions and reactions to events, giving leaders insight to enhance the employee experience. The Role  As an Consultant in Talent & Rewards, you will work beside some of the industry’s experienced consultants while you develop technical knowledge and skills.  You will have immediate exposure to real client assignments which will draw on your imagination and creativity as well as your ability to analyze information, draw conclusions and present results. These experiences will help build your technical knowledge and overall industry expertise while you benefit from more structured learning interventions that are tailored to the business area you join.  Performance Objectives  Clients Collect and analyses data through market research including in-house and other data sources; Prepare letters and reports, client presentations and meetings, and proposals; Summarize and form conclusions based on analysis, and presenting results internally and with clients; Interact with clients in client engagements; Develop technical knowledge surrounding rewards, talent and performance management; Financial Meet chargeable hours targets; Contribute to sales and marketing efforts by supplying information for proposals; People Build relationship internally and collaborate effectively on cross-functional teams; Collaborate with others by conveying ideas, issues and information in a fluent and logical manner and providing constructive peer feedback; Demonstrate natural ease and effectiveness when dealing with clients/colleagues at all levels;  Excellence An eye for details, analytical, meticulous, insightful with a structured thought process; Intellectual curiosity and learning ability; Deliver on projects to meet or exceed client expectations; The Requirements Bachelor’s degree above in economics, human resources, psychology, management, finance, mathematics, statistics, social science or any other major with significant quantitative course work, and a strong academic record; A problem solver: Be able to identify and solve challenging problems; Analytical: Be able to draw conclusions from data in a logical, systematic way; Conceptual: Be ability to go beyond the details and see the big picture; Results-driven: Be focused on achieving results that promote business success; Organized: Be able to work and think in a methodical and orderly way: Committed to quality: Continuously works to achieve the highest quality standards on works and able to meet tight deadlines Team player: Ability to work independently as well as in a team; Well-developed: Analytical, quantitative, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills; Good knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint is essential.

About Mettler Toledo  METTLER TOLEDO is a leading global supplier of precision instruments and services. We are recognized as an innovation leader and our solutions are critical in key R&D, quality control, and manufacturing processes for customers in a wide range of industries including life sciences, food, and chemicals. We operate throughout the world with a culture shaped by innovation and international flair. Our Opening and Your Responsibilities   Unit 1: Digital Business Services -4 assignments – Digital Business Services is a business focused and modern digitalization organization in METTLER TOLEDO that covers everything from infrastructure, applications, data and reporting to projects such as Blue Ocean Roll-ins, M365 implementation and infrastructure upgrades. Assignments are possible in departments such as Business Applications, Business Technology, Business Transformation, Data Governance, Digital Workplace Solutions, Enterprise Reporting & Analytics, Information Security & Governance Unit 2: China Market Organization – 1 assignment – Our China Market Organization serves the China market with all METTLER TOLEDO products and services. There are interesting departments to choose like Tele-Sales, Marketing, Finance, Customer Engineering or our Service Department Unit 3: Software Development Center – 1 assignment – Software Development Center is a professional software development center, which supports business units in implementing and supporting their Software needs in accordance with METTLER TOLEDO Software Strategies. Possible working assignments are in Testing, Software Development, Product Management, Project Management  What You Need to Succeed A very good university degree (Master-Diploma)  Initial experience and knowledge from internships, working student activities, etc. An entrepreneurial mindset, with a “can do” attitude, and a strong interest for technology and digital solutions Resilience, commitment and the wish to go the extra mile Open to change and with high learning agility Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken  Our Offer to You Competitive compensation & benefit package Possibility to work in an international environment with multicultural team Interesting and challenging career in a successful leading global organization Trainings and professional development  Equal Opportunity Employment  We promote equal opportunity worldwide and value diversity in our teams in terms of business background, area of expertise, gender and ethnicity. For more information on our commitment to Sustainability, Diversity and Equal Opportunity please visit us here

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  2021-2022 Graduate/Intern –Human Capital Consulting Analyst (Shanghai/Beijing/Shenzhen/Guangzhou)  The Business  At Willis Towers Watson, we help clients align their talent and rewards strategy with their business strategy to achieve long-term success. We rely on data, analytics and experience to pinpoint the talent and workforce needs that are vital to their overall performance. We develop compensation and broader rewards strategies and design and implement programs that address these needs, drive higher performance and ensure the right return on their investment in  Our Solution Is Including  people. Backed by technology, global workforce data, research and insights, we help our clients quickly transform ideas into action. Executive Compensation – We help management teams and board members create and implement pay programs that balance the interests of key stakeholders while driving performance and long-term alignment Rewards – We build and implement organization, job and reward framework solutions that create an engaging employee experience and deliver the right return on investment to the organization Rewards Data and Software – We support our clients throughout the year as they develop and design an effective compensation strategy. From survey submission to job evaluation and everything in between, we bring a powerful combination of market data, enterprise-strength technology and industry expertise to their pay programs — giving them clients everything they need to get compensation right for their organizations Talent Management & Organizational Alignment: We design the work experience to attract, retain and motivate people helping organizations optimize the way work gets done and drive performance by connecting the demand and supply for talent. Employee Insights: We help clients improve business performance by enabling them to better understand their employees’ perspectives and take actions to improve employee engagement and company culture. Our Employee Engagement Software allows clients to quickly access employee opinions and reactions to events, giving leaders insight to enhance the employee experience. The Role  As an Consultant in Talent & Rewards, you will work beside some of the industry’s experienced consultants while you develop technical knowledge and skills.  You will have immediate exposure to real client assignments which will draw on your imagination and creativity as well as your ability to analyze information, draw conclusions and present results. Financial Meet chargeable hours targets; Contribute to sales and marketing efforts by supplying information for proposals; People Build relationship internally and collaborate effectively on cross-functional teams; Collaborate with others by conveying ideas, issues and information in a fluent and logical manner and providing constructive peer feedback; Demonstrate natural ease and effectiveness when dealing with clients/colleagues at all levels;  Excellence An eye for details, analytical, meticulous, insightful with a structured thought process; Intellectual curiosity and learning ability; Deliver on projects to meet or exceed client expectations; The Requirements Bachelor’s degree above in economics, human resources, psychology, management, finance, mathematics, statistics, social science or any other major with significant quantitative course work, and a strong academic record; A problem solver: Be able to identify and solve challenging problems; Analytical: Be able to draw conclusions from data in a logical, systematic way; Conceptual: Be ability to go beyond the details and see the big picture; Results-driven: Be focused on achieving results that promote business success; Organized: Be able to work and think in a methodical and orderly way: Committed to quality: Continuously works to achieve the highest quality standards on works and able to meet tight deadlines Team player: Ability to work independently as well as in a team; 职位来源于实习僧。  【实习】中邮基金光大控股子公司招聘资本市场部实习生-北京  岗位职责：  协助收集信息和行业动态数据；  协助参与各类投资项目的调研和尽职报告的整理；  协助起草项目相关文件；  协助办理相关立项、备案和审批等手续；  协助投资后管理与服务。  协助投资经理完成投资业务的其他事务。  应聘条件：  全日制经济，金融，财务，法律相关专业，研究生或本科在读，2022年毕业；  能够立即开始实习，实习时长至少3个月，且每周实习至少4天，有投行、券商、信托、资管、财务、法律等相关实习经验者优先；  具备良好的中英文沟通和写作能力，熟练掌握和运用办公软件；  头脑灵活，逻辑思维学习能力强，具备良好的沟通协调能力，口头和文字表达和数据研究能力；勤奋踏实，乐观积极，有较强的责任心和团队合作精神，能适应高强度快节奏的工作；  实习待遇：  提供实习补贴175元/天  简历附照片  简历格式：姓名－学校－应聘职位－地区 - 实习时间  公司简介:  首誉光控资产管理有限公司（以下简称“首誉光控”，前身为“首誉资产管理有限公  司”）成立于2013年3月，由中邮创业基金管理有限公司（“中邮基金”）经中国证监  会核准设立，并持有中国证监会颁发的《经营证券期货业务许可证》。经营范围为特定  客户资产管理和中国证监会许可的其它业务。 2014年4月，中国光大控股有限公司  (165.HK)通过旗下全资子公司增资首誉资管。首誉资管当前注册资本已增至9.6亿，并  在2014年第三季度更名为“首誉光控”。  股东简介:  中邮创业基金管理有限公司于2006年5月8日在北京成立，注册资本1亿元人民币。 基金  管理资产规模为 789.30亿元，在可比85家基金公司中排名第 8位。（截至2015年12月  31日)中邮创业基金净资产收益率指标稳居业内前列。2014年度，中邮基金净资产收益  率达到22.46%%%%%%%%。 中邮战略新兴产业基金在2013年以80.38%%%%%%%%的净值增长率夺得2013年度  股票型基金业绩冠军。 中邮稳定收益债券A/C，2013年度纯债基金分列第一和第二名。  中国光大控股有限公司（「光大控股」，股份代号：165.HK）为一家跨香港和中国内地  的多元化金融控股企业，是内地光大证券（股份代号：601788.SH）第二大股东和中国  光大银行（股份代号：601818.SH、6818.HK）的第三大股东，母公司为中国光大集团。  光大控股于1997年在香港成立，公司秉持「大资产管理」战略，专注发展一级市场投  资、二级市场投资、结构性融资及投资等基金管理及投资业务，同时作为中国飞机租赁  有限公司的主要股东，积极发展中国及新兴市场的飞机租赁业务。此外，光大控股还利  用联营公司光大证券在跨境收费性业务方面的优势，参与香港投资银行（企业融资）和  经纪（财富管理）等业务的发展。目前管理多元化的投资基金平台33个基金，总募资金  额超过678亿港元。  职位薪资：  120-180/天

职位来源于实习僧。  岗位职责：  1、 负责直销客户总监的业务支持工作；  2、 根据负责人的需求，定期完成外部市场研究报告及内部销售数据分析总结等；  3、 协助举办各类客户策略会或其他活动；  4、 完成部门安排的其他工作。  岗位要求：  1、 具备良好的知识结构，市场营销、经济、金融等相关专业优先考虑，毕业时间不早于2023年；  2、 对金融投资市场、资产管理行业有浓厚的兴趣；  3、 一周能保证3-5日工作，实习期至少为3个月，有团队意识；  4、熟练使用 EXCEL、PPT等办公软件；会使用WIND咨询的优先考虑。  职位薪资：  50-100/天  想要了解更多，可以访问公司官网：www.zsfund.com

Beijing or remotely from anywhere in China | Full time | at the earliest possible date  As Senior Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for developing and executing a comprehensive ROI-driven author-centric Marketing Strategy for China to support our journals portfolio. In this role you will work from our Beijing office or remotely from any location in China, and report to the Regional APAC manager. The position is permanent.  YOUR TASKS Develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns through various channels (email, website, search engine, social media, 3rd party collaboration, events etc.) Devise a comprehensive social media marketing road-map to enhance De Gruyter’s brand presence and engagement with the research community Close collaboration with our sales and editorial team to generate awareness of De Gruyter journals and growing authorship, increasing submissions and growing institutional revenues Analysis and reporting of marketing activities and ongoing optimization according to KPIs Build and maintain key relationships; both internally and externally  YOUR PROFILE Degree major in marketing, science and engineering or relevant qualifications 2-3 years of marketing experience, ideally within journals marketing Knowledge and continued awareness of key trends and developments in Open Access publishing is desirable Strong work ethic with the ability to handle multiple priorities and respond quickly to changing requirements. Knowledge of Salesforce and Marketing Cloud would be a plus Ability to work independently and be resourceful Excellent oral and written communication in both English and Chinese  WE OFFER YOU An exciting professional challenge for one of the innovation drivers of the publishing industry Extensive benefits for a healthy, balanced life and work Time and space for curiosity, learning and development Passionate colleagues in diverse teams   At De Gruyter, we believe in diversity and are committed to equal employment opportunities for everyone. It is our shared goal to create a workplace culture centered around inclusion and belonging.   De Gruyter publishes first-class scholarship and has done so for more than 270 years. An international, independent publisher headquartered in Berlin -- and with further offices in Boston, Beijing, Basel, Vienna, Warsaw and Munich -- it publishes over 1,300 new book titles each year and more than 900 journals in the humanities, social sciences, medicine, mathematics, engineering, computer sciences, natural sciences, and law. The publishing house also offers a wide range of digital media, including open access journals and books.
